story:
Our Broken Health Care System

     Health care in the United States is broken. We are caught in political gridlock where neither side cares what’s best for the average citizen, but only cares for their party’s platform, and the laws pushed by their major donors. With insurance companies and big pharmaceutical companies free to write their own rules in many cases, there is no accountability in the system. Treatment costs continue to rise, specialty drug prices have become outrageous, insurance premiums and deductibles are reaching unsustainable highs

     Health care horror stories are endless. Elderly couples are unable to afford the medicines they need. Young families are unable to cover the medical costs required to care for their children. The quality and availability of health care continues to decline as the costs continue to spiral up. Some reports indicate that over half of all bankruptcies are based on medical expenses. Government reports show that almost 20% of the US Gross Domestic Product is based on health care costs. We must regain control, or we will all suffer the consequences.

     It is not a matter of “if” you will be a victim of our broken system, but “when” and how badly you will be hurt.

System Failures

     The health care industry is guided by two major forces: legislators who pass laws and regulations; and providers who often adhere to business practices that are designed solely for their own short-term profitability, rather than the long-term good of society. When both legislators and big businesses neglect our needs as constituents and customers, we all suffer. There are countless examples of this. Here are just a few:

  • Unreasonable Drug Costs: Harvoni, a drug used to treat Hepatitis C, is sold in the United States for $94,000 for a 12-week supply. This same drug is available for around $200 in Japan; a licensed generic version is available for $1,200 in India; and Harvoni is available for $2000 in Korea. It costs approximately $100 to manufacture Harvoni. The first few months the drug was out, sales more than paid for all of its development costs, and has since made tens of billions of dollars in profit for Gilead, the manufacturer. This is only one example of many where pharmaceutical companies have no one to hold them accountable for predatory pricing.
  • Skyrocketing Insurance Premiums: While health care premiums for small business group policies have seen modest increases the last several years, plans on the health care exchanges have increased close to 22 percent per year since their inception. At this rate, premiums have almost doubled in the last 3 years. These plans generally serve those who can least afford the increase, including the elderly who are not yet eligible for Medicare, as well as the poor and sick within our society. The average cost for health insurance for a family of four is now above $25,000 per year, and that doesn't include deductibles, co-pays or co-insurance.
  • Special Interest Influence: Health care lobbyists contributed almost $280 million to their favored candidates’ campaigns in 2016, and spent over $500 million on convincing the legislators they bought and paid for to vote for the bills written for the benefit of their special interest groups. Include other benefits provided by special interest groups, such as advertising in favor of their chosen candidate, and the total is well over a billion dollars a year. Politicians have been bought and paid for by the health care industry with an endless stream of cash. Your $25 campaign contribution just doesn't carry much weight with your congressional representative by comparison. As we expose their conflict of interest, they will understand that they must pass laws that benefit the people, or we will replace them.
  • Medicare Fails Our Seniors: Medicare was envisioned as a safety net for retiring seniors, but premiums are rising as fast or faster than Social Security increases. Few doctors will see new Medicare patients because of low reimbursement and billing complications, and Medicare drug costs are breaking the system.

The HCA Taskforce is on Your Side.

      The Health Care Accountability Taskforce (HCA Taskforce) is a research and consumer advocacy group focused on restoring integrity and balance to the health care system. Our purpose is to gather and expose information allowing consumers to fully understand the problems related to health care: including ever increasing cost, declining service and the lack of availability for those who are least able to afford it. Armed with this information, and the combined voices of our members, we will have the power to force politicians and business leaders to act in the best interests of the health care consumer, rather than themselves and their political party.

Strength in Numbers

     The HCA Taskforce is dedicated to exposing the true problems in the health care industry, and mobilizing an army of like-minded individuals who want to take back control of our own health care needs. By building an organization with a powerful membership base, we will have the strength to make both government and big business pay attention to our needs. By exposing fraud, corruption, and conflicts of interest by our government leaders, we will be able to pressure the government to once again be a government “of the people, by the people, and for the people.” By exposing unethical business practices we will be able to ensure that businesses will deal fairly and ethically with the consumer either out of respect for the consumer, or fear of the prosecution since they will no longer own the law.

Exposing Corruption and Taking Action

      We will accomplish our goals of bringing balance and integrity back to the health care system by uncovering the real reasons behind the problems, not just the easy answers to appease the masses. We will publish our research to expose fraud and corruption wherever we find it and call on the media and our supporters to demand action. When the public becomes outraged, as it did with the Epi-Pen case a few years ago, we have the power to take action and see real changes take place. To make a difference, we must rise above partisan politics and never allow compromises that treat the surface but mask the hidden monster that still remains.

How Will We do This?

      We will be different from others that talk about solutions that were actually promoted by industry insiders. We will be founded on people like you, and push for solutions that benefit us all.

     We will have our own expert staff for research, and not rely on industry or political insiders for the answers.

     We will retain doctors, lawyers, accountants, insurance specialists and others who understand the health care industry, but are not subject to their influence. With the support of our members we can turn the system around for ourselves, our children, the poor and the seniors who are suffering under the current system.

Our Vision and Goals

  • First Quarter 2018: Launch our initial membership drive and set up our new headquarters office.
         Using the funds from this campaign, we will launch a membership drive that will focus on building a newsletter subscriber base of at least 25,000. From the pool of subscribers, we will enlist 10,000 as contributing members who will make average contributions of $25 or more per year. With this base, we will have membership funds coming in that will allow us to continue towards our ultimate goal of 100,000 contributing members and 250,000 newsletter subscribers. This membership base will cover our anticipated annual budget of $2.5 million.
         To open up opportunities to receive support from private foundations and other charitable organizations, we will spin off a sister organization as a registered 501c3 non-profit organization for much of the research and educational efforts of the Taskforce.
         In this quarter we will secure office space and hire a research journalist and a public relations director. Our focus will be to begin initial research and produce monthly newsletters with informative articles that do not require the in-depth analysis of medical and legal professionals. Producing regular newsletters will aid our public relations director in building our membership levels throughout the following quarter.
  • Second Quarter 2018: Address excessive drug costs and continue to grow membership.
    As our membership increases in the second quarter of 2018, we will staff our legal and accounting team to begin analysis on underlying medical costs, especially drug and hospitalization expense.      Prescription drug costs are the largest slice of health care expenses at 20 percent; and these costs are expected to grow from 20 to 40 percent each year. We will focus on bringing to light drug pricing schemes that produce some of our most egregious examples of over-pricing such as Harvoni ($94,000 per treatment in the US, but only $2,000 in Korea) and Humira ($4,500 in the US, but only $1,000 in Europe for a twin-pack). Attacking this problem will provide the greatest relief of all the health care areas that we will focus on. It is also the easiest area to address. With enough pressure, the CEO’s of half a dozen companies could initiate a major reduction in their drug pricing almost overnight.
         To segregate our political activities, we will spin off a sister organization as a registered 501c4 and / or a 527 organization for more direct political activity engaged in by the Taskforce.
         With continued growth and more detailed research, we will begin issuing calls to action, and expand our membership base to 50,000 members.
  • Third Quarter 2018: Expose political problems and continue to expand research areas covered.
         In the third quarter of 2018, we will continue building our membership base to 75,000 contributing members. We will also bring on insurance and political specialists to lead our in-depth analysis of insurance policies and business models and the relationships between our politicians and the special interest groups that spend close to a billion dollars a year to control our political process. Attacking the problem of corrupt politics will be one of the most difficult. This will require a change of heart for almost every lawmaker in office; or making sure they are no longer in office after the next election.
  • Fourth Quarter 2018: Finish building the leadership team with the addition of medical professionals and reach 100,000 members.
         As we approach the end of the year, we will be looking at close to 100,000 contributing members. With full funding we will bring on our medical team to analyze treatment practices. Retaining medical specialists will require the largest increase in our salary expense, and are therefore held until last. With doctors in our organization, we can better address the viability of alternative treatments, defensive medical costs, and how the field of medicine is impacted by the various requirements imposed by the government and insurers.

Take Action Now

     Each of us needs to recognize and understand the seriousness and far-reaching impacts of doing nothing. Health care costs will only continue to escalate the longer we ignore the problem. More and more people will file for bankruptcy due to medical bills. More and more people will find their prescriptions are out of reach. More and more people will see they simply can’t afford to insure their families.

     It’s time we face this ugly monster and decide TODAY to be part of the solution. Please act NOW to make a contribution so we can go to work in your behalf immediately. The sooner we can get adequately funded, the sooner our team of experts can be put to work on ways to alleviate the burdens of the current health care system.

Contribute to our Campaign and Spread the Word

     Our biggest need right now is financial support. Please give generously, but don’t stop there. Follow our Facebook page. Visit our web site and sign up for our newsletter. Spread the word. Let your friends and associates know you care enough to get involved. Encourage them to also get involved by spreading the word and contributing financially if they can. Join us and make your voice heard. Together we can accomplish great things.

     Our initial funding goal of $75,000 will get us started, but this is only a start. Our total budget for 2018 is close to $2.5 million. The more we can raise in this campaign, the faster we can achieve our funding and membership goals for 2018. The faster we achieve these goals, the sooner we can fight for you.

story:
PRODUCTION

Our production team has begun turning the Manon des Sources ocean waste plastic bottle prototype into vessels for the Manon des Sources premium shampoos and conditioner.

 

 

 

 

Manon des Sources is a premium hair care company providing a three-step system to restoring the hydration, smooth texture, and brightness of natural silver hair (vegan, sulfate & paraben free gentle cleansing, perfect pigmentation saturation and rich with proteins/amino acids).

We are on a mission to help women around the world authentically express their naturally beautiful silver hair. 

 

 

 

MEET MANON CRESPI

Manon Crespi works as an international model/on-air talent with global clothing designers and brands, iconic hair/cosmetic brands, high-end retailers, luxury resorts and fine jewelry designers. Additionally, Manon worked as the online high jewelry editor for the global private jet travel magazine, Elite Traveler, before launching her YouTube channel, Rare & Beautiful, where she interviews global fine jewelry designers and brands.

Manon’s role as leader and influencer in the silver hair space began 11 years ago when she first started the transition from dyed black hair to her natural silver hair. Since then, she has enjoyed a growing number of Instagram followers, Pinterest pins and YouTube viewers because of her natural silver hair.

Those of us who grew up in an era where owning our natural silver hair was taboo are ditching the hair dye to set our silver hair free . . . along with our schedules & pocketbooks.

We are making an identity shift: we aren’t letting ourselves go – we're simply letting go. And we're rocking our own personal style in the process.

We place a higher value on our own authenticity than we do on the opinions of others.

We are confident, unique and comfortable in our own skin. We are rare & beautiful, and so is our hair.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CLARIFY is a sulfate-free and paraben-free gentle clarifying shampoo formulated especially for natural silver hair. This shampoo works triple-time, ridding hair of dirt build-up from environmental impurities, styling products, and chemicals found in water. CLARIFY leaves hair gently squeaky clean, easy to comb through, super shiny and smelling amazing.

 

Directions: I use CLARIFY gentle clarifying shampoo at least once a week before toning my hair with AMPLIFY toning shampoo. I apply CLARIFY to my wet hair, making sure to work in the later evenly throughout my entire head of hair. I rinse well with warm water and repeat a second time to completely remove all environmental impurities as well as chemical and product build-up. During the second application, I keep the lathered shampoo in my hair for up to 5 minutes depending on how yellow my hair is: the more the yellow in my hair, the longer I leave it on my hair. After rinsing well, my hair is a little bit squeaky clean, super soft and a perfect canvas for the next step: AMPLIFY toning shampoo. XO Manon 

 

 

 

 

AMPLIFY is a sulfate-free and paraben-free gentle purple toning shampoo formulated especially for natural silver hair. It's multifaceted vegetable protein-based complex, amino acid complex and intense purple pigmentation strengthen and protect hair from cuticle abrasion and breakage while neutralizing yellowing found in natural silver hair.  AMPLIFY leaves hair stronger, brighter, shinier and smelling amazing.

 

Directions: I use AMPLIFY gentle toning shampoo at least once a week after clarifying my hair with CLARIFY clarifying shampoo. I apply AMPLIFY to my wet hair beginning with the ends, and work the lather through to the mid-crown of my head. I'll let the lather sit on my hair up to 10-15 minutes to really penetrate the hair shaft and neutralize the yellow strands. Usually, the newer hair growth at the scalp of my head isn't as yellow as the outgrowth of the rest of my hair, so I give more time to toning the lower parts and ends of my hair. Before rinsing, I put additional AMPLIFY on the crown of my head, working lather through to the scalp and throughout all of my hair, and then let it sit for a couple more minutes. After rinsing well, my hair is free of brassy yellow tones, it's super bright and shiny, and is ready for its final step: FORTIFY fortifying conditioner. XO Manon

 

 

 

FORTIFY CONDITION is a sulfate-free, paraben-free and nutrient-rich gentle conditioner formulated especially for natural silver hair. Fortified with multiple fruit and plant extracts, this luxurious, power-packed hydrating conditioner fortifies the hair with a high-tech delivery system that ensures the nutrients penetrate the hair cuticle, building strength from within while protecting the hair's surface. FORTIFY CONDITION leaves hair feeling silky soft, light-weight, full of volume and smelling amazing.

 

Directions: I use FORTIFY CONDITION after using either AMPLIFY gentle toning shampoo or FORTIFY SHAMPOO. I apply FORTIFY CONDITION to my wet hair making sure to work in the conditioner throughout my entire head of hair. I rinse well with warm water, towel dry and style with my blow dryer. My multi-colored silver, gray and white strands look so vibrant and shiny, and my hair feels incredibly light, silky soft and smooth, and smells amazing. Yours will, too! XO Manon

 

 

FORTIFY SHAMPOO is a sulfate-free, paraben-free and nutrient-rich gentle shampoo formulated especially for natural silver hair. Fortified with multiple fruit and plant extracts, this luxurious, power-packed hydrating shampoo fortifies the hair with a high-tech delivery system that ensures nutrients deposit onto the hair and protect the hair. FORTIFY SHAMPOO leaves hair clean, silky soft and smelling amazing.

 

Directions: I use FORTIFY SHAMPOO gentle shampoo 2 - 3 times a week depending on my work and travel schedule. I apply FORTIFY SHAMPOO to my wet hair making sure to work in the gentle, conditioning lather throughout my entire head of hair. I rinse completely with warm water, repeat the wash and rinse again. After the final rinse, my hair feels silky and clean, smells amazing and is ready for the final step: FORTIFY fortifying conditioner. XO Manon

 
 
 
 

___________________

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

OUR PRODUCT LINE

INGREDIENTS LIST:

 

CLARIFY SHAMPOO INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua), Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate & Disodium 2- Sulfolaurate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropylamine Oxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl Coco/Isostearamidee, Fragrance (Parfum), ^ Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Panthenol, Sodium Phytate, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Glycerin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Citric Acid, Camellia Sinensis (Black Tea) Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Bertholletia Excelsa Seed (Brazil Nut )Oil, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Vicia Faba (Broadbean) Seed Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Yucca Schidigera Extract, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Flower Extract

DAILY FORTIFY CONDITION INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Fragrance (Parfum), ^ Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Benzyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Trimethylsiloxyamodimethicone, Glycerin, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Quaternium-91, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, C11-15 Pareth-7, Panthenol, C12-16 Pareth-9, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein pg-Propyl Silanetriol, Salicylic Acid, Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sorbic Acid, Lycium Barbarum (Goji) Fruit Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract*, Cinnamidopropyl Trimethyl Ammonium Chloride, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Hydrolyzed Pearl, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Flower Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Leaf Extract

AMPLIFY PURPLE TONING: INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Acrylates Copolymer, PEG-200 Hydrogentated Glyceryl Palmitate, Cocamidopropylamine Oxide, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Fragrance (Parfum), Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, ^ Benzyl Alcohol, PEG-16 Macadamia Glycerides, Propanediol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Silicone Quaternium-8, Triethanolamine, Glycol Distearate, Ext. Violet 2, Panthenol, Glycerin, Laureth-4, Salicylic Acid, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Disodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Xylityl Sesquicaprylate, Arginine (L- Arginine), Sorbic Acid, Aspartic Acid (L-Aspartic Acid), PCA, Glycine, Alanine (L- Alanine), Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein pg-Propyl Silanetriol, Serine (L-Serine), Valine (L-Valine), Isoleucine (L-Isoleucine), Proline (L-Proline), Threonine (L-Threonine), Histidine (L-Histidine), Phenylalanine (L-Phenylalanine), Hydrolyzed Pearl, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Flower Extract, Citric Acid

story_txt:
PRODUCTIONOur production team has begun turning the Manon des Sources ocean waste plastic bottle prototype into vessels for the Manon des Sources premium shampoos and conditioner.    Manon des Sources is a premium hair care company providing a three-step system to restoring the hydration, smooth texture, and brightness of natural silver hair (vegan, sulfate & paraben free gentle cleansing, perfect pigmentation saturation and rich with proteins/amino acids).We are on a mission to help women around the world authentically express their naturally beautiful silver hair.    MEET MANON CRESPIManon Crespi works as an international model/on-air talent with global clothing designers and brands, iconic hair/cosmetic brands, high-end retailers, luxury resorts and fine jewelry designers. Additionally, Manon worked as the online high jewelry editor for the global private jet travel magazine, Elite Traveler, before launching her YouTube channel, Rare & Beautiful, where she interviews global fine jewelry designers and brands.Manon’s role as leader and influencer in the silver hair space began 11 years ago when she first started the transition from dyed black hair to her natural silver hair. Since then, she has enjoyed a growing number of Instagram followers, Pinterest pins and YouTube viewers because of her natural silver hair.Those of us who grew up in an era where owning our natural silver hair was taboo are ditching the hair dye to set our silver hair free . . . along with our schedules & pocketbooks.We are making an identity shift: we aren’t letting ourselves go – we're simply letting go. And we're rocking our own personal style in the process.We place a higher value on our own authenticity than we do on the opinions of others.We are confident, unique and comfortable in our own skin. We are rare & beautiful, and so is our hair.         CLARIFY is a sulfate-free and paraben-free gentle clarifying shampoo formulated especially for natural silver hair. This shampoo works triple-time, ridding hair of dirt build-up from environmental impurities, styling products, and chemicals found in water. CLARIFY leaves hair gently squeaky clean, easy to comb through, super shiny and smelling amazing. Directions: I use CLARIFY gentle clarifying shampoo at least once a week before toning my hair with AMPLIFY toning shampoo. I apply CLARIFY to my wet hair, making sure to work in the later evenly throughout my entire head of hair. I rinse well with warm water and repeat a second time to completely remove all environmental impurities as well as chemical and product build-up. During the second application, I keep the lathered shampoo in my hair for up to 5 minutes depending on how yellow my hair is: the more the yellow in my hair, the longer I leave it on my hair. After rinsing well, my hair is a little bit squeaky clean, super soft and a perfect canvas for the next step: AMPLIFY toning shampoo. XO Manon     AMPLIFY is a sulfate-free and paraben-free gentle purple toning shampoo formulated especially for natural silver hair. It's multifaceted vegetable protein-based complex, amino acid complex and intense purple pigmentation strengthen and protect hair from cuticle abrasion and breakage while neutralizing yellowing found in natural silver hair.  AMPLIFY leaves hair stronger, brighter, shinier and smelling amazing. Directions: I use AMPLIFY gentle toning shampoo at least once a week after clarifying my hair with CLARIFY clarifying shampoo. I apply AMPLIFY to my wet hair beginning with the ends, and work the lather through to the mid-crown of my head. I'll let the lather sit on my hair up to 10-15 minutes to really penetrate the hair shaft and neutralize the yellow strands. Usually, the newer hair growth at the scalp of my head isn't as yellow as the outgrowth of the rest of my hair, so I give more time to toning the lower parts and ends of my hair. Before rinsing, I put additional AMPLIFY on the crown of my head, working lather through to the scalp and throughout all of my hair, and then let it sit for a couple more minutes. After rinsing well, my hair is free of brassy yellow tones, it's super bright and shiny, and is ready for its final step: FORTIFY fortifying conditioner. XO Manon   FORTIFY CONDITION is a sulfate-free, paraben-free and nutrient-rich gentle conditioner formulated especially for natural silver hair. Fortified with multiple fruit and plant extracts, this luxurious, power-packed hydrating conditioner fortifies the hair with a high-tech delivery system that ensures the nutrients penetrate the hair cuticle, building strength from within while protecting the hair's surface. FORTIFY CONDITION leaves hair feeling silky soft, light-weight, full of volume and smelling amazing. Directions: I use FORTIFY CONDITION after using either AMPLIFY gentle toning shampoo or FORTIFY SHAMPOO. I apply FORTIFY CONDITION to my wet hair making sure to work in the conditioner throughout my entire head of hair. I rinse well with warm water, towel dry and style with my blow dryer. My multi-colored silver, gray and white strands look so vibrant and shiny, and my hair feels incredibly light, silky soft and smooth, and smells amazing. Yours will, too! XO Manon  FORTIFY SHAMPOO is a sulfate-free, paraben-free and nutrient-rich gentle shampoo formulated especially for natural silver hair. Fortified with multiple fruit and plant extracts, this luxurious, power-packed hydrating shampoo fortifies the hair with a high-tech delivery system that ensures nutrients deposit onto the hair and protect the hair. FORTIFY SHAMPOO leaves hair clean, silky soft and smelling amazing. Directions: I use FORTIFY SHAMPOO gentle shampoo 2 - 3 times a week depending on my work and travel schedule. I apply FORTIFY SHAMPOO to my wet hair making sure to work in the gentle, conditioning lather throughout my entire head of hair. I rinse completely with warm water, repeat the wash and rinse again. After the final rinse, my hair feels silky and clean, smells amazing and is ready for the final step: FORTIFY fortifying conditioner. XO Manon 

   ___________________
            OUR PRODUCT LINE INGREDIENTS LIST: CLARIFY SHAMPOO INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua), Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate & Disodium 2- Sulfolaurate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropylamine Oxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl Coco/Isostearamidee, Fragrance (Parfum), ^ Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Panthenol, Sodium Phytate, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Glycerin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Citric Acid, Camellia Sinensis (Black Tea) Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Bertholletia Excelsa Seed (Brazil Nut )Oil, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Schidigera Extract, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Flower ExtractDAILY FORTIFY CONDITION INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, story:
Short Summary

Welcome to the Universe where Black Womyn and Black Girls are actively healing! My name is Jessica F Morrison, and I have always wanted to host my own event and create an atmosphere of love, abundance, open arms, open invitation, and full acceptance. I also have not celebrated my birthday formally since I was a teenager. Life is soooo very short, and this year I am changing that absence of celebration! Not to mention I have ONE DECADE’s worth of original music and poetry on my phone and in my notebooks I am just BURSTING to share it for a room full of people.

This June, I just sunccessfilly completed, with distinction, my MFA in Acting graduate program at The Theatre School DePaul University ANNNND I was THE graduation speaker for well over 10,000 guests and world wide streaming. I have been moving so quickly through life that I haven’t even stopped to properly celebrate or share this accomplishment either.

With your investment, I will have the financial capital to make my dreams of sharing my (he)art with you and the rest of the world a reality.

What We Need & What You Get

 

This Healing Concert will take place in Chicago. I need $800 total to book the space. The venue that I’ve fallen in love with has everything I need and requires a $200 deposit to secure the date. In my ideal world, the ULTIMATE birthday gift would be to call these people Saturday morning and put that $200 down for the date! The most promising weeks available are the 2nd or 3rd weeks in December. I chose this space because it has all of the equipment I need as well as being a flexible space AND includes a performance stage and (my dream) concert-lighting set up (YES, this is going to be a whole VIBE!)

As with most things I do, every guest that comes I want them to leave with something. So I am budgeting at least $300 to purchase and package (potentially personalized) gift bags for the guests who will be in attendance.

The remainder of the funds will go toward marketing, food, booze, paying the artistic talent (MC, Singers, musicians, front of house, DJ, photographers, videographers, etc.)

I have a special perk going on right now. Any one person, business or organization who donates, gifts, or invests $50 or more will recieve a hand written card from me with a personalized addressing! And if you’ve ever gotten a letter from me or heard any of my poetry, you KNOW I pour my heart out. You will be MOVED in a profound way!!! Plus, how many hand written letters are you receiving these days?

The Impact

The concert is NECCESSARY right now because how many of us are living in fear? Fear of our own neighbors, traveling, turning on the news, afraid we are going to get “that” phone call, fear thinking about the future, fear of the past, or fear of not knowing how we will get through? We need PEACE! And if you can imagine a room FILLED with people of all backgrounds and stories in one space moving, speaking, singing, dancing, and laughing in joy, love, light, and celebration of life?! THAT IS THIS CONCERT! A HEALING space for ALL of us but especially for black women. Right now I speak to you humbly as a survivor of many things but especially sexual abuse because that is most presently affecting in my day to day life right now.

I heal best when I help other people heal through the stories of my own healing.

If you are new to me and my brand, firstly WELCOME! Also, I want to present my integrity to you. I have a proven record of being one of the MOST dynamic artists, speakers, and creators of this time and generation. I am a Billionaire in spirit and in practice, and I dedicate my life and I give you my word that I WILL GIVE BACK TO THE WORLD AS ABUNDANTLY AS GOD HAS BLESSED ME WITH GIFTS LOVE, LIGHT, and THE POWER TO HEAL AND CHANGE LIVES.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk, honestly, is being transparent and vulnerable about the fact that I don’t have the funds to do this myself. I have posted on social media word about throwing a “Birthday Concert”, but since graduating from my Master’s program, I have been struggling with finding balance in my life. I am juggling life and needs and my savings and I have been humbled so many times asking my parents for help to stay afloat. However, I don’t want my pride or my fear or finances to keep me from my destiny. I have a song in my heart to sing, and I know it resonates with the ? world.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially, I hope you don’t feel badly about it. Your time and your light mean the world to me. I would love to support you and encourage you on this life journey as well. There is more than enough room for ALL OF US to thrive. I hope you might consider contributing in these ways:

 

- Subscribe to my YouTube Channel!

- Watch ONE YouTube video that interests you!

- Share this post with like minded people!

- Share this post on your page!

- Share with me your wisdom on mor creative ways to get sponsors or investors.

- Comment and engage on my Facebook Page!

- Comment, follow, or interact with posts on my Instagram Page! @MzBillionaire1

story:
In 2009 Kel Rae left her position with a prominent fortune 500 firm to go into the Mexican desert and delve deep into Samedhi meditation. During this time she had extreme awakening experiences which brought her to the fulcrum of her existence. 

These experiences left her with profound cosmic knowledge and, in the midst of it, she "saw" a Divine circular pathway which lies within all things, including the human body. Reborn into cosmic knowledge she understood that this roadway within must be maintained as it is also the path to well-being and happiness. 

Six years later, after cloaking this new way of seeing into today’s language, she restores the bridge between Divinity and matter by discovering our correspondence to the cosmos. With it she reintroduces a natural way of achieving balance which brings health, prosperity and wholeness. This is achieved through understanding a sacred code behind the Divine circle, a code that was interpreted by our ancestors which is known to us today as the zodiac.

The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle is a manual to understanding cohesiveness between the Divine and the material world, and a Divine system of mind/ body balancing. This balancing is achieved through tending to the sacred geometry within, whose very nature is described by the zodiac!

In this manual you will find…

  1. How your own system of energy flow (your mind & body) is geometrically symbolized by the cross.
  2. A chart of archetypal images, known as the zodiac, and how they fundamentally represent a code of specific vibrations that directly correspond to your mind & body (your cross).
  3. The art of systematically balancing your mind & body by using the zodiacs to form specific thoughts, actions, and words which vibrationally balance and heal.
  4. Find over thirty diagrams and charts regarding the code and your own energy flow.
  5. Develop a deeper connection to your inner self, with a step-by-step process on how to meditate for healing and transcendence.
  6. Discover how your cross (your mind & body) relates to the cosmic whole by seeing a direct correspondence to earth and the galaxy which reveals an organic heritage.
  7. Clearly "see" the Divine Mother through understanding the energetic way of the circle.

The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle  will change the way you think about life and death, while restoring a lost system of energy management as the ancient, powerful images of the zodiac are revealed as the very earth-bound source which flows within you, taking you back to your original source - the Great Divine Mother.

About Me

My name is Kel Rae and for over thirty years I was a seeker - someone plagued by the question, “What is life all about?”  I struggled for most of my life to find meaning, and I eventually found it, along with true abundance, by entering the inward realm of meditation.

My interest in Divinity began at the young age of seven, as I had regular out-of-body experiences  along with other outer-worldly encounters. I quit grade school and left home to find greater truth and a deeper meaning to life - a sense of purpose. I explored much of the world yet still felt unfulfilled - nothing outward seemed to fill my heart, there had to be another way.

At the age of forty I began to pray fervently to the Divine to explain why I was here. I was completely unprepared for what came next. Soon after a strange situation emerged and a voice within told me to meditate. Having no prior knowledge of meditation, the voice instructed me how. As my practice deepened I left the world to go out into the Mexican desert and go further into the dark journey. It was here that I experiencing tremendous terror, total agony and yet was sustained by unimaginable amounts of Divine love. After my experience with the Divine Mother the journey came to an end and I returned to the world to share my truth with those seeking it. 

This work, The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle, is a vision of Divine knowledge coupled with years of research to reveal an energetic bridge which leads back to Divine connection with the Great Knower or Divine Mother. It speaks of love as the source of radiance that can heal and move all perceived barriers, and it breaks down a complex energetic system into a linear, easy-to-understand, geometric system of healing and health management that results in wellness, joy and a sense of purpose. 

    It has taken thirty years to arrive at this knowledge and six years to process it. However, this material has only been assembled and funds are required in order to partner with an writer/ editor, and illustrator in order to complete this project and publish this manual so that all can have the benefits of this information. The money raised in this campaign will go towards these services.

    The Rewards!

    • $3 - An Ebook - 5 Steps to Healing the Mind Body! - A 26 page booklet on how to heal your mind body with love. It provides a very basic overview of mind body healing using affirmations and activities. 
    • $5 - A Meditation - Download an intimate Goddess Meditation on self-love and limitless creation created just before the author's journey into the desert.
    • $15 - Receive an early e-Book copy of The Great Mother & Her Sacred Circle.
    • $25 - Receive an early first-edition paperback edition of The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle.
    • $1000 - Receive: A copy of The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle and signed original Goddess art by the author.  An 18" x 22" Acrylic and oil on canvas (visit art website: www.kelrae.com)
    • $5000 - Be a Godmother and receive a signed Copy of The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle and a Zodiac Painting.  You choose one of the zodiacs to be painted by the author, signed and dedicated to you on lower left of the artwork or on the back of painting (you choose). There will only be 12 of these paintings done - one for each zodiac!  Acrylic and oil on canvas 36" x 48" - visit art website: www.kelrae.com

     

    How to Check-Out with a Credit or Debit Card

    1. Select your perk
    2. Fill in your shipping information and select “Continue to Paypal.” You will not have to log in to Paypal or create a Paypal account.
    3. Under “Choose a way to pay” on the Paypal screen, select “Pay with a credit or debit card.”
    4. Fill in your credit card information and complete your purchase!

     

    Do you have any Questions?

    Questions about this project can be sent directly to kelraeparkes@gmail.com

    Thank you for your support!

With it she reintroduces a natural way of achieving balance which brings health, prosperity and wholeness. This is achieved through understanding a sacred code behind the Divine circle, a code that was interpreted by our ancestors which is known to us today as the zodiac.The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle is a manual to understanding cohesiveness between the Divine and the material world, and a Divine system of mind/ body balancing. This balancing is achieved through tending to the sacred geometry within, whose very nature is described by the zodiac!In this manual you will find…
How your own system of energy flow (your mind & body) is geometrically symbolized by the cross.
A chart of archetypal images, known as the zodiac, and how they fundamentally represent a code of specific vibrations that directly correspond to your mind & body (your cross).
The art of systematically balancing your mind & body by using the zodiacs to form specific thoughts, actions, and words which vibrationally balance and heal.
Find over thirty diagrams and charts regarding the code and your own energy flow.
Develop a deeper connection to your inner self, with a step-by-step process on how to meditate for healing and transcendence.
Discover how your cross (your mind & body) relates to the cosmic whole by seeing a direct correspondence to earth and the galaxy which reveals an organic heritage.
Clearly "see" the Divine Mother through understanding the energetic way of the circle.
The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle  will change the way you think about life and death, while restoring a lost system of energy management as the ancient, powerful images of the zodiac are revealed as the very earth-bound source which flows within you, taking you back to your original source - the Great Divine Mother.About MeMy name is Kel Rae and for over thirty years I was a seeker - someone plagued by the question, “What is life all about?”  I struggled for most of my life to find meaning, and I eventually found it, along with true abundance, by entering the inward realm of meditation.My interest in Divinity began at the young age of seven, as I had regular out-of-body experiences  along with other outer-worldly encounters. I quit grade school and left home to find greater truth and a deeper meaning to life - a sense of purpose. I explored much of the world yet still felt unfulfilled - nothing outward seemed to fill my heart, there had to be another way.At the age of forty I began to pray fervently to the Divine to explain why I was here. I was completely unprepared for what came next. Soon after a strange situation emerged and a voice within told me to meditate. Having no prior knowledge of meditation, the voice instructed me how. As my practice deepened I left the world to go out into the Mexican desert and go further into the dark journey. It was here that I experiencing tremendous terror, total agony and yet was sustained by unimaginable amounts of Divine love. After my experience with the Divine Mother the journey came to an end and I returned to the world to share my truth with those seeking it. This work, The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle, is a vision of Divine knowledge coupled with years of research to reveal an energetic bridge which leads back to Divine connection with the Great Knower or Divine Mother. It speaks of love as the source of radiance that can heal and move all perceived barriers, and it breaks down a complex energetic system into a linear, easy-to-understand, geometric system of healing and health management that results in wellness, joy and a sense of purpose. It has taken thirty years to arrive at this knowledge and six years to process it. However, this material has only been assembled and funds are required in order to partner with an writer/ editor, and illustrator in order to complete this project and publish this manual so that all can have the benefits of this information. The money raised in this campaign will go towards these services.The Rewards!
$3 - An Ebook - 5 Steps to Healing the Mind Body! - A 26 page booklet on how to heal your mind body with love. It provides a very basic overview of mind body healing using affirmations and activities. 
$5 - A Meditation - Download an intimate Goddess Meditation on self-love and limitless creation created just before the author's journey into the desert.
$15 - Receive an early e-Book copy of The Great Mother & Her Sacred Circle.
$25 - Receive an early first-edition paperback edition of The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle.
$1000 - Receive: A copy of The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle and signed original Goddess art by the author.  An 18" x 22" Acrylic and oil on canvas (visit art website: www.kelrae.com)
$5000 - Be a Godmother and receive a signed Copy of The Great Mother and Her Sacred Circle and a Zodiac Painting.  You choose one of the zodiacs to be painted by the author, signed and dedicated to you on lower left of the artwork or on the back of painting (you choose). There will only be 12 of these paintings done - one for each zodiac!  Acrylic and oil on canvas 36" x 48" - visit art website: www.kelrae.com

 How to Check-Out with a Credit or Debit Card
Select your perk
Fill in your shipping information and select “Continue to Paypal.” You will not have to log in to Paypal or create a Paypal account.

Under “Choose a way to pay” on the Paypal screen, select “Pay with a credit or debit card.”
Fill in your credit card information and complete your purchase!
 Do you have any Questions?Questions about this project can be sent directly to kelraeparkes@gmail.comThank you for your support!

story:
About BB Bombs

Hi! I am Angela! A mom of 4 and the mad bath scientist behind BB Bombs! I create handcrafted, small batched skin food! My products have helped kids and adults:

  • Relieve eczema
  • Diminish Acne
  • Alleviate dry skin
  • Love themselves a little more
  • Practice self-care while being shut in the house during COVID19

Here is what we need

BB Bombs is experiencing growing pains. We are growing quickly and have outgrown our tiny home-based studio. As the holidays approach, we want to be better equipped to increase inventory, ship packages faster, and have a safe work place where we can social distance while accomplishing these things.

Here is exactly what we need to accomplish that. 

  • We need $5,000 to secure the location. This includes the security deposit and renovations/equipment.
  • In return for your investment you will get gift cards, new BB Boxes, and more!
  • If by chance we fall short of our goal (which we truly hope we do not), we will still invest in finding storage space for more inventory plus you still get all your amazing skin food perks!

The Difference Your Contribution Makes

By contributing to this small business: 

  • You are helping to create jobs in a downward facing economy
  • You are helping a family of 6 put food on the table
  • You are helping position the business to give back to more causes and to spread the message of self-care during these trying times.

Risks & Challenges

Having a larger location is always a huge financial risk, However I have confidence that we will push through them.

  • I am a graduate of the Goldman Sachs 10,000 Small Businesses Program and was trained extensively in how to use resources wisely and manage challenges that come along with business ownership. 
  • There may be challenges with shipping services, therefore I plan to put in place a full-time customer service person to ensure that your concerns and questions are resolved swiftly. This will also allow faster replacements for damaged goods or missing items.
  • There may be challenges with suppliers, so we have put together an extensive list of alternative suppliers to ensure we can deliver what we promise as a perk.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you are not able to contribute at this time, I get it! But did you know just sharing a campaign is showing support as well! I would love for you to help us spread the word!
  • Indiegogo makes it easy to share, so please feel free to use the tools provided!

If you got this far, we sincerely appreciate you! You are the reason why we do this! You are the reason why we want to be better! Thank you in advance for your support!

story:
Short Summary

  • I am an Egyptologist with a doctorate in studying the culture of the ancient Egyptians
  • One of the things I enjoy is sharing my passion about ancient Egypt through hands-on activities.
  • An ancient Egyptian magic wand kit will provide the contributor with a wand (with ancient iconography), and an authentic spell and ritual
  • I will provide insight to how magic was understood in ancient Egypt.
  • The kit can be used for educational purposes
  • The kit can also be used for practical purposes (protective or healing).

What We Need & What You Get

My funding goal is $42,000, which is what is needed to create and package 1000 wands and educational resources included in the kit,such as spell and ritual. Any ancient Egyptian magic kit that is not reserved for a backer will be for sale on AncientAccess.com and via retailers such as museum shops and other stores interested in the culture and magic of the ancient Egyptians.

The funding goal of course includes the time, energy, scholarship needed to produce a product based on ancient archaeology for a general audience.

Also included in the goal are funds for making perks, such as t-shirts with the hieroglyphs found, as a tattoo, on the neck of a female healer's mummy.  The tattoo reads: "do good," (colloquially) and it is the logo for this company.  Said logo and company name is also printed on coffee mugs and temporary tattoos.

The Impact

  • In contributing to this project you are promoting the dissemination of ancient Egyptian cultural practices and authentic ancient knowledge.  
  • You will help me create and grow a business where this is the first of many hands-on, educational ancient Egyptian magic kits available at www.AncientAccess.com.
  • You will help provide an ancient option to seekers who have exhausted all available paths in their search for protection and healing.

Risks & Challenges

As with any project there are always possibilities that things will not always go according to plan.  While I certainly do not anticipate anything like this happening, I am quite good at meeting deadlines and fulfilling obligations.  As someone who is very organized and motivated by deadlines, I feel confident in my abilities to deal with any unforeseen circumstances and deliver the Magic Wand Kits by May 31. However, in the unlikely event that changes to the project's timeline occur, I will inform all of the backers and fulfill my orders within a timely manner.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this link if you find the project interesting!

story:
Short Summary

You may know me from teaching at FreeYogaTV, and I have loved being able to share my journey through getting my certifications in Yoga with you all.  After filming over 200 classes, I have started to realize that I want to go deeper into my understanding of the massage and anatomical aspect of mindful movement and somatic practices. 

I came across a wonderful school, IPSB, here in Los Angeles that does a great job of combining martial arts and massage into an integrated healing practice.  They not only allow me the opportunity to complete my 550 hours required to become a certified massage therapist in California, but they also provide training in holistic practices that will seamlessly integrate all of my experience in healing modalities. This seems like a perfect marriage of some of the skills I already have to be able to branch out into this expertise.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I want to create comprehensive courses for our YouTube Channel that allow me to give you a deeper understanding of the anatomy in the body, and how to holistically provide yourself with an integrated healing practice. Through massage we will be able to go deeper than ever before in self-care and mind-body balancing. Only with your help will I be able to garner the knowledge necessary to create these classes for you.


The first module of the certification costs two thousand dollars. So, I want to start there, and share what I learn in my schooling with all of you.  If we raise more; then I will be able to keep going, if we don’t, I will at least have 120hrs of information that I can turn into classes.


As a huge THANK YOU to anyone who contributes toward this certification process; I want to offer downloads of your favorite FreeYogaTV classes, as well as one on one sessions with me.  Over the years, I have specialized in working with people through neurological trauma and injury.  I have worked with MDs, PTs, Massage Therapists, Psychotherapists, Chiropractors, Scientists, PHDs, MFAs, PTSD, trauma victims, post-surgery, directors, producers, high stress, low energy, depressed, happy but confused, and the list goes on, of wonderful people.  I want to provide you with access to all of this experience.  If you would like to learn about my sessions you can find testimonials and more information @ www.stephenbeitler.com

If you can give three bucks I want to give you a huge thank you, and also put your name on a list of donors for our first class inspired by the massage therapy certification.  Just a little way to show my gratitude to this community that makes these videos possible.  It truly takes a village to get these things done, so I love to be able to watch those names go by after a class!

For a five dollar contribution I want to send you some of our meditation mp3s to download from our google drive.  These meditations range from our one minute and three minute guided breath meditations, to a couple of our older and longer visualizations. And, of course we will add your name as a donor.

For nine dollars I want to give you the opportunity to download your favorite FreeYoga class.  Often times we may find ourselves without an internet connection, and this way you  can have at least one FreeYoga class with you wherever you might be.  When our campaign finishes, you will just send me the url with the class you want, and I will email you a google-drive download.

For fifteen dollars I want to chat with you on the phone!  I have been talking with people about their practice for years.  I have it down to a science how to ask you about what you are working on, and what you would like to cultivate.  I will then be able to give you a specific prescription of practices and videos to help you on your way.  If you want to learn more about my sessions and read testimonials you can visit www.stephenbeitler.com    plus, you get the meditations, and your name as a donor.

For a twenty seven dollar contribution I want you to be able to download your favorite FreeYogaTV workshop!  If we find ourselves traveling, or maybe we want to burn a DVD to play the videos on the big screen, having these mp4s available means no more worries about an internet connection.  Plus, no more YouTube ads!  At the end of the campaign you can let me know which workshop you would like (30 days, 7 day warrior, 5 day retreat, Yin yoga) and I will send you a googledrive download. Plus, all the other rewards that came before.

For a fifty four dollar contribution I want to sit with you in a one on one video session.  I have been doing these video sessions for many years, and being able to see you, no matter where you are in the world, and watch your body move; gives me a great window into your practice.  I am able to very quickly give you pointers and advice on how to holistically integrate your movement vocabulary, and somatic understanding, to uncover your subconscious habitual patterning.  Every thought, emotion, and experience is lodged in our bodies, but usually we can't 'see' it.  It takes this outside perspective to give us the birds eye view necessary to uncover these poisonous habits.  To learn more about my sessions you can go to www.stephenbeitler.com     and, of course, you get all the previous rewards.  Which, includes a phone conversation, so we will be able to chat on the phone first to get an idea of where you want to go, and then hit the ground running in our video conferencing.

Our highest contribution is for a full session with me.  I have been doing these one on one sessions for years, and they give us the opportunity to do a complete overhaul of your nervous system.  We are able to pull from all of my experiences, and I am able to give you hands-on adjustments.  I am able to help you to feel all the places in your body that your conscious mind has forgotten about, or that you can't seem to let go of.  We will move through your entire system in ways that we rarely get the opportunity to experience.  You can find out more @ www.stephenbeitler.com  If you don't live close enough to have a session in person you can also trade this in for two video sessions (for a total of 3 sessions, since you get all previous rewards)  or, if you would like to wait until I am a certified massage therapist, you can trade this in for two massage sessions with me.  Any way you would like it, you will also get all previous rewards, so downloads, a phone conversation, and a video session, so that when we meet in person we can take off with full throttle. 

 

The Impact

If you follow me on YouTube, then you know that I always teach from my own experience.  This certification program would open up a whole new area of exploration where we would be able to delve into the therapeutic aspects of touch and self-massage.  We would be able to combine our yoga asana with a myriad of self care practices.  I would be able to expand your understanding of the anatomy and the integration necessary for a healthy nervous system, not just from the Yogic point of view, but also combining the knowledge of a massage therapist.

Growing FreeYogaTV from an idea in my head to the almost 11k subscribers we have now, would not have been possible without all of your support.  I once asked my teacher "Why teach?"  I really didn't want to be a teacher; and he told me that is exactly why I could.  It is only through teaching that we are able to truly know if we understand something completely.  Learning this new modality will give me another ocean of knowledge that I can then distill and pass on to all of you.

 

Risks & Challenges

I am going to put $2,000 of my own money into the first module in order to garner the knowledge that I believe will continue to help our community grow.  If that is all that we are able to afford, then that is all the knowledge I will gain.  But, I believe that with the strength of this community, and the beauty of this wonderful modern world in which we have crowd funding, it just might be possible for this kid from a tiny town in South Carolina who grew up with nothing, to keep reaching for the stars.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • As always; sharing, liking, telling a friend helps so much more than you might realize!
  •  
  • Subscribe to FreeYogaTV on YouTube
  •  
  • Leave a comment or a testimonial on a video
  •  
  • Take three breaths and think about something in your life for which you have gratitude
  •  
  • Smile at a stranger today for no reason at all
  •  
  • Share something on social media that inspires you
  •  
  • Text a loved one right now, just to tell them they are loved
  •  
  • Create something
  •  
  • Appreciate someone else's art
  •  
  • Love
  •  
  • Laugh
  •  
  • Be kind
  •  
  • Be compassionate
  •  
  • Be authentic

Thank you so much for being part of this brilliant community with me.

FreeYogaTV has already grown into an incredible dream, and I am so excited that we keep growing; every day.  One video, one person, one smile at a time. 

May you always love and dream well!

Stephen

www.stephenbeitler.com  &  www.freeyoga.tv

story:
The Dancing Prairie Massage College and Pain Relief Center brings a fresh approach to massage and other health professional education, encouraging students to accept and comfort their own bodies as well as those of their clients and patients. I am driven to establish this center for health and education... 

  • by the Massage Therapy practice I established 16 years ago and have enjoyed every day
  • by clients who want more of what we do together in the world
  • by students who love learning with me and become excellent providers
  • by colleagues who encourage me to believe i have what it takes
  • by my desire to contribute health to the field of health care

See testimony from clients, students and colleagues in a 7 minute video "Introducing Dancing Prairie": https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0cTNJs-C_7I&amp...

Learn more about the Dancing Prairie School http://dancingprairie.com/

Learn more about Dede Dancing, Board Certified, Licensed Massage Therapist: http://dededancing.com/

At Dancing Prairie we will use innovative scientific methods to study our educational outcomes and our successful treatments with a goal of always increasing our body of knowledge as well as our effectiveness. We will share this information with the world.

Dancing Prairie is different from other massage schools in the collegial ways we share information and instruction with the medical community, including the University of Iowa Colleges of Medicine and Dentistry. We are dedicated to creating a healthy, sustainable, joyful environment in which to learn and practice. 

Already, without a place of our own, we have contributed to the education of at least 140 medical students (They have been passing it on, so who knows how many really?). Those who have studied with us, and are now out in the world (your world!) practicing medicine, say: 

  • Our classes changed the way they think about health and comfort.
  • They now sometimes find ways to help their patients establish and maintain their health with harmless therapies instead of prescribing medications that have undesirable side-effects.
  • Our classes also contributed to their own wellness and ability to take care of themselves while caring for others, a huge issue for care providers of all sorts.

See our abstract about the first Massage and Medicine class on the "Research" tab here.

We are looking for Dancing Prairie's perfect home near Iowa City, IA.

Your gifts will:

  • Help with any renovations the building may need to accommodate classes and student clinic
  • Hire an administrator to help establish the credentials and processes Dancing Prairie will need to serve students, staff and clients well from the beginning

Creating a Legacy <3 I am already searching for individuals that will carry on this amazing work. If you want to be part of the endeavor with your talents, skills and passion--Contact me!

Using your money wisely will be important to me. If we fail to raise the $78,000 needed to leap into the full-blown vision I have described here. I will:

  • Pay off the loan I used to buy 11 brand new massage tables, which have allowed us to offer Massage and Medicine classes in the 2016-2017 school year, and which we will continue to offer for years to come. 
  • Continue my fund-raising efforts, search for investors, and educational/research grants until I have the right combination of money and location to begin the school. Your money will remain as part of this endeavor
  • Hire an administrator to facilitate these processes
  • Use some of the money to produce your perks!

After we reach our funding goal you may choose to contribute to a fund supporting:

  • scholarships for students
  • research
  • care for people living through cancer

Perks :) 

  • Dr. Julia Buchkina, MD of Upstream Functional Medicine in Iowa City is offering tickets to her upcoming classes in support of Dancing Prairie
  • 5 (yes, only 5!) packages of 5 classes at the Breathing Room Yoga Studio in Cedar Rapids
  • Massage aprons with the Dancing Prairie logo (you can cook in them too)
  • "No Fear" meditation MP3s
  • Students have requested a "Dancing Swedish Massage" instructional video which I have begun producing
  • Current Dancing Prairie products are for sale here and are offered as perks
  • Clients have requested a "Fat Old Lady Yoga" video...also in the works
  • Your name and/or a phrase of your choosing in an important area of the school or grounds--for instance a stone in the labyrinth, or a butterfly garden, or the sauna, or the meditation space, or the main classroom...
  • An education at Dancing Prairie (or a class/some classes)
  • A weekend retreat
  • and more to come...

Addressing Risks & Challenges

Students at every level of education often struggle with money. At Dancing Prairie we will do our best to provide support every step of the way with:

  • sound financial advice and business education
  • in-house student loans
  • values exploration
  • career counseling
  • excellent preparation for a successful career

For at least the first 2 years Federal Aid will not be available because the accreditation (from the Commission On Massage Therapy Accreditation) that makes Federal assistance possible takes 2 years to accomplish.

We believe these measures together with the beauty of the place and uplifting nature of the health enhancing work we do will ensure Dancing Prairie's success.

I am a life-long learner who has earned a living as an entrepreneur since 1992. I trust my students, colleagues, clients, and Dancing Prairie to teach me what I need to know to make this a successful adventure for all involved.

Some of you will contribute to this project in ways other than money. We value your interest and participation. Please share this campaign with those you think might be interested. Share with us your ideas, your gardening skills, your labor, your voice...

I am driven to establish this center for health and education... 

by the Massage Therapy practice I established 16 years ago and have enjoyed every day
by clients who want more of what we do together in the world
by students who love learning with me and become excellent providers
by colleagues who encourage me to believe i have what it takes
by my desire to contribute health to the field of health care

story:
I am asking for help to improve this existing structure to create an open space for small groups, private appointments, spiritual life coaching classes, bodywork, and meditation circles.  I am a Spiritual Nudist that wishes to change the rape culture to an awakening of RESPECT, HONOR and INTEGRITY.  The naked body has been seen too often as a sexual object.  We use to sell material things and occasionally concepts.  However wish it to be covered in the real world interacting with each other to avoid sexual deviation.  I believe if we teach others that the physical body is a Sacred Fleshy armor that is covering a source connected to a Higher Source and deeper understanding of the Universe, the body will no longer be seen as just a sexual object but also a PRECIOUS, EFFICIENT, ENERGY RECEIVER and ENERGY GIVER.

WHAT WE DO?

According to the Sanskrit Dictionary for Spoken Sanskrit, there are two words we can use instead of saying Nude Yoga. We are practicing Nagna Yoga or Vivastra Yoga. In our practice, we start with an “unmasking ceremony”. In the “Unmasking Ceremony”, we remove our clothing in two parts as in layers to unveil the third mask of ours, (the TRUE SELF). We use the clothing as a symbol of the masks we place on ourselves to function with our responsibilities in the different circles we participate in. This ceremony allows you to go through a transition to alleviate any anxieties one may have to practicing Nagna Yoga. Stripping ourselves from the clothing allows us to uncover the masks so we may discover who we truly are while we recover the divinity inside of us and connectedness to the Universe around us. I also assist in nude personal training.  Perform Spiritual blessing ceremonies and marriages, Assist the mind with spiritual life coaching.  Work knots out of the body with Myofascial release and Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation.  Provide spiritual advise as a Spiritual Intuitive Minister and Tarot Reader/Medium.  

Mission Statement

To enhance the union of the spiritual, emotional and physical plane in a naturalist state using an unmasking ceremony which uses the removal of clothing as a symbol of the removal of the "masks" we place on ourselves to perform our daily duties in society. This yogic practice leaves us to our true form. Each class is taught by a NASM Certified Personal Trainer also listed as a Yoga Alliance Registered Yoga Instructor with a Martial Arts background.

To enhance body image, increase body positivity and remove sexual objectivity of the naked body.

Encourage wellness to the community as a whole.

Looking to create a non sexual welcoming environment for nudist, naturists and anyone else looking for physical, mental and spiritual enlightenment.

Continually provide a space that is open and welcoming to all who seek enlightenment and refuge.

I occasionally write blogs on Wordpress.  To read more about what we believe in and our goals, read our Blog.

nurevealyoga.wordpress.com

story:
Warm home for smooth-haired dogs and cats

Good news: a shelter has been found for homeless animals that cannot live outside in cold weather. We need building materials, a stove-maker, frames, we need to lay the floors.

 

 

The activities of the Society for the Protection of Animals are aimed at comprehensively solving the problems of homeless animals using humane methods:

- Removal of animals from the streets of the city, where complaints from city residents are received.

- Carrying out sanitary and veterinary processing and sterilization operations (female).

- Accommodation of shelter residents through the media and the return of spayed dogs to their former habitat in cases where they are cared for by residents of the houses.

- Operation of an information retrieval center with a database of existing, found and lost animals.

The main goals and objectives of the Society for the Protection of Animals:

- Formation of a responsible attitude towards animals in people, education of moral positions in relation to the sphere of human treatment of other living beings.

- Reducing the number of homeless animals.

- Cooperation with similar domestic and foreign organizations, foundations, movements.

- Organization of shelters for homeless animals, sterilization centers, exhibitions of mongrel cats and dogs, etc.

 

 

Now we have a new goal, a separate building for a warm shelter was purchased for our tails. Winter is coming and for smooth-haired cats and dogs it is certain death. Renovated hangar, albeit large, but unheated. The purchased building is, of course, not in the best condition, but it will already be a stable point for animals.Before winter, we need:

- put the oven- insert the second frames- to lay the floorsand also make metal structures.

 

 

A separate room in this building will be designed for the arrival of doctors from the branch office and from the neighboring city.We really hope for the help of caring people, while we are doing one common cause, not everything is lost in this world!

story:
You Are Making an Exceptional Experience Possible for You and Many Others...

Time with a horse is a soul-soothing experience.  People have profound experiences because horses are powerful emotional mirrors. They show us who we are in a gentle and non-judgmental way. 

This is not about riding or about doing chores! Hugging Horses is about facilitated and gentle touch interventions with the horses on the ground.

We will be initially focusing our subsidy towards programs for tween girls to spend time after school on a regular basis to develop a bond and for people afraid of horses.

1:1 time and walking through the herd

Working with body language, emotions, energetics and movement, the person-horse connection is real-time feedback and we provide support to help a person integrate the experience into his/her life.

Exercises focus on self-esteem, empowerment, leadership, acceptance, safety.

Horses, to be great therapy partners, need to be happy and stress-free themselves. You are helping us expand a paddock paradise track for our horses to live and walk freely around the acres of forest and field, living outside together, as they would in the wild. 

About Dale and Kim
Dale, Kim and their family moved to Muskoka Ontario, to a wild old farm, to create a self-sufficient home and live in nature and fresh air. They were gifted with four horses; a herd picked for its abilities to heal through animal-assisted therapy. 

Dale and Kim are therapists who are learning to live in nature, with their gentle animals. Dale hosts CBC's television show Hello Goodbye.  Our therapeutic listening, the magic of the horses, equine specialist Kelly Jacobsen's knowledge of reading horses, are blended into a facilitated process with the horses, for individuals and small groups. You will have access to these amazing animals and you are helping others have access too!

You are Funding...

You are helping us launch Hugging Horses this Fall of 2017 with:
1 - waived fees for people who do not have benefits

2 - five-acre paddock paradise track and observation trail through forest, Muskoka rock and open field.

3 - people shelter and workshop space to observe, discuss and process interactions with the horses

*All funds raised will go towards these goals, in the order listed.  Kim and Dale will provide the land and labour, plus their own technology to connect you with the horses online, so that you get to know them too!

Will you please share Hugging Horses with your networks - thank you!
