story:
Come Ride The Waves

What if there was an easy button to remove stress, tap into your creative genius, and get you to your ultimate state physically, mentally, and emotionally? 

I'm Marly Fuller, and 20 years ago I began exploring modalities to remove stress, emotional blocks, and physical ailments so that I could enjoy my own experiences fully. Through trial and error, trainings and journeys around the world, I found the easy buttons and they all have something in common: alpha waves. 

Of the five types of brainwaves, neuroscience is proving again and again that alpha waves are the bridge to the subconscious-- a place that contains limitless creativity, imaginative problem solving, and deep relaxation.

During my MBA studies I recognized the value of bringing stress reduction modalities into the workplace. It ignited my curiosity and took me to Rishikesh, India where I was certified as a meditation master, to Eileen McKusick's Biofield tuning training, to getting my Reiki Master's certification, and to exploring the use of sounds, essential oils and breathwork to access the alpha-wave state. 

For years I've dreamed of building a retreat center to host multi-day getaways, workshops, and a meditation sanctuary. Enter 2020 and I've been blessed with the opportunity to open a center in Chesterfield, Virginia to provide a physical space for you to come enjoy a variety of these alpha-wave-inducing modalities and workshops. The space will also serve as my hub for providing remote services, offsite workshops at your place of business, and online course creation. 

 

What is Alpha Wave Adventures?   

Alpha Wave Adventures creates immersive and interactive experiences that transport groups and individuals into transcendental realms of relaxation and exploration. Your Journey is the Destination. Explore the depths of your creativity, become crystal clear in your communications, and go beyond the competitive edge.

Accessing these experiences can be off-putting for some people or seem unattainable. In my own experience, meditation is fun and exhilarating. It is not at all what the majority of people believe it to be- especially with the variety of types that I teach. I'm thrilled to offer a location for you to try some of these techniques. 

The new space is secured at 9510 Ironbridge Road in Chesterfield Virginia, at the 288 and Ironbridge interchange. I'm raising $3,500 in advance for equipment and to create an environment that is ideal for your maximum experience.     

Here is what your investment in pre-launch services will help with: 

  • Meditation room updates (flooring, paint, furniture)= $1,500
  • Retreat room(s) furnishings (massage table, privacy curtains, comfort elements like blankets, warmers, and eye covers)= $1,000
  • Business administration start-up costs like client management tools= $500
  • Branding and Marketing (website, print materials, advertising)= $500 

If my goal of $3,500 is not met, I am still planning to open the center to the public by mid-February 2020. Any investment you make during this campaign is redeemable regardless of the goal being met. Thank you for your support! 

 

You're Helping to Change the World 

Believe it or not, your small contribution is helping to make the world a more positive place. I have always believed at the root of all problems are stress, anger, and negativity. By opening the center, together we will reduce stress one journeyer at a time. 

When we remove stress and tap into those alpha waves, creativity increases dramatically.  Imagine the innovation you and your team will experience when stress is removed from the equation and you float into the place beyond what the mind can think up.  

When I have used these techniques with work teams and individuals, the results have been unreal: 

  • Individuals have
    • Eliminated body pain, migraines, or emotional triggers to become more conscious leaders
    • Experienced clarity, peace of mind, a sense of knowing, complete stress reduction, and creative insights for a variety of personal or work related issues  
  • For the workplace:
    • Creative problem solving that has led to award winning campaigns
    • Improved employee engagement and reduced turnover 
    • Unbreakable team bonds and unforgettable experiences 

 

Are There Any Risks? 

Sure there are. How many yoga shops have you seen pop up and disappear within a matter of months? People are busy and they don't think about taking care of themselves in a way beyond food/water/hygiene.  However, with the proof of neuroscience and the newfound openness to these types of modalities, a center like this begs to manifest. 

My plan is to educate potential Alpha Wave Adventurers about the benefits of experiencing these services. I have 20 years of study and multiple certifications, so my content runs deep! Platforms will include social media, free online training, keynote presentations (watch for dates from places like PRSA, SHRM, AMA, and more!)

Is there a risk for your investment? Nope, not one bit! Your perk can be redeemed at any time, regardless of center opening. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help financially at this time, there are other ways you can help! 

Are you in the Greater Richmond Area and you know people who will swoon for these services? Please share this campaign, follow Alpha Wave Adventures on Instagram, join the Facebook group, and invite your friends to come along as well. 

Interested in bringing some type of meditation into your workplace? Help me connect! Message me through this platform or via alphawaveadventures@gmail.com and let's talk about how we can make that happen. 

If you're not in the area, you can still contribute to the campaign and either redeem a service when you're in town or simply give the gift of helping dreams come true.

Thank you for your unwavering support.

story:
How To Prevent or Reverse Cancer

The OCC #1 Strategy Approach(TM)

Kill Cancer Cells & Heal

 

Proven Strategies Used by Private Clinics in Europe

With Personal Guidance & Coaching Online  or  At Home

All Strategies are Non-Invasive & Can Be Used With Your Current Treatments

 

"Cancer is Preventable and Reversible” 

According to World Leading Scientists, Doctors & Cancer Societies

 

WHY USE US?    BECAUSE WE HAVE "THE SOLUTION"

We Know How To Kill Cancer Cells & HEAL

 

 

OR USE

 The 90 Day Home Solution To Prevent or Reverse Cancer
         

For What's Included in Our KITS See Below

OR USE

 

 

OR USE

 

 

 

Discover the Revolutionary Strategies to Deal with Cancer

 

Apply The OCC #1 Strategy Approach(TM) to Kill Cancer Cells & HEAL. Either ONLINE or at HOME.  A combination of 6 PROVEN & Non-Invasive Strategies. Each one recommended by world leading Doctors or Ph.D.'s to achieve success.

Reverse Common Cancers Within 4 Months

SHRINK TUMORS: The 3 Non-Invasive & FDA Approved Strategies to Potentially Avoid Surgery, Radiation & Chemotherapy or enhance their outcomes Within 60 Days

"Cancer: A New Basic Understanding that changes the way to deal with cancer"

We have spent the majority of our time not on marketing; rather on development and research (as one can only imagine how consuming that must be).  So when we say we can potentially save you years of research to understand how to deal with cancer - we mean it.

I was perhaps one of the several pioneers in developing walk-in medical clinics many years ago.  Today walk-in medical clinics are very common.  We anticipate that our style of online clinics will also become common within 15 to 20 years.  For now we are unique - but our strategies are based upon the years of experience and studies of certain medical professionals.

We truly are here to help and will do our best by you.  I wish you well on your health journey and really hope that we can assist you or your loved ones. 

Our Vision is to revolutionize how we ALL manage or prevent disease and to enhance LONGEVITY."

story:
I'm Clare Jackson, I live in Northern England with my partner and 2 young children. My story began in 1997, I had a very stressful job working with abused children, I was looking for a way to de-stress and began having regular massages and meditating. This was where my interests began in Holistic health as it enabled me to work under extreme pressure.

In 2013 I retrained as a Holistic Massage Therapist and set up my own business called Connective Healing. I offer various therapies such Swedish massage, Deep tissue massage, Indian head massage, Warm Bamboo massage, Reiki and regularly hold a Group Guided Meditation session. Have a look at my website www.connectivehealing.co.uk

I noticed through my work that people had recurrent problems from Painful or irregular menstrual cycle, Fertility challenges, PMS, Pelvic congestion,Tilted or prolapsed uterus, Frequent urination, Headaches/dizziness with periods, Constipation or digestive complaints, Ovarian cysts or fibroids.

It was very soon that I too would experience similar problems as I found out that had an ovarian cyst from which I then entered into Premature Menopause. It was devastating at the time and threw my whole identity up into crisis.

 So this is where my interest in the Arvigo Techniques of Maya Abdominal Therapy® started. They have their roots in Central America and are the collective wisdom of traditional healers and Dr. Rosita Arvigo, this work combines ancient healing with modern anatomical understanding.

I attended a workshop hosted by Steph Magenta in Manchester, it was run by Hilary Lewin called Mining for Diamonds, with reference to the Menopause. It was a life changing moment for me and felt like the wheels were now in motion for me to follow this path. Hilary trained directly with Dr Rosita Arvigo and was instrumental in bringing this work to Europe and facilitated the first training outside the USA. 

The Arvigo® techniques were developed by Dr. Rosita Arvigo, DN. based on her apprenticeship with the Maya healer Don Elijio Panti and her own education, training, and research as a Naprapathic Physician. Rosita's lifework, THE ARVIGO TECHNIQUES OF MAYA ABDOMINAL THERAPY®, help to restore the body to its natural balance by correcting the position of organs that have shifted and restrict the flow of blood, lymph, nerve and chi energy. Today the Arvigo® techniques are employed by Arvigo® Practitioners across the globe bringing the benefits of natural healing to their clients.

Dr. Arvigo learned these techniques from her mentor, Don Elijio Panti, the great Maya Shaman of Belize, Central America with whom she apprenticed for ten years. Don Elijio believed that a woman's center is her uterus. "If a woman's uterus is out of balance, so is she," he would say. Midwives and healers of Central America agree that most female troubles are caused by the wandering womb. Don Elijio passed away in 1996 at the age of 103. Rosita also studied with Hortence Robinson, a traditional midwife and herbalist of Belize who began delivering babies when she was only 13.

The Arvigo Techniques of Maya Abdominal Therapy® address position and health of the pelvic and abdominal organs. The work is best known for the correction of the prolapsed, fallen, or tilted uterus and for the prevention and treatment of benign prostate enlargement in men, and for relief of many common digestive disorders.

I completed my Arvigo® Therapy Self-Care Workshop with Arvigo teacher Amanda Porter and the sheer amount of knowledge and experience that was exchanged furthered my interest still. I knew then I needed to complete the Practitioner's training and be able to offer this therapy at Connective Healing to my clients. 

Through contributing towards my training costs, you will enable me to offer this therapy to clients old and new. Here are the benefits of The Arvigo Techniques of Maya Abdominal Therapy®:

By repositioning the uterus back into place, homeostasis, or the natural balance of the body, is restored in the pelvic area and the surrounding organs. Toxins are flushed and nutrients that help to tone tissue and balance hormones are restored to normal order. This is essential for healthy pregnancy, labor, and delivery.

Old adhesions from invasive treatments to the pelvic and abdominal area, including fibroid tumors, endometriosis, and cesarean delivery are diminished when addressed by uterine massage. In addition, digestion, urinary and bladder problems can be helped.

For men by ensuring a full blood supply to the prostate, the abdominal massage helps to prevent swelling and inflammation. Men report that they can feel a distinct difference in blood flow after a treatment. Not only does the massage relieve prostate swelling, but it helps alleviate varicose veins, premature ejaculation, some impotency problems and the need to urinate frequently.

Individuals with digestive disorders benefit greatly from the techniques. Many of our common disorders such as Irritable Bowel Syndrome, indigestion, constipation, and heartburn are treated with antacids, muscle relaxants, and a variety of other medications. These treatments address symptoms, not the causes. By using The Arvigo Techniques of Maya Abdominal Therapy®, the upper abdomen is also given a deep, thorough massage to loosen the tight muscles around the stomach and the arteries that feed the digestive and eliminative organs with their vital blood supply. The diaphragm is gently massaged allowing relaxation of tight musculature.

I have plans for the future to use my experience of working with young people and to set up a Mother's and Daughter's group around Menstruation and care of the pelvis. 

In terms of funding, the overall costs amount to

  • $300 registration fee,
  • $1750 for training, 
  • £750 accommodation costs.

I would really love to be able to raise half of the overall costs. 

In relation to contribution I can offer a variety of things to thank you for your contribution.

For a contribution of £20-£29-99 you will receive a selection of gorgeous Neal's Yard samples.

For contributions of £30-00 to £49-99 you will receive a free Guided meditation download written by me.

For contributions over £50-00 you will a receive the invitation to a free Group Guided Meditation session to be held at a location and date in my hometown in Northern England.

The impact of The Arvigo Techniques of Maya Abdominal Therapy® is phenomenal to individuals and helps them to take a Holistic approach to their health and involve them in that process. I feel it empowers individuals to bring about tangible health benefits through their own participation.

I worked for 20 years with Children in my past job and always applied myself 100% to my work, I helped develop Lancashire Children's Rights Mentoring and Advocacy scheme now known as The Children's Society in Lancashire.

When I set up Connective Healing  I researched it thoroughly, took business advice, joined a Business Mentoring scheme and applied complete professionalism to my work. This isn't me playing at something I enjoy, it's me offering my skills to people to make lifestyle choices about their health.

I work hard and treat all of my clients individually. I would love to be able to offer the Arvigo Techniques of Maya Abdominal Therapy® as a new therapy at Connective Healing and further an integrated, Connective approach to health.

I understand that not all people will be able to make a financial contribution however you can still help, all I ask is that folks get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.

  • Just please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it, thank you so much for taking the time to listen and help.

Love and best wishes

Clare x
story_txt:

story:
Resumen

Mi nombre es Lorena Venté Castañeda soy Médica Cirujana General, tengo una maestría en Manejo de VIH/SIDA, Doula (acompañante de embarazo), profesora de Yoga prenatal Kundalini y actualmente estoy terminado una especialización en Terapéuticas Alternativas. 

En una ocasión, a mi consulta médica llegó una adolescente y me contó que formaba parte de una fundación en donde había casi 60 chicas gestantes y lactantes con situaciones difíciles de vida, entonces me interesó mucho, pedí los contactos y al siguiente día estaba llamando para solicitarle a la Fundación un espacio para dictarle a las chicas clases de Yoga de forma gratuita, al mes ya estábamos dictándoles clases de Yoga, hablando de amor propio, de sueños y de una crianza con amor a los hijos.

Las clases de Yoga han sido un éxito, las chicas están aprendiendo a manejar el estrés de estar en una fundación sin sus padres o seres queridos, han empezado a sentir sus barrigas, el movimiento de sus hijos y conectarse con la maternidad, algunas han sentido cómo sus músculos y ligamentos dejan de dolerles, estando mucho más felices en el día a día.

Sin embargo el espacio donde hacemos las clases es un salón con piso en baldosa, no contamos con tapetes para que las chicas se acuesten o realicen los ejercicios de Yoga, tampoco tenemos mantas o cojines necesarios para su práctica.

Por esta razón decidimos acudir a ustedes para que nos ayuden con recursos para comprar estas cosas que necesitamos y poder darles la sorpresa de navidad a estas nuevas madres.

 

 Magnitud de lo que logrará la ayuda de los colaboradores.

Con su ayuda podremos continuar acompañando a estas 60 chicas en su embarazo y lactancia de una forma más cómoda y amable para su estado, dándoles herramientas para la construcción de su vida y nueva familia.

 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

A pesar de que son 60 chicas aproximadamente, suelen asistir 40 a las clases de Yoga, mientras las demás están cuidando a los niños, trabajando o haciendo los quehaceres de la casa. Por lo tanto decidimos armar 40 kits para dotar el espacio, contarán con: un tapete de Yoga, un cojín para sentarse y una manta para abrigarse durante la meditación. Según nuestras cotizaciones, cada kit por persona tendrá un valor de $60.000 pesos colombianos  ($20 USD), por lo cual, esperamos recolectar al menos $2’700.000 pesos colombianos ($900 USD) en total, para comprar los 40 Kits y cubrir los impuestos, el fee de la plataforma y gastos bancarios.  

Por tu aporte puedes escoger si deseas o no recompensas, estaremos muy agradecidos contigo

Para ti, ofrecemos algo dependiendo de la cantidad de dinero que aportes:

Menos de $ 60.000 pesos Colombianos ($20 USD): Una foto de una de nuestras clases y una carta de agradecimiento por parte de una de las adolescentes de la Fundación.

De $ 61.000 a 100.000 pesos Colombianos ($21 USD - $ 31 USD): Una clase de Yoga en Bogotá, si vives en otra región del país o mundo, la puedes obtener vía Skype.

$101.000 pesos a $600.000 pesos colombianos ( $33USD - $ 200 USD): Si vives en Bogotá recibirás 2 clases de Yoga, o vía Skype si vives en otra región o país. 

 Más de $600.000 pesos colombianos ($201 USD): 4 clases de Yoga y una consulta de Terapéuticas alternativas si vives en Bogotá, si vives fuera, las tendrás vía Skype.  

Los fondos van a la compra de el Kit de Yoga (tapete, cojín y manta), nuestra idea es poder comprar los 40 Kits, pero se comprarán los que sean posibles con tu colaboración.

 

El impacto

Una maternidad consciente es un proceso que busca traer al mundo a un niño consciente, que ama, respeta, tiene sueños y puede construir una mejor sociedad. En el país hay altos índices de embarazos en adolescentes, lo más delicado de la situación es que muchas madres son menores de 14 años, víctimas de abuso, negligencia, en situación de abandono, pobreza, entre otras.

Estas  madres embarazadas o lactando a sus hijos viven en ésta Fundación, por ser menores de 14 años o por situaciones de abandono, negligencia o abuso.

Nosotros estamos acompañando a estas mujeres de forma gratuita, semanalmente, dándoles una clase de Yoga, trabajamos la respiración, realizamos secuencias de ejercicio para reforzar el  vínculo con sus hijos, el amor propio, el perdón,  la paciencia, fortalecimiento de la región lumbar y del piso pélvico; con meditaciones que incluyen la visualización de sus sueños, metas y espacio para relajaciones.

Consideramos que estamos contribuyendo a que estas nuevas madres mejoren su vida tanto física, mental y espiritualmente, como teniendo un impacto directo con sus hijos.

Para ellas seria un lindo regalo poder contar con los tapetes de Yoga, la cobija y el cojín. Seguro van a poder estar mas cómodas para  recibir las clases.

 

 Riesgos y desafíos

 

El único riesgo que tenemos es no poder reunir todo el dinero que esperamos y no poder en éste momento comprar todos los Kits. Las clases de Yoga continuarán, compraremos los Kits que sean posibles con su ayuda. En caso de no conseguir el monto que esperamos, continuaremos nuestra recolección de dinero en otros lugares, realizaremos eventos y seguiremos trabajando para hacer posible el sueño de darles a estas nuevas mamás su tapete, cojín y manta para sus clases de Yoga.

  

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Entendemos que hay muchas personas en el mundo que quieren ayudarnos de otras formas que no son por medio de dinero. Para nosotros es muy importante que nos ayudes según tus posibilidades: ¡Si tienes tapetes de yoga en buen estado en tu casa te los recibimos!

 

Nos puedes ayudar difundiendo nuestra campaña en redes sociales para que más gente nos pueda ayudar, te lo agradeceríamos.

 

¡¡¡Comparte nuestra campaña!!!

Muchas gracias.

con meditaciones que incluyen la visualización de sus sueños, metas y espacio para relajaciones.Consideramos que estamos contribuyendo a que estas nuevas madres mejoren su vida tanto física, mental y espiritualmente, como teniendo un impacto directo con sus hijos.Para ellas seria un lindo regalo poder contar con los tapetes de Yoga, la cobija y el cojín. Seguro van a poder estar mas cómodas para  recibir las clases.  Riesgos y desafíos El único riesgo que tenemos es no poder reunir todo el dinero que esperamos y no poder en éste momento comprar todos los Kits. Las clases de Yoga continuarán, compraremos los Kits que sean posibles con su ayuda. En caso de no conseguir el monto que esperamos, continuaremos nuestra recolección de dinero en otros lugares, realizaremos eventos y seguiremos trabajando para hacer posible el sueño de darles a estas nuevas mamás su tapete, cojín y manta para sus clases de Yoga.  Otras formas en las que puedes ayudarEntendemos que hay muchas personas en el mundo que quieren ayudarnos de otras formas que no son por medio de dinero. Para nosotros es muy importante que nos ayudes según tus posibilidades: ¡Si tienes tapetes de yoga en buen estado en tu casa te los recibimos! Nos puedes ayudar difundiendo nuestra campaña en redes sociales para que más gente nos pueda ayudar, te lo agradeceríamos. ¡¡¡Comparte nuestra campaña!!!Muchas gracias.

story:
INTRODUCTION

Hi everyone.

Firstly, I cannot write sentences in the right format and read properly because my brain was changed from two Strokes. So, I got help with typing this essay, but it is my words, what is in my heart for a small section of persons who live with these disabilities.

 

THE DREAM

Years ago I wanted to interview different persons on the street, but had no money, no equipment and no confidence. Now I have the same dream, plenty confidence, no money, but want to interview special people who are sick with Strokes and Brain disorders.

We hope to get enough donations to build a little studio if we can, or rent or buy a small space. We want as well, the interviewees to come and be comfortable as they have their session. Also all equipment that is needed for our project, Video cameras, microphone, lights, amps, laptop/desktop, etc. are desperately needed. Some of interviewees will remain at their residences, and knowing this a lot of travel is required and we desire sturdy, professional equipment.

After recording and editing, all videos will be loaded onto our YouTube channel  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpJ7lIspxTQ-QlbeO1f-e3g?disable_polymer=true , to share easily around the world. Asking you to view, comment and subscribe.

Quality is the standard we are striving to have at all time, and want to be recording these episodes, with gadgets that will assure the persons their video will be around for a long time. So we are counting on your kind hearts to be donating to this worthy cause.

 

WHY I WANT TO DO THIS?

After speaking with people at therapy and clinic, numerous persons have great ideas to improve the disable life. They also want to share with others their story and how you can avoid or cope with your sicknesses. 

I chat with persons inside Barbados and overseas about my dream, and they are excited to be a part of this project. They know it is necessary and will support by being a part of this project.

Later, we hope to travel overseas to some of our friends, who desire us to interview them in person.

My only sadness is the attitude met from some people, who don't want to give us a chance to do anything. They do not have patience with our impediments and shun our new personalities. This makes a lot of these person go into deep depression and we want to stop this discriminating.

WE want to be the first people who think about our lives, and state and show what we can do. We want to create a strong community worldwide.

 

TEAM

Being disable, it never stop me from aiming high and getting a team of my family and friends to help give me their time and support, is one way I know I am a productivity person is society. 

At the moment we have seven (7) willing persons who make up the team.

Four (4) with professional knowledge with these equipment and two (2) helpers.

Me the Interviewer. Even though I have a speech impediment, persons ask that I conduct the interviews, they are more comfortable and relax with this.

Other professional persons, will be advising us when needed.

 

CONCLUSION

I am eager to show these things in my country Barbados to, because we do not have these types of shows airing on our television station, and we want to promote the island as well.

 

YOUR KIND HEART

Please help us reach our donations goal and beyond. Get these special persons voices heard loudly all over the world.

So, I got help with typing this essay, but it is my words, what is in my heart for a small section of persons who live with these disabilities. THE DREAMYears ago I wanted to interview different persons on the street, but had no money, no equipment and no confidence. Now I have the same dream, plenty confidence, no money, but want to interview special people who are sick with Strokes and Brain disorders.We hope to get enough donations to build a little studio if we can, or rent or buy a small space. We want as well, the interviewees to come and be comfortable as they have their session. Also all equipment that is needed for our project, Video cameras, microphone, lights, amps, laptop/desktop, etc. are desperately needed. Some of interviewees will remain at their residences, and knowing this a lot of travel is required and we desire sturdy, professional equipment.After recording and editing, all videos will be loaded onto our YouTube channel  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpJ7lIspxTQ-QlbeO1f-e3g?disable_polymer=true , to share easily around the world. Asking you to view, comment and subscribe.Quality is the standard we are striving to have at all time, and want to be recording these episodes, with gadgets that will assure the persons their video will be around for a long time. So we are counting on your kind hearts to be donating to this worthy cause. WHY I WANT TO DO THIS?After speaking with people at therapy and clinic, numerous persons have great ideas to improve the disable life. They also want to share with others their story and how you can avoid or cope with your sicknesses. I chat with persons inside Barbados and overseas about my dream, and they are excited to be a part of this project. They know it is necessary and will support by being a part of this project.Later, we hope to travel overseas to some of our friends, who desire us to interview them in person.My only sadness is the attitude met from some people, who don't want to give us a chance to do anything. They do not have patience with our impediments and shun our new personalities. This makes a lot of these person go into deep depression and we want to stop this discriminating.WE want to be the first people who think about our lives, and state and show what we can do. We want to create a strong community worldwide. TEAMBeing disable, it never stop me from aiming high and getting a team of my family and friends to help give me their time and support, is one way I know I am a productivity person is society. At the moment we have seven (7) willing persons who make up the team.Four (4) with professional knowledge with these equipment and two (2) helpers.Me the Interviewer. Even though I have a speech impediment, persons ask that I conduct the interviews, they are more comfortable and relax with this.Other professional persons, will be advising us when needed. CONCLUSIONI am eager to show these things in my country Barbados to, because we do not have these types of shows airing on our television station, and we want to promote the island as well. YOUR KIND HEARTPlease help us reach our donations goal and beyond. Get these special persons voices heard loudly all over the world.

story:
My sister, Raven Kay Oliver, unfortunately suffered a heart attack
Outbreaks of heart disease are a critical part of patient care, requiring recourse to equipment and drugs, long-term expensive medical bills, and unaffordable and unsustainable treatment. Seeking help, patients unable to work, becoming poor, and seeking help to get better health care are all essential.
Please kindly people, help my sister, I hope to see her happy smile again

Seeking help, patients unable to work, becoming poor, and seeking help to get better health care are all essential.Please kindly people, help my sister, I hope to see her happy smile again

story:
Short Summary

Hello, I'm Dr. Lord, a naturopathic doctor, author and filmmaker, who believes that great health can be restored with the proper intake of minerals, sleep, vitamins, good food, water and lifestyle changes. We own a piece of paradise in Ellenville NY, a 2 hour drive from NYC.

We invite you to make our 'enchanted woods'  your escape to a peaceful paradise away from the noise and rat race of the inner city.

Your donation will help us build a safe haven and retreat center to restore good health to those are suffering with health issues. 

As a thank you for your donation we invite you to come spend a weekend on our property. It will be full of fun, hiking camping, horseback riding if you please and an activity called "Find the Waterfall." Bring your tents and be prepared to enjoy nature like never before. Return home refreshed and inspired and a lot healthier.

Don't you dare keep these great Memorial Day weekend plans to yourself, please share the good news! Invite your friends and family to come share this adventure with you!

story:
Resumen

 

Los colaboradores financian y apoyan un sueño 

Master Mixed Medellin representará a Colombia en el Mundial de Clubes Master de Ultimate en Winnipeg Canadá este verano.  Estamos buscando apoyo para financiar el viaje de nuestro entrenador, ya que el apoyo del gobierno y otras entidades se limita a los permisos de trabajo y estudio para los deportistas y cero apoyo financiero. 

 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 

Los fondos se usarán para pagar:

1. tiquetes Medelllín  WInnipeg del entrenador

2. Hospedaje entre el 27 de julio y el 5 de agosto en Winnipeg del entrenador

3. Alimentación y transporte del entrenador entre el 27 de julio y el 5 de agosto en Winnipeg

  

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 

Si no puedes apoyarnos difunde nuestra  campaña y que genera eco.

GRACIAS!!! JUNTOS ES MEJOR

story: I own Bent Barbell Club in Parkersburg WV when i opened it i thought I could end up just having an expensive gym membership but I started breaking even in 6 weeks. This time its a huge gamble and not as easy. I wanted to grow but I cant in the small building I have so i stumbled upon the perfect building for my new gym.  With so much room i wanted to also include a wrestling ring to train prowrestlers as I have just finished my 16 year career as a wrestler as well.  This is a long shot but thats what I like and it is going to be a massive amount of work both things I enjoy.  This is a huge gamble for me and I just need a little help.  If i have impacted you in a positive way I am finally cashing in on those things.  If you can do even $10 dollars it will add up to the best training facility around.

story: I make this medicine that I took when I had stomach cancer from chewing tobacco before I took the medicine I thought not malnourished and like a nine year old man after I took the medicine I have felt I had more energy and more my age after taking the medicine a couple times my can't just started getting less and less to the point where I had no more cancer. I've also given this medicine to my wife when she was run over by a car she had tumors and brain damage to the point where she couldn't even remember who I was or remember very much of anything when she took my medicine her tumors went away and she's been slowly gaining back her memory as she takes it more for about a year she wasn't able to hold a child past the first trimester then this year in January she gave birth to a beautiful baby she's finally doing much better and know it's because of the medicine the medicine has helped both of us and Extreme Ways what is that everybody said we would never have come past everybody told her she should have died when that happened to her she didn't and medicines she was taking with holy killing her and she's gotten so much better doesn't have to take them anymore and now I can actually eat and do much more activities walking running and much more. My point by saying all this is that we want to put the same medicine that helps us on the market to help people that had the same troubles as we have including much more we want others to have the same possibility as we have had given to us by taking this medicine we know we can help so many people if you would just help us raise some money to help get started.

story:
*Live Your Purpose*

 

 

                                    My name is Dee. I'm 33 years old. I come from Serbia.

I used to live in Dubai for 7 years. I used to be a stewardess, then pilot, then writer, and finally NLP, Life Coach and motivational speaker. My goal is to be Transformational Coach in Dubai, my other home. 

I come from a small town on the south of Serbia. My childhood was quite dramatic and difficult. Because my father was an alcoholic, I experienced severe, long term domestic abuse; psychological and emotional. There were times when I didn't eat and cried for days, had nowhere to run to, couldn't school properly and had daily pannic attacks for two years. 

My parents were never really concerned with what I'll turn out to be, they were busy fighting their own demons. Leaving small town, stepping out of my own home was the happiest moment of my life. I felt I have a shot at peace. Peace of mind, peace of heart.  So there I was, in Belgrade, away from anyone and anything really, all alone. Yet, again. I had to work hard in order to pay my rent, food and school fee. I was afraid. I was alone. My family never gave me a call. But I never gave up, not on me, and, not on them. 

At the age of 26, I hit rock bottom. I had no more stregth left to fight. I had no idea who I was, what do I want and what was it that I was doing in life. College seemed like a way out, but the bills and lonesome life were only way down. That family phone call never happened. And people I called friends, left my side too. I was trying to understand, what was it that I did to deserve all of that. I couldn't peel myself of the floor off of my apartment for weeks, and I kept asking the same quesion over and over again: "WHY THIS PATH?".

I learned later in life that tough times don't last, but tough people do. Struggling to get up, I was in a devasated condition. I simply couldn't get up. And if you are at the same place right now, or you have been there - I know how it feels. It took me a while TO ANSWER THOSE CRUCIAL QUESTIONS. Who was I, and what was it that I wanted out of life. What was my purpose, my passion, my love? I learned then, that only through Ithe power of INTROSPECTION can you really meet and get to know yourself. But those few questions took time, took effort and most importantly WILL to be answered. So, I decided to stick around and fight some more. I desperately needed a hero, so I became one. I made a CHOICE, that MY CIRCUMSTANCES IN LIFE DID NOT DEFINE WHO I WAS. Remember, your circumstances do not define you. You are already enough.

When I realized it was all up to the way I thought, I was thrilled! I was happy! I then shifted my perception and realized that the quality of my thinking decides what states I go through. And that it's on repeat. Like a program. And that I could reprogram my mind the way I see fit, when I see fit. I understood that there are no limits except fpr the ones we make ourselves.

AND FROM THEN ON, EVERYTHING CHANGED! All the hard work, and all the sacrifices paid off! I was getting answers from the deepest wells of my soul. This is was the ultimate turnover in my life. I realized whatever the mind can concieve, it can also achieve. I realized my potential was limitless. I could be whatever I want, I could do whatever I want, I could have whatever I want. 

From then on, I went from being a stewardess in Serbian Airlines, to Emirates Airlines, to a pilot in USA, Florida, to an published children's book author, to a Life and NLP coach and finally motivational speaker. 

It all seemed impossible, until I did it. :)

So now that I found my purpose in life - TO SERVE YOU, to inspire and show YOU  that it's possible, I would like to start funding for DeFacto Motivation and bring the entire project up and running. I am licensed Life and NLP Coach in Dubai by Robert Simic Institute (Dubai), and licensed motivational speaker and coach by one of the best motivational speakers in the world, Mr. Les Brown, in Fort Lauderdale, USA. 

 

Let's do it again.

It's time to be a hero. :)

story:
"We rise by lifting others" 
Robert Ingersoll

 

Important update 3 Feb 2019

Thank you to everyone who has helped to promote, contribute and be a part of this campaign. My original campaign was launched  in October 2018 but had a campaign time limit of 60 days (like all other campaigns). As I wanted this campaign to last for three months, the only way around this was to create the second part of this campaign (all aspects are the same) to allow this campaign to stay alive. You can view the original campaign and all backers at the link above. Ongoing efforts will be saved and highlighted here. Am sorry for the inconvenience but these are the limitations of this platform. All funds will go to Cancer Research Malaysia.

 

Who is Rowena Morais? 

Hi there, I am Rowena Morais. Wife, mom of three and at time of writing, 46 years old. An editor and writer based in Kuala Lumpur, who specialises in learning, communication and content. I run, lift weights and practise taekwondo. Diagnosed with Stage 2 breast cancer in June 2018, I am blown away by how quickly my life has shifted, both for me and those around me.

I am making sense as best I can of what has happened. I believe in taking action, finding my way around a problem and moving forward. The reason I'm sharing what I learn along the way is because I hope that it may be of use to those on similar journeys.

 

What is this charity campaign for?

Let's start with some simple worldwide statistics:

  • 18.1 million new cancer cases and 9.1 million deaths due to cancer in 2018 for both sexes, all ages  according to the International Agency for Research on cancer;
  • 2.1 million new breast cancer cases and 676 thousand deaths due to breast cancer in 2018;
  • Breast cancer is the most common cancer in the overwhelming majority of countries around the world, and 75% of deaths occur in low and middle-income countries.

As you can see, cancer is a problem that's been around for some time now and affects a great many people -  man, woman, old and young.

Infographic   source: The Economist

I am raising money for cancer research so that the vital work that needs to continue into cures, new breakthroughs, experimental drugs and innovative therapies may continue. As I am in Malaysia and getting treatment locally, I would like to direct the funds raised to a local non-profit organisation.

 

Who benefits from this charity campaign?

The beneficiary of this campaign is Cancer Research Malaysia, an independent and non-profit cancer research organisation based in Malaysia which is funded entirely by donations, research grants and the public. Cancer Research Malaysia conducts research into niche cancers often found in the Asian population.

 

What will you help achieve?

Your contribution, financial or otherwise, will help direct even more awareness, continued education and research into cancer as a whole.

We need to press for continued vigilance in how we actively manage our health because this is something we need to take charge of.

 

What are the goals of Cancer Research Malaysia?

  • Improving the survival rates of Asian cancer patients, focusing on neglected areas of research;
  • Empowering Asians to have the proper screening and treatment;
  • Improving survival rates by being more accessible, focusing on providing existing cures to patients rather than sit on inaction and potentially losing lives;
  • Making affordable and timely treatments by repurposing drugs, acknowledging the reality that developing new cures are costly and risky;
  • Putting Malaysia in the global spotlight for cancer research by collaborating with top scientists around the world, and working to nurture the next generation of Malaysian cancer researchers.

 

Why am I doing this and why does this matter?

I want to take positive, proactive action to deal with cancer that goes beyond my individual experience. I'm hoping that the work I do to shine a light on this and the collective effort of many through donations, social media and discussion, will help drive a greater good that can only be achieved by a collective spirit and not just the one individual.

This makes it wider than the one experience.  This helps me feel like I am contributing to something bigger than myself, and ultimately, it will make a difference and be impactful to many others.

This matters because this is not just my story – it is the story of literally millions of people around the world, people like you and me and their families. This matters because we all can take action to make a difference, in whatever capacity we wish.

It matters because this is both personal and universal.

 

What do I need from you?

If my story resonates, I urge you to make a donation of any amount towards this cause. Give as you can, give what you will.

I also urge you to spread the word through social media or any other means because you can and the work you do will make a difference.

 

How much?

A special note to say any amount will do.

While I appreciate the unstinting generosity of the backers who have contributed in the early stages of this campaign, I want to stress that every single dollar counts. So feel free to donate even USD1, USD5 or USD10 or any amount you feel comfortable and able to give. What matters is your involvement, contribution and amplification of this message to help carry this campaign through.

 

What do you get from this?

An opportunity to be part of something bigger than yourself and which will have tremendous meaning to those impacted by this disease.

 

How long is this campaign?

6 months from October 2018 – March 2019.

 

On the perk  

For those who would like to take me up on my offer of the 30 min skype call, feel free to reach out via email so we can lock in a date/time that suits both. You can email me at hello AT rowenamorais.com.

 

All the ways you can help

Donate money | Amplify this message

 

Risks & Challenges

The risks and obstacles I face in working to achieve this goal are the following:

1. I can't do this alone - I am counting on the growing network I have to raise awareness and money.
2. There are many worthy causes out there that justify equal or more weight. Mine is just one more.
3. I am currently undergoing chemotherapy treatment myself which means I have to manage my health alongside my work and this campaign.

That said, I intend to support this campaign through advocacy, education and awareness. I hope you will join me. 

 

“What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.”
- Jane Goodall

Less fortunate father, Pedro Escol, 75, from the Philippines needs to be admitted at the hospital. He is suffering from prostate and CT scan results showed a cancerous mass growing in his throat and he's in pain. 

Unfortunately, a private hospital In Malaybalay City won't admit my ill father at their ICU without depositing at least $500. But in fairness to them, they also took care of my father only that he won't be provided a ventilator machine, so we are forced to use traditional way of just pumping which is very tiring and needs a lot of people.

We are very poor and at this moment we find it very hard to have the money for his downpayment. Now, I realized it's really hard if you are poor and the hospital won't admit you or your family members just because you don't have money for downpayment.

I don't know what to do if i would let him just die or I still find my chance to look for money.

I am begging to the good samaritans of the world to please help by sharing some of your blessings. God will reciprocate your kindness.

I was prompted to this fundraiser campaign hoping that there are still good samaritans who can share a few bucks to help my father from his medical needs. I just feel that there is nothing to be ashamed of, if it would mean saving my father.

I'm sure I feel better if my fellow brothers of the world would show concern and would be willing to share their blessings to less fortunate human beings.

I am only looking for small donations to help finance the medical expenses of my father.

 

Thanks,
Sincerely,
Joel

But in fairness to them, they also took care of my father only that he won't be provided a ventilator machine, so we are forced to use traditional way of just pumping which is very tiring and needs a lot of people.We are very poor and at this moment we find it very hard to have the money for his downpayment. story:
After what seemed like a lifetime of carrying feelings of fear of being judged, shame and rage, I finally realised through my own healing journey, that there is nothing more liberating and rewarding than breaking the silence. On the 23rd September 1998, my husband and I were hijacked and I was raped. This entire experience had changed my life completely and as I reflect on it now it changed it in the most positive ways. My story which I share with you will walk you through the experience that night and the healing I knew I had to do to move from feelings of despair, darkness, and hopelessness to forgiveness, self-love and hope. This journey has made me realise that there are so many other women who are grappling with similar challenges and that it is important for me to share the tools and processes that I used. I have therefore, developed a workbook which is the beginning of a series of workbooks that I will be working on. We launched the women’s program (The Power of Self Love) in December 2018, over 3 days. The ladies were taken through a workshop based on the workbook and it was decided that we needed to share this wisdom and healing with younger women. Based on this decision we have organised the workshop for 20 young ladies which we require funding for.

For my full story and more information about the women’s program, please visit my website @ www.cosmichaven.co.za

For my full story and more information about the women’s program, please visit my website @ www.cosmichaven.co.za

story:
I have designed a wellness transformation program to help people who struggle with weight, stress and self-confidence. This is not a diet, it is an integrated wellness program that is designed to help people get into shape, feel great and find a lifestyle approach that will suit them and help bring them balance and self-acceptance. All on their own terms.

My goal is to help people become their ultimate selves. The aim is to help people get into shape and increase their levels of self confidence. What is great about this program is that it will break all the typical rules associated with weight loss and getting into shape. 

You can still eat food that you love and find do exercise that you actually enjoy. There is a healthy alternative for every craving. Good food can still be indulgent and taste unhealthy. I can teach you how. This program is more about figuring out what works for you.

If you are unhappy with your body, then this program is for you. This is not a diet, it is a wellness program that will help you become your healthiest self while making you aware of the things that have lead to failure in the past. Most importantly, this program is designed to make you feel good and feel even better about yourself.

Individuals who purchase the program will also gain access to an online platform where they can get regular updates, self care ideas, recipes, yoga sequences, natural beauty news and tips and support. They will also have access to online yoga classes and workouts (which is why I included my yoga teacher training in the budget).

I have a vision and I have a plan. I have a good team in place that will help me make this project a reality, but what I don't have is funding. I need around  $10 000 to make this dream a reality and to do it the way I had envisioned.

The funds will be broken up as follows:

$2000 for the website and design. This will include:

- The website design

- The eBook design

- info-graphics

- Posters

$500 for a copy editor to edit my eBook.

$2000 to do my yoga teacher training.

$1000 for ingredients and decor for the photoshoot as well as location hire.

$1000 to do a photo shoot for my eBook and website content. This includes

- A food photo shoot and editing

- A yoga photo shoot and editing

- A beauty shoot and editing 

$1500 to buy a professional camera and set up a photo studio. 

$2000 so I can set up a home yoga studio and office to run online classes.

If I cannot raise all of the funding, then for now I will use all of the money raised to just complete the ebook and Website and then I will hold off on doing my yoga teacher training and setting up a home studio until I have saved enough money to complete that as I am determined to start teaching online eventually. 

Any donation, no matter how small will help tremendously. If you are unable to contribute, I ask that you please help me spread awareness about my campaign by sharing it on your social media. 

 

Thank you kindly.

story:
How did we come up with Plan-Hangover?

If drinking alcohol is in in your lifestyle, hangovers are something that never go away, and in most cases get worse the older you get. As founders of Plan-Hangover, we are by no means alcoholics, but we like to socially drink with friends. Yet every morning after, we dealt with the same issue. 

There are tons of home remedies but no reliable brand in the marketplace that people can have as an easy go-to. 

New brands keep entering the market and although they boast the ability to fight hangovers, they often don't do the job. The products we saw available were either a multivitamin with outrageous doses or a product packed with unnecessary chemicals that are known to be unhealthy. 

Plan-Hangover was conceived in the way that Plan-B is known: a morning after pill to allow you to continue your life without a hitch. It is a simple idea yet there were no solutions available. So we took matters into our own hands and set up a research team who had extensive knowledge of supplements, minerals, herbs, and extracts to create our formula. 

Plan-Hangover isn't just a supplement to give you energy or remove headaches. It's a supplement designed to combat both short-term and long-term effects of alcohol on the entire body. 

What We Need & What You Get

We set our funding goal to an exact amount of $46550 that we need to fully launch the product. This is the cost for full manufacturing and distribution, because there are large minimum manufacturing requirements. This campaign is designed much like a preorder so we can afford to manufacture and fully launch Plan-Hangover. 

Even if we reach our goal, all of the marketing and testing costs paid by our founders will still technically be losses. However, we know this product will be a success, and we need help funding the initial manufacturing costs!

Our perks are pretty simple. No t-shirts or gimmicks, just the product! While we do have the option for a virtual hi-five and support your decision to contribute in that way, we urge you to order the product itself and see the results first hand!

A Product with Purpose

In addition to growing our brand, we do have a social responsibility to give back through various charitable initiatives. There are tons of great non-profits and programs that aim to educate people about the danger of using alcohol irresponsibly. With our belief in our supplement to combat hangovers, a vital part will be helping others to drink responsibly and help those who don't have a safety net. 

We pledge an absolute minimum of 5% of profits to be donated to charities that fit our vision. We will publish both the charities and the dollar amounts donated!

The Product

Plan-Hangover comes in a 10-capsule sleeve that is as easy to use and as discreet as a pack of gum. 

We recommend taking one capsule with a full glass of water before bed after consuming alcohol, and one capsule with a glass of water in the morning. If you forget to take it before bed, we recommend taking both capsules in the morning with a full glass of water to make sure to get the full dose of vitamins, minerals, herbs, and extracts that make our product so useful. 

Through our tests, the steps of using Plan-Hangover will alleviate hangover symptoms and reduce alcohol's negative effect on the body.  

Now of course the most important part...

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, we appreciate you reading this far. Please know that you can always spread the word to your network or use the Indiegogo share tools to help us reach our goal!

 

FAQ's

Are the capsules vegan and gluten free?

Yes, our capsules are made from vegetable materials opposed to the commonly used gelatin capsules. All ingredients including the capsule are gluten free. 

When will they be shipped?

The main point of our campaign on Indiegogo is to understand demand and raise capital to assist in our first major manufacturing run. We plan to begin the 4-week manufacturing process early December while the campaign is still running. So they should be completed and shipped to your door by the second week in January. We will make sure to keep everyone that places an order updated!

Why are your products better than others on the market?

There are various factors:

Many other products come as a shot, drink, or powder that cost $5-10 per serving, which is crazy expensive to us and anyone we've talked to. 

Other products have tons of unnatural ingredients used to add color, flavor, and effects of a "hangover cure". We strived to create a not only a great product, but a great company with core values. 

Finally, Plan-Hangover a is a supplement that comes in a box the size of a pack of gum, so it is incredibly convenient in addition to its effect on hangovers.

Other products have caffeine, why don't yours?

Caffeine dehydrates you. Since major hangover symptoms are a result of dehydration, we don't add something that will counteract our mission! That's why our ingredients aim to keep you alert and boost energy without caffeine (we love coffee, so if you're like us just wait a few hours into the day so Plan-Hangover can bring your body back to it's normal feeling). 

Have your products been tested?

Of course! We have had multiple blind testing groups sample our product both alone and against home remedies and other "hangover cure" products on the market after a night of consuming alcohol. We have completed everything up to large scale manufacturing, which is why we're here!

I am interested in purchasing a wholesale order or a larger bulk than offered on Indiegogo, is that possible?

Absolutely, please send any inquires regarding this to contact@planhangover.com.

 

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I am a mother of 5 children, I have struggled with depression and started this buisness with the hope of providing a place for mental health sufferers to access for support and to heal together as a community. This campaign will help fund and support Word Therapy which is a business that aims to bring mental health to the forefront of the world, and very importantly keep it there through our products. This will create a long term change which is required.

Our goal is to grow as big as the recent Me too movement. If there was a campaign like this available when I was still suffering with depression I am sure that it would have helped towards my recovery.

By supporting this campaign you will be helping to highlight mental health issues and could even be helping your family, friends or colleagues as you never know who is struggling with hidden mental health issuses.  Please spread the word this may help people to open up.

 

What We Need & What You Get

£10,000 For business start Up:

Things that I will purchase to grow this business.

The amount of money that I hope to raise is £10,000. The amount raised will go towards the following purpose; a computer and desk as the computer I currently use is old and I  have to share it with my children as they need it to complete schoolwork., the total amount that will be spent on this is £2500. I will also purchase the necessary designing software for creating the graphics on the T-shirt.

A business banner £250 which will be used for company advertisement in the backgroung of my videos.

£2100 for marketing and market research.

£2300 for content editing and to pay a counsellor to join me in making various videos to provide general advice about mental health and how people can help overcome it.

£1500 for a professional camera that can produce good quality videos and pictures for social media purposes.

£1350 for purchasing product samples for quality checks and topic discussion.

Our perks are special, limited edition T-shirts that were designed just for this campaign. They can be worn of kept as 2020 memorabilia or to remind yourself that you have taken part in the making of this movement which I hope will make a great impact on the world. If I do not reach my goal the money will go towards purchasing samples for quality check and topic discussion and buying an appropriate camera and computer.

The Impact

Mental health illness is common and one of the least recognised or prioritised. It is an unseen illness for most of the times unless the affected person becomes violent or emotionally and physically distressed. 

 

There is also a massive stigma behind depression. This is preventing a lot of people from getting relevant help, and some people sadly take their own lives. There are many that desire to get help if only they could afford it.

 

This business is more than just a brand, our main goal is to highlight depression and to destroy its stigma surrounding it.

Many people take their own lives or become emotionally paralyzed because of stress and the state of their mental health. Due to Coronavirus, this has become worse. If we all bring it to the forefront, we can change the situation. I need all the help I can for this to be possible.

 

I was a person who has suffered depression myself so I have decided to take action.

I am setting up a part charitable company that creates products with positive and inspirational quotes. 

2. We aim to create YouTube videos explaining the wording choice that has been used and how they can help for inspiration to others,

3. I am hoping to employ a qualified councillor to elaborate on the wording choices, and importantly give general and vital information about mental health illnesses and how people can get help or help themselves. Then the plan is to have this as a long term business structure.

4. A dedicated channel for people to go to for free motivation and inspiration or other help.

5. A Facebook channel where people can wear their shirt do a short video of support and posting it for others that are mental health illness suffers to visit and be inspired, knowing that people all over the world care. 

6. 10% of profit I will donate to a mental health charity of our choice and charity that helps unfortunate children.

Risks & Challenges

You may be wondering what risks we may face: 
The risks I face is not getting enough publicity and support as I don't have massive social following because I have only recently set up various social media platforms.
I will overcome this by creating regular content and learning as much as I can about the various platforms of my choice.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't financially contribute you still can help significantly by doing one or all of the following: Use IndieGoGo sharing tools, like and subscribe to my social media platforms and hit the notification bell to stay tuned for new videos and content. Share my spoken poem that was written by me to provide help to mental health sufferers and people in general, as it explain a bit about depression and some common chonel into a person life. The more we now about the topic, the more we can help ourselves or help others.

If you have struggled with mental health issues and want to share your story with others feel free to join or Facebook group and share.

story:
¿De qué trata?
Les platicamos un poco de su problema, hace algunos meses fue diagnosticado con Síndrome de Crohn esta enfermedad le ha traído consecuencias de mediano grado en cuanto síntomas en su día día, impidiéndole en ocasiones hacer su vida normal (Trabajo, ejercicio, inclusive al salir a caminar simplemente)

Conoce un poco más a cerca del Síndrome de Crohn. 

La enfermedad de Crohn pertenece a un grupo de afecciones conocidas como enfermedad inflamatoria intestinal (EII). La enfermedad de Crohn es una afección crónica inflamatoria del tracto gastrointestinal. Los síntomas incluyen dolor abdominal con cólico, náuseas, fiebre, pérdida de apetito, pérdida de peso y fatiga, y a veces hasta sangrado.

Este Síndrome se caracteriza por no tener los mismos síntomas todo el tiempo. A veces no se tiene ningún síntoma. Cuando no se tiene ningún síntoma, a esto se le llama remisión.
La gran ventaja es que ha sido diagnosticado a tiempo ya que anteriormente los doctores solamente le recetaban medicamentos para una simple gastritis haciendo que él ya no sea tolerante a ninguno de esos medicamentos; este síndrome detectado a tiempo evita que progresen los malestares y desencadene en algo más grave (Cancér a nivel gastrointestinal) 

Aproximadamente 1.4 millones de la población sufren hechos rápidos de la enfermedad de Crohn. Ese número está dividido en partes casi iguales entre las dos enfermedades.

Con tu ayuda el tomará un tratamiento natural a base de medicina alternativa para atacar cada síntoma de manera gradual. 

¡Apoyalo! #JuntosXJimmySandoval 

Fuente: Crohn´s Foundation

¿Cómo va a utilizar el dinero?
El dinero será utilizado para tomar el tratamiento adecuado para cada síntoma y vaya aminorando de manera gradual lo que lo ocasiona.

Acerca del Colaborador/es
Somos amigos y familiares que estamos luchando en contra de este Síndrome y lograremos que cada vez más gente detecte este tipo enfermedades de manera temprana. 

¡Tu también puedes ser colaborador corre la voz!

¿Cómo y cuando se entregaran los reconocimientos?
Las playeras, gorras y productos serán entregados una vez finalizada la campaña.

Contactar al Beneficiado
Contacta a Jaime Sandoval aqui:

www.facebook.com/jamespuntomx

story:
Operation: Help

Hi, I am Luis. I am a physician and specialist in general surgery. During my practice, I met some fantastic humans that need treatment for their diseases, but they sadly they can't afford it. I had helped some of them in the past with my resources, but this time they need more expensive surgeries. That's why I work together with my colleague Doctor Arturo. He is a surgeon, too and we both want to help these people because they came to us for help. But we realized we need more people to spread the voice if we are willing to impact more lives.

 

In the past, we both began "Operation Help" with the primary purpose to give surgery for hernia repair. We want them to be operated by professionals, with high-quality materials, and in an excellent hospital (they deserve it, even if they can't afford it). 

 

These people are daughters, mothers, fathers, and a lot of them work on their own to support their families. The hernia they have causes pain to them and interfere with their work. That's why it is important what we want to do. That's why your help is essential. 

 

How can you help these nine people?

 

To give them a proper treatment we need US$11,000. With that money we can provide:

-Hospitalization

-Well equipped operating rooms

-Care by professionals (anesthesiologist, surgeons, nurses, internal medicine specialists, ¡etc)

-Laboratory test before surgery

-Medical evaluation before and after surgery

-Antibiotics and other medications 

-Food for their families (it is normal in our culture that one family member stays beside the patient). 

 

The funds are expected to cover all the cost of the treatment, so they don't n have to pay for anything. In change, they will be much thankful to you because of your help. They will continue to protect their own families. 

 

The impact

 

These people are Guatemalan, workers (informal sector), students, sons, daughters, fathers, and mothers. All of them are invaluable to their families. The hernia causes pain to them. It interferes with their normal activities and their works. With your help, you give them freedom. You are giving to them the freedom they need to move, freedom of pain to support their families and their communities. 

 

Why we?

 

Like surgeons, Arturo and I know the pain they are dealing with these health problems. Also, we had evaluated them (with no cost) to be sure that they have a hernia and the surgery is the best treatment for them. We had designed this project that they will not pay anything because we met the providers of surgical materials, we know the disease and, the most important, we know these good people who need help. 

 

How can you be part of this project?

 

Your support is invaluable. Any help that you can give is essential. Your monetary donation allows us to accomplish this dream for these amazing people. But your support in social networks, chats and your community to share in order we can reach the goal all together will be very valuable.
story_txt:
Operation: Help
Hi, I am Luis. I am a physician and specialist in general surgery. During my practice, I met some fantastic humans that need treatment for their diseases, but they sadly they can't afford it. I had helped some of them in the past with my resources, but this time they need more expensive surgeries. That's why I work together with my colleague Doctor Arturo. He is a surgeon, too and we both want to help these people because they came to us for help. But we realized we need more people to spread the voice if we are willing to impact more lives.
 
In the past, we both began "Operation Help" with the primary purpose to give surgery for hernia repair. We want them to be operated by professionals, with high-quality materials, and in an excellent hospital (they deserve it, even if they can't afford it). 
 
These people are daughters, mothers, fathers, and a lot of them work on their own to support their families. The hernia they have causes pain to them and interfere with their work. That's why it is important what we want to do. That's why your help is essential. 
 
How can you help these nine people?
 
To give them a proper treatment we need US$11,000. With that money we can provide:
-Hospitalization
-Well equipped operating rooms
-Care by professionals (anesthesiologist, surgeons, nurses, internal medicine specialists, ¡etc)
-Laboratory test before surgery
-Medical evaluation before and after surgery
-Antibiotics and other medications 
-Food for their families (it is normal in our culture that one family member stays beside the patient). 
 
The funds are expected to cover all the cost of the treatment, so they don't n have to pay for anything. In change, they will be much thankful to you because of your help. They will continue to protect their own families. 
 
The impact
 
These people are Guatemalan, workers (informal sector), students, sons, daughters, fathers, and mothers. All of them are invaluable to their families. The hernia causes pain to them. It interferes with their normal activities and their works. With your help, you give them freedom. You are giving to them the freedom they need to move, freedom of pain to support their families and their communities. 
 
Why we?
 
Like surgeons, Arturo and I know the pain they are dealing with these health problems. Also, we had evaluated them (with no cost) to be sure that they have a hernia and the surgery is the best treatment for them. We had designed this project that they will not pay anything because we met the providers of surgical materials, we know the disease and, the most important, we know these good people who need help. 
 
How can you be part of this project?
 
Your support is invaluable. Any help that you can give is essential. Your monetary donation allows us to accomplish this dream for these amazing people. But your support in social networks, chats and your community to share in order we can reach the goal all together will be very valuable.

story:
SafeZoneUV is here to stop germs at the door.

 

Introducing the SafeZoneUV

Automatic door handle sanitizer

(Estimated shipping date of March 2021)

Powerful UV light kills 99% of the bacteria and viruses and turns on using light sensors after holding the door knob.

 

 

Ultraviolet (UV) light is lethal to bacteria and viruses, acting like silver bullets to these tiny monsters.

Why? UV light scrambles the DNA deep within microbes like bacteria, killing them almost instantly. It’s quick. It’s easy. It’s clean.

Door knobs are breeding grounds for bacteria waiting to transfer from each person that comes in and out. SafeZoneUV is the first real solution to stop germs at the door.

 

 

The system works on timed disinfecting intervals of a few seconds, all initiated by someone grabbing the handle and then letting go to enter or leave.  

  Example:  Individual approaches door, grabs hold of the handle with the SafeZoneUV attached, open door and walk-in.  When your hand leaves the handle, a disinfecting light comes on for three seconds as the door closes, and before it closes completely, it is disinfected and ready for the next person. 

 

(We also have a version for flat pull handles as well!)

 

Introducing the SafeZoneUV

hands free door opener

(for ANY rotating door handle)

(Estimated shipping date of November 2020)

 

 

 

The SafeZoneUV hands free foot door opener completely changes the game when it comes to accessibility, allowing doors to be opened without having to touch anything in the first place. It attaches to the door using either the supplied 2 sided adhesive strip, or can be directly bolted to the door using supplied mounting hardware. Keep things safe and clean without ever having to worry about contact in the first place.

 

 

Great for workplaces where your hands may be occupied lifting or moving things so you can open doors with your feet, great for hotels and condos and places with high amounts of foot traffic where constant sanitizing and cleaning can be cumbersome and invasive! Don't forget the family, its perfect for homes, garages, or for extended family like grandparents or grandkids in places like condos and apartments where there may be many doors and other people between the main entrance and their actual home.

 

 

We are already in talks with our local university, hospitals, and hotels to install these products in areas with large amount of foot traffic, as it gives relief to the staff who are required to sanitize all the door handles in their facilities, organizations can see savings on labor costs and an eased workload on employees responsible for sanitizing their buildings.

 


  

Non-contact accessibility device

We also produced a simple yet effective non-contact device for pulling open doors, lifting small bags, pressing buttons, and other tasks which normally requires hands to use, this device come on a retractable lanyard for ease of use.

(Shipping November 2020)

 

 

Products in Development

 

 

We have multiple designs for different styles of doors already designed and prototyped with components installed in them.

We are working on a variety of designs using UV-C light sources to disinfect high traffic areas with a permanently fixed light source to work with each use of the handle or railings in facilities and transportation.

 

 

We looked at safety issues.  Elderly needs are paramount.  Strength to hold onto existing railings will be severe enough for some; adding bulk will not help, but offering a disinfecting light source to help guide is a benefit.  The majority of seniors will also take the bus.  So we are developing a disinfecting system for transit.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

 

The SafeZoneUV non-contact foot door opener has already had its design finalized, manufacturing locked in, and a few full working units have been manufactured and installed in facilities for testing. All manufacturing is being done locally so there are no worries of overseas issues and logistics. We foresee no issues with this product reaching customers.

 

The SafeZoneUV Automatic Door Handle Sanitizer is only waiting on the circuit board design (being done locally) and batteries. We live in a city with a high focus on manufacturing and are able to have our circuit boards produced locally. While we cannot foresee issues with manufacturing of the circuit boards, the fact that all manufacturing is being done locally means communication and logistics are very simple and streamlined, and issues that do arise should be able to be handled quickly and efficiently.
