This results in alternating the blood from flowing to the internal organs and extremities, which help reduce swelling, inflammation, enhance your sleep, improve circulation, relieve depression and provide an overall sense of wellbeing. There is also some exciting evidence coming out about the positive effects on the nervous system, contrast therapy reduces cortisol and resets the central nervous system, placing our over taxed fight and flight response back to the rest and digest mode to allow for immune system building and reduction of stress hormones in the brain not to mention better digestion tract function. 
How the circuit works
Step 1 :

Reception the Five Elements and Water Bar 
The space invites you in with expansive northern light exposure, the sound of a trickling brook, living moss walls, wood interiors, a live fireplace, an overstuffed rich emerald hued sofa, a movement space, and our single sourced water bar. 
Check in and receive your bathrobe and instructions on how to best utilize your time for the contrast water therapy circuit. Enjoy the living moss walls, fire place and resting lounge with  a complimentary glass of Masaru Emoto water, while taking your first few breaths, allowing the elements of nature to begin to let your shoulders release. 
Water Bar

What is a water bar? We are made up of 70% water, 80% when we are born and by the time we reach 70 it drops to around 60%, never the less we are mostly water this is the main point. Water is our life force, without it we cease to exist, with high quality water we increase this life force. This is called our chi (chee) the life force which sustains us. Water is not all treated equally, it has become a source of great study, the effect of water on the body depending on it's mineral and dissolved solids make up. Water from a glacier, and water from a mountain spring contain very different properties, different trace metals, minerals and acidity levels. We have taken water and what it can do for you to a scientific level at our water bar consulting with a water sommelier, yes a water sommelier,  we have curated a menu of waters from far and wide across the globe to address deficiencies and work optimally to increase your life force.
 Dr. Masaru Emoto was one of the first individuals to conduct a scientific experiment on the power of positive words versus negative criticism or bullying words on glasses of water over time. He wrote a book and published these studies called, The Hidden Messages in Water. Dr. Emoto's study took bottles of water and taped pieces of paper with words of praise on some and words of criticism on others and taped the words facing the inside of the bottle. These bottles were frozen and the crystallization of the water in each of the bottles repeatedly formed beautiful symmetric crystals in the positive intention bottles and disorganized "ugly" crystals in the bottles written with criticism and mean words. The intentions we have and the words we use hold power to change how an individual looks and feels and Dr. Emoto's experiments are the physical manifestation of this. At the water bar we will offer complimentary Emoto water imbued with various intentions for each month, filled with reverse osmosis water, messages inscribed on the surface of the glass jars and amethyst crystals.
Contrast Therapy Water Circuit
1.  Japanese  seated rain shower, first things first, get clean before soaking, then you can use later as a cold rain to aliven brain synapses after your long hot soak.

2. Soak in our imported Hinoki Cedar tub built for two, melt away tension. 

3. Cold Plunge Cedar Tub, lower down into our 52 degree 4 foot cold plunge barrel for up to  3 minute intervals..

4. Explore movement and dry heat in the Finnish dry sauna, with ambient scent of wood.

5. Aid digestion and muscle recovery on our Ganbanyoku traditional heated stone beds

Repeating this circuit for the two hour period in increasing time intervals will heal the body of inflammatory issues and mental and energetic balancing will naturally occur. 
 
Before or After choose from a treatment or individualized practice:
Movement Space

There are many ways to heal, to restore, to rejuvenate, movement is one such way. Explore various individualized  movement and contemplative modalities in the movement space. 
Highly certified and world renowned teachers share modalities of:
contemplative practices of meditation, mindfulness, journaling, health coaching,  physical practices of  tai chi, qi gong, vinyasa yoga, Budokon, yin yoga, ashtanga,  EFT  organic body flow and  energetic practices of reiki, negative energy clearing, chakra balancing, crystal bowl sound therapy and light body healing. These are not large group  classes but rather individualized practices with a common goal of exploring movement, contemplative practices and energetic modalities  appropriate to your specific physical, emotional and mental needs. Physical practices to be effective are not a one size fits all, our teachers are healers working with all aspects of the body from the physical to the spiritual in the above mentioned modalities. 
 

 
 
Thai Bodywork
 
“It feels like I can breathe again, like there is more space in my body”
What is Thai bodywork? It's not a traditional massage but meridian energy work and physical manipulation of the body to create space and freedom of movement. It is a healing technique that was practiced before doctors. The manipulation involves deep massage and stretching and it happens on the floor on a firm mattress or a mat fully clothed. It is a therapeutic procedure that provides relaxation and restores healthy blood circulation. It also treats energy blockages, weak, dysfunctional organs, aches and pains, stress and tension, flexibility, paralysis, nerve problems and postural alignments. Thai bodywork differs from traditional massage by its use of body's energy line system, known as Sen lines. There is a basic theory that there are seventy-two thousand Sen lines that are also called energy lines that line the frame of the physical body. The sen lines corresponds with the Chinese acupuncture medications and the ancient medicine practice from Indian Ayurvedic. A session typically lasts an hour or maybe more and the massage works to stretch the entire body. The massage may include the pulling of toes, fingers and ears. Thai Massage is ideal for everyone as the sessions are customized for each individual with their body type and age.
 
 
 
What I need :
I am looking to raise $80,000 towards a build out that will cost  $130,000- $150,000.
I am also looking to create a scholarship fund for teens suffering from poor mental health due to the pandemic's remote learning and isolation. You choose how to donate.
Contributions towards specific items will garner a donation plaque honoring by name the donor and pre sale appointments at a 30% reduced price for contributors.
Specific costs are:
Hinoki cedar tub built and imported from Japan : $10,000
Northern Canadian Cedar Ice Bath : $3,000
Ganbanayoku hot stone bed : $3,000
Dry Sauna: $7,000
Living moss walls : $1,500
Ethanol Fireplaces : $4,000
Architectural Antiques water bar from our friends in Northern Liberties: $4,000
Relaxation Sofa, Maker & Son  : $7,000
Wood construction : $30,000
Bathroom remodel : $16,000
Steel Beam support : $20,000
Electric : $8,000
Hvac and Hot water : $20,000  
Plumbing : $15,000
The Impact:
Our world has shifted, the need for preventive immune system building and stress reduction is more necessary than ever before but our traditional methods  of gyms and  community spas are not always available to us in this new paradigm. We need to create new structures that offer support to mind and body to keep us healthy in these increasingly more stressful times. 
This is one such structure, consider yourselves early adopters of  ancient modalities of healing in a new private and contactless environment. We are suffering, your contribution will bring the availability of these stress reducing, immune building modalities to Philadelphia even under a lock down. We are classified as "personal services" which is the same classification as a doctor's office, we can and will remain open. We service one person or 2 who live together at a time, exclusively.  

Risks & Challenges:
We all face complications that are unknown, building costs vary, availability and time lines for building are also factors for all who are creating new ventures in this time.  The opening date could be shifted by months not weeks, the cost of wood could climb again or the availability of plumbing components and as such the financial buffer to complete this project comfortably is how to ensure it gets done and this invaluable service can be offered. 

Other Ways You Can Help
I would like to offer a scholarship fund for teens suffering from the isolation of remote schooling who's mental health has been severely compromised at an age when developmentally they are emotionally more reactive,  we are seeing anxiety, depression and suicide rates soar. The traditional inpatient and outpatient mental health services are overwhelmed and wait times for beds are too long. This modality of healing bringing cortisol levels down provides a physical and emotional euphoria, it actually stimulates oxytocin and endorphins in the brain, the "happy" hormones.  Please see perks, to understand how you can contribute specifically to this fund.

story:
Tastie will Introduce Therapeutic CBD to the World. Cbd is a well known nutritional supplement within the holistic and naturopathic community. And the folks who know about it and enjoy it's health benefits are not typically opposed to the earthy taste associated with natural nutritional products.

However, there is an Entire World of people whom are suffering with pain and health challenges and could benefit form cbd but would never even explore it because of its earthy cannabis flavor undertones. My wife was one of those people. I originally developed our Tastie Formulas for her. She badly needed daily cbd but could not stomach the "nasty taste". She said it tasted like lawn clippings.

 

My background is in marketing and distribution so I was starting from scratch. The entrepreneur in me said that once I actually had a Tastie Vape Stick to Offer, the marketing part would be easy. The opportunity was two fold, help my wife then help the world. I knew that if I could create a product that she would love, the world would love it too. I have an extremely picky wife :)

So I started digging in. 

I found the some folks with experience making exquisite vape juice recipes. 

I sourced the cleanest non gmo organic hemp isolate grown in the US. 

I found a hardware manufacturer to produce a disposable vape pen that would heat at the right temp for maximum flavor while maintaining CBD vaporization

We went into the Lab and didn't come out til we had something Tastie. From there we took it to the market sampling our CBD Sticks to credible buyers in the industry and THEY LOVED THEM!

 

I have invested my own money developing this product and working out all the bugs so the risks are limited. We just need your help with a Tastie CBD Stick preorder so we can have the buying power to get our costs down on our first order.

So Here We Are...

We Have the Recipes!

We Have Sourced the CBD!

We Have Developed the Hardware!

We Have the Marketing Strategy!

We EVEN HAVE Purchase Orders of Willing Buyers!

We just need your Help with the Capital to Buy everything in Bulk so We Can Produce Them at a Price You Can Afford!

story:
The Geode Goddess Story
Be kind, be respectful, be direct, and explore with an open mind. Healing
comes in various ways. Whether through believing in the healing powers of
crystals, the magic of meditation with candles, or soaking in salts for
the water to wash it away... we return to the basics. To center. To
ground. To heal. To love. To simply...be.

This is the reason I started Geode Goddess in May of 2018. To share the
knowledge. The blessing of healing through crystals, candles, and other
metaphysical items.

The last six months have been very challenging. Crazy challenging. What
once looked promising for our family, became a snow globe. Everything
turned upside down. Stable jobs -  gone. Retirement options - gone.

As depression took residence in my mind, it wasn't paying rent. The
ultimate test of survival began. So, I decided to make Geode Goddess my
primary position. The CEO of my finances. Just about everything sold out in general
before I could replenish it all. Someone had to help pay the bills. All
income went to simply living. Which is a tough place for any family to be.

Then, a tragic death in the family. A wonderful, beautiful soul... gone.

What do we do now?
Move forward. Find a way to make it work, with what we have. Yes. I will
get up. I will return to ground with the earth, myself. To center. To heal. To love. For me. For
my daughter. And for others like me.

How To Help Geode Goddess
This is where the magic of the Fairies reside…

To ground and center, I need...
Main request:
$4,000 to restock for the upcoming market & festival season
$1,125 of rent for the largest festival of the year
To elevate and thrive, I need:

Secondary request:
Restocking cost for the remaining of the year (three quarters): $12,000*
Market and Festival Rent: $3,555*
​(Main request is the priority. Secondary would help ease the stress and mainly a forecast of expenses.)

Your Impact and My Promise
I want to share the blessing of the magical, healing properties from crystals and stones that are hand-selected for their beauty and energy. Helping folks to meditate and enjoy the intention placed in each candle. I want to keep my amazing vendors. They keep my offerings competitive in the marketplace. Without them, my true passion behind this would not be possible.

My candles are made from 100% soy wax. I use the purest essential oils that I can find. Some candles do have liquid dye added to them for added effect. As I have not found a way to color them naturally through food dyes that work, yet.

My promise. To make the purest candles that I possibly can. To fulfill each order with tokens and surprises for everyone. To find the most beautiful specimens of crystals  and rocks for all of us to enjoy. To spread the joy and happiness that I have found through Geode Goddess. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't help monetarily, just spreading the words helps. :)

Spread the word on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, etc.
Follow my progress by following and re-posting :)

Instagram: geode_goddess
Facebook: @geodegoddess
Etsy Website: www.thegeodegoddess.com

story:
Overview

Our new product launch is the Fire Eye Mud Eyeshadow Palette,  this palette is part of an Elements Collection, in which we have created five palettes: Fire, Water, Wood, Earth and Metal, which are considered as the 5 elements of life. Each will consist of rich pigmented colours that represent that element, however still subtle enough for an everyday use if required.  

The silky texture is enriched with plant based ingredients such as lemon balm, lavender and jojoba oil which helps the pigments glide smoothly on to the skin. 

Our dream for this palette was to create something everyone can use and by incorporating the 5 elements of life into makeup, it brings about the idea of importance around looking after our environment by using less toxins and bringing balance to peoples lives by being aware of what they are using on there skin, as the 5 elements represent the key to crafting a healthy happy home and environment. 

About us

Here at MUDD Beauty we are passionate about healthy living and makeup so we combined the two to create highly pigmented makeup derived from natural ingredients. 

The Founder of the brand is Alixzondra Samuda, the culmination of her healthy lifestyle and sensitive skin, prompted her to investigate natural beauty products which would not only be beneficial for her skin but also consisted of high quality pigments to show forth on her skin of colour. Through researching the industry, she found even more reasons to make the switch, reasons being 60% of what you put on your skin can be absorbed into the bloodstream including any toxins in those products. 

Whilst trying to find makeup to suit her skin tone she became aware of another gap in the market, high pigmented make up with natural ingredients for women of colour. These types of skin tones require high pigments to avoid the makeup looking ashy especially around the mouth area, as this area in women of colour is typically darker than the rest of the skin. 

Alixzondra followed her instinct to make ‘MUDD Beauty’ a reality first launching a range of high pigmented liquid lipsticks made from natural ingredients with no toxic chemicals.  

The unique name descends from mud being a biological substance extracted from the earth thus representing the brand’s organic and earthy approach. Whats even better about these types of products is they are not only good for you but they are Eco friendly too.

  

Our Brand Values 

Vegan – we ensure our products are vegan friendly by using plant based natural oils and minerals from the earth. 

Hostilic – By using natural ingredients such as coconut and almond oil, our products will naturally have therapeutic properties to help nourish the skin 

Inclusive – We wanted to make sure our brand is inclusive and diverse enough for all types of skin tones so we ensure we select the most effective ingredients to create strong pigments with nourishing effects. 

Eco friendly – we use ingredients that easily break down when washed away.

 

Help us get it on the market 

In order to launch our second product we will need 1500.00 

Heres how we will spend the money:

- 600 for ingredients

- 250 for packaging

- 100 for printing

- 200 for EU Regulations

- 350 for PR 

 

How you can help?

By Pre orderding our products you are helping to reduce the production costs. You are also becoming part of a movement, we feel is important as MUDD Beauty is a lifestyle brand and we seek to inspire, guide, and motivate people, with the goal of switching to natural and organic products for the sake of their health and for the environment. We feel our products contribute to a healthier and more sustainable way of life.  

As well as becoming part of a movement, we also wanted to give our customers a chance to purchase the product at a discounted price.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand some people may be unable to contribute, but we believe sharing is caring :-)

Other ways you can help are:

  • Getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

We really appreciate any way you can help.

 

When will I receive my order? 

The campaign will last 14 days. Once the campaign ends we will then start production which will take around 3 weeks, so you will receive your order at the end of 3 weeks. We will be doing our best to get your order to you as soon as possible.

Other ways you can help are:

Getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools!

We really appreciate any way you can help. When will I receive my order? The campaign will last 14 days. Once the campaign ends we will then start production which will take around 3 weeks, so you will receive your order at the end of 3 weeks. We will be doing our best to get your order to you as soon as possible.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Mohamed Salleh or known as Sam Salleh. I was born and raised in Singapore. I've been born physically challenged, suffering from Osteogenesis Imperfecta. Currently, I'm self-employed doing direct selling of gift items and blogging.

I frequently travel to the Philippines because it is a nice place with less stress compared to Singapore. Apart from that, my big brother is married to a Filipino, so there always a sense of a second home when I am in the Philippines.

I remembered the first time I travelled to the Philippines, many of my friends, including the locals of the Philippines, advised me not to drink water from the tap because I might suffer from diarrhoea as the water may be contaminated even after it was treated. Therefore the advice is to boil the water or buy bottled drinks.

During my holidays in the Philippines, I can see lots of stocks and supplies of water in the supermarket. For me personally, I can afford to buy bottled drinks from the supermarket but for many locals it is a luxury to buy one.

I talked to my local Filipino friends who told me that even when there are existing water refilling stations, the vendors tend to take advantage by overcharging. Hence the idea for this water project is born.

The funds that I receive will be used to finance the first year of operation of the water station. This includes the purchase of the water purification system and bottles, rental of facility to house the system, renovation, application of business permit, website setup, and ongoing operating expenses such as workers’ salary, utilities, communication and other miscellaneous expenses.

Locals will benefit from clean water that is affordable and ethically charged and also from the jobs that are created.

What We Need & What You Get

There will be initial setup cost which includes the following:

  • Water System - USD 10,770
  • Rental + Renovation – USD 6,460
  • Business Permit – USD 1,080
  • Supplies & Miscellaneous – USD 2,150
  • Website + Hosting – USD 1,940

There will also be ongoing operating cost on a yearly basis:

  • Utilities – USD 1,810
  • Communications – USD 260
  • Transportation – USD 23,260
  • Others – USD 650

Our Perks

USD 2 – Thank You: You will like to give me your basic support and we appreciate that very much. Your name will be featured in my social media. Every dollar counts!

USD 5 – Super Thank You: You will like to give me more than basic support. Your name will be featured in my social media and on the wall of fame on the Dalisay website.

USD 50 – Dalisay Ambassador: You truly believe that this project will make a difference and you want to give more. We will feature your name on my social media and on the wall of fame on the Dalisay website. You will also receive a Dalisay's mug.

USD 1000 – Super Dalisay Patron: Your name will be featured in our social media and on the wall of fame on the Dalisay website. You will also receive a Dalisay's mug. Plus, your name will forever be featured on a physical wall of fame at the water station facility.

What if I don't reach the entire goal?

I will continue with the project because this project has important social impact. However, it will be done on a smaller scale.  I will still secure a space and develop the website in the worst case scenario. Depending on the amount of funds remaining, I may or may not be able to acquire the actual water purification system and the bottles. If I am not able to do the latter, I will raise the rest of the funds through other means.

The Impact

Some Facts & Figures

Source: http://water.org/country/philippines

  • Poor household cannot afford to connect to water system
  • The poor rely on unsafe water sources such as surface water or expensive water sellers

Source: https://news.vice.com/article/a-lack-of-clean-water-and-sanitation-in-the-philippines-kills-55-people-every-day

  • Unclean water and poor sanitation kills 55 people every day

Source: www.rapler.com/move-ph/issue/hunger/61480-access-water-sanitation-philippines

  • Every 21 seconds, a child dies globally from water-related illness
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

How will The Dalisay Water Station Project make a difference?

The water system that we are choosing is a Reverse Osmosis (RO) Water Purification System. I choose this technology because of the superior water quality it delivers. Here are the major characteristics of RO water:

  • 100% Pure Water
  • 100% Free of metals and other mineral ions and deposits
  • 100% Free of chlorides and fluorides
  • 100% Free of germs
  • Balanced neutral pH

As you can see, the water is of a very high quality and will benefit the large population in Mindanao. Here is a list of figures to help you understand about the population trends in Mindanao:

  • Average population growth rate 2.89% (Source: http://psa.gov.ph)
  • Mindanao population constitutes a quarter of Philippines’ total population (in 2010, Philippines had a population of 92 million)

Here’s my production plan for the Mindanao community at the beginning stage:

  • Around 1050 bottles per year (i.e. around 35 bottles per month)
  • Each bottle with a capacity of 15L.
  • Total yearly capacity is 6300L. (about monthly capacity 525L)

With a huge population to serve, many locals will potentially benefit from this pure water station project that provides affordable, ethically charged water and also from the jobs that are created.

Risks & Challenges

Natural Disasters – The Philippines has typhoons. Setting up in Mindanao has less risk of tropical storms because of the surrounding mountains.

Security Risk – A water system is expensive. Security measures such as security cameras will need to be installed to prevent theft. I am also going to choose a location with low crime rate.

Quality Maintenance – Some existing water stations businesses do not maintain their filters, and thus water quality dropped. Having adequate funds will ensure the water system is always maintained to continuously produce good drinking water. Bottles for packaging the water currently available are low quality products which may affect the purity of the water. Therefore to source for high quality bottles is a challenge as it may be very costly and in order to overcome that challenge I can buy the bottles cheaper through wholesale purchase.

Competition – There are other existing vendors who also provide pure drinking water.  However, some conduct their business by overcharging. I am confident I have the ability to tackle this challenge by providing quality and affordability to be attractive to customers.

Personal Challenge - I'm from Singapore and this project will be carried out in the Philippines. It will be tedious, time consuming and expensive for me to travel to Philippines on regular basis. Therefore I have plans to apply long term visa to stay in Philippines so that I could manage it during my stay.

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, I know some of you out there are passionate about my cause but just can't contribute. There are many other ways you can help me!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Use your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media that you are on to tell people about this campaign. Send to your network the link to our campaign so that they can come and find out what we are doing.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools extensively!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Short Summary
My name is Mohamed Salleh or known as Sam Salleh. I was born and raised in Singapore. I've been born physically challenged, suffering from Osteogenesis Imperfecta. Currently, I'm self-employed doing direct selling of gift items and blogging.
I frequently travel to the Philippines because it is a nice place with less stress compared to Singapore. Apart from that, my big brother is married to a Filipino, so there always a sense of a second home when I am in the Philippines.
I remembered the first time I travelled to the Philippines, many of my friends, including the locals of the Philippines, advised me not to drink water from the tap because I might suffer from diarrhoea as the water may be contaminated even after it was treated. Therefore the advice is to boil the water or buy bottled drinks.
During my holidays in the Philippines, I can see lots of stocks and supplies of water in the supermarket. For me personally, I can afford to buy bottled drinks from the supermarket but for many locals it is a luxury to buy one.
I talked to my local Filipino friends who told me that even when there are existing water refilling stations, the vendors tend to take advantage by overcharging. Hence the idea for this water project is born.
The funds that I receive will be used to finance the first year of operation of the water station. This includes the purchase of the water purification system and bottles, rental of facility to house the system, renovation, application of business permit, website setup, and ongoing operating expenses such as workers’ salary, utilities, communication and other miscellaneous expenses.
Locals will benefit from clean water that is affordable and ethically charged and also from the jobs that are created.

What We Need & What You Get

There will be initial setup cost which includes the following:

Water System - USD 10,770
Rental + Renovation – USD 6,460
Business Permit – USD 1,080
Supplies & Miscellaneous – USD 2,150
Website + Hosting – USD 1,940

There will also be ongoing operating cost on a yearly basis:

Utilities – USD 1,810
Communications – USD 260
Transportation – USD 23,260
Others – USD 650

Our Perks
USD 2 – Thank You: You will like to give me your basic support and we appreciate that very much. Your name will be featured in my social media. Every dollar counts!
USD 5 – Super Thank You: You will like to give me more than basic support. Your name will be featured in my social media and on the wall of fame on the Dalisay website.
USD 50 – Dalisay Ambassador: You truly believe that this project will make a difference and you want to give more. We will feature your name on my social media and on the wall of fame on the Dalisay website. You will also receive a Dalisay's mug.
USD 1000 – Super Dalisay Patron: Your name will be featured in our social media and on the wall of fame on the Dalisay website. You will also receive a Dalisay's mug. Plus, your name will forever be featured on a physical wall of fame at the water station facility.
What if I don't reach the entire goal?
I will continue with the project because this project has important social impact. However, it will be done on a smaller scale.  I will still secure a space and develop the website in the worst case scenario. Depending on the amount of funds remaining, I may or may not be able to acquire the actual water purification system and the bottles. If I am not able to do the latter, I will raise the rest of the funds through other means.

The Impact
Some Facts & Figures
Source: http://water.org/country/philippines

Poor household cannot afford to connect to water system
The poor rely on unsafe water sources such as surface water or expensive water sellers

Source: https://news.vice.com/article/a-lack-of-clean-water-and-sanitation-in-the-philippines-kills-55-people-every-day
Unclean water and poor sanitation kills 55 people every day
Source: www.rapler.com/move-ph/issue/hunger/61480-access-water-sanitation-philippines
Every 21 seconds, a child dies globally from water-related illness

Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
Make it real for people and build trust.

How will The Dalisay Water Station Project make a difference?
The water system that we are choosing is a Reverse Osmosis (RO) Water Purification System. I choose this technology because of the superior water quality it delivers. Here are the major characteristics of RO water:

100% Pure Water
100% Free of metals and other mineral ions and deposits
100% Free of chlorides and fluorides
100% Free of germs
Balanced neutral pH

As you can see, the water is of a very high quality and will benefit the large population in Mindanao. Here is a list of figures to help you understand about the population trends in Mindanao:

Average population growth rate 2.89% (Source: http://psa.gov.ph)
Mindanao population constitutes a quarter of Philippines’ total population (in 2010, Philippines had a population of 92 million)

Here’s my production plan for the Mindanao community at the beginning stage:

Around 1050 bottles per year (i.e. around 35 bottles per month)
Each bottle with a capacity of 15L.
Total yearly capacity is 6300L. (about monthly capacity 525L)

With a huge population to serve, many locals will potentially benefit from this pure water station project that provides affordable, ethically charged water and also from the jobs that are created.

Risks & Challenges
Natural Disasters – The Philippines has typhoons. Setting up in Mindanao has less risk of tropical storms because of the surrounding mountains.
Security Risk – A water system is expensive. Security measures such as security cameras will need to be installed to prevent theft. I am also going to choose a location with low crime rate.
Quality Maintenance – Some existing water stations businesses do not maintain their filters, and thus water quality dropped. Having adequate funds will ensure the water system is always maintained to continuously produce good drinking water. Bottles for packaging the water currently available are low quality products which may affect the purity of the water. Therefore to source for high quality bottles is a challenge as it may be very costly and in order to overcome that challenge I can buy the bottles cheaper through wholesale purchase.
Competition – There are other existing vendors who also provide pure drinking water.  However, some conduct their business by overcharging. I am confident I have the ability to tackle this challenge by providing quality and affordability to be attractive to customers.
Personal Challenge - I'm from Singapore and this project will be carried out in the Philippines. It will be tedious, time consuming and expensive for me to travel to Philippines on regular basis. Therefore I have plans to apply long term visa to stay in Philippines so that I could manage it during my stay.

Other Ways You Can Help
Hey, I know some of you out there are passionate about my cause but just can't contribute. There are many other ways you can help me!

Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Use your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media that you are on to tell people about this campaign. Send to your network the link to our campaign so that they can come and find out what we are doing.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools extensively!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
About Our Mission 

BeWell Health's goal is to get people in the areas affected by wildfires this summer the tools they need to keep their noses clean. They need it now more than ever after being forced to breathe in all the smoke, ash, debris, and pollutants in the air caused by these fires. We want to send FREE Nasopure to those who need it most right now, and we need your help!

Soon after these wildfires began, BeWell Health sent thousands of Nasopure samples to the victims in need throughout the affected areas. We are a small company though and cannot afford to do this all on our own, as the demand for more product is too great. We need your help so that we can send Nasopure kits to the victims affected by these wildfires. We appreciate any and all help!

100% of the proceeds will go towards sending free Nasopure to the victims in areas affected by these wildfires! The proceeds will just cover our costs, we are not going to make any profit from this campaign. Our ultimate goal is to help a million noses breathe easier across the United States! 

If we do not reach our full goal, we will still put 100% of the proceeds towards sending free Nasopure to those affected by the wildfires. 

We will be working with Salvation Army Community Centers along with other organizations in the affected regions to get Nasopure into the hands of those who need it most. 

Your contribution will make a significant difference in the quality of life for the victims of these wildfires. We are on a mission to clear the air, one nose at a time - and we need your help!

Wildfire disaster victims have been through many hardships in the past months and continue to face challenges, especially when it comes to the long-term health problems these disasters can cause. In California, Oregon, Arizona, Colorado and other states the recent fires have added tons of ash and smoke into the atmosphere, leading to record-breaking air pollution throughout the country. 

Short-term exposure can result in irritation to the eyes, nose, and throat, and cause chest tightness, coughs, and asthma flare-ups.  The nose filters 10,000 liters of air each day and during these historical droughts and fire seasons, our nostrils are under enormous stress. Further exposure to irritants causes swelling of the nasal membranes and impedes normal nasal drainage. People in the affected areas are exposed to extreme amounts of smoke, ash, and debris in the air, so keeping the airways clean is more important now than ever!

Nasopure can help to wash the nasal passages, remove irritants, reduce swelling, and thin secretions which increases the efficiency of the nose hairs tasked with capturing irritants before they can further enter the body. Nasal washing is crucial for those living in areas affected by the wildfires. 

BeWell Health's mission is "First Do No Harm" and our products are made in the USA, assembled by adults with disabilities, and BPA Free. We strive to always do the right thing, provide high-quality products, give back to the community, and take care of the environment. Right now, the people affected by these wildfires across the United States need our help!

 

Testimonials 

"The Nasopure products that we received after the recent fires has helped beyond belief! My whole family is using the product daily to help combat the terrible air quality produced by the nearby fires." - Nick P, Denver, Colorado

"We cannot thank you enough for the Nasopure products we received! The residents of the neighborhood I live in all received Nasopure as part of a "Clean Air" initiative by our community. The smoke, smog, and pollution in our area are constant. This product has truly improved our quality of life and ability to breathe clearly! Nasopure, thank you for all you do!"          - Eemaun L, Los Angeles, California 

"Across the city, there are "ozone alerts" due to the recent fires and resulting smoke. Before I was introduced to Nasopure, I could feel my airways were hurting and working harder to run efficiently. Since I started using this product, it's night and day. I am spreading the word to anyone who will listen, this product helps so much in a time like this!" John C, Sacramento, California

 

Other ways you can help: spread the word about nasal irrigation! We don't care if you use Nasopure, a different neti pot, or a turkey baster - any washing is better than no washing! Share this campaign with your friends and family, help us get the word out!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
This is a calling for your Help and Support! 

Target #1 for this campaign is 400,000$ 

And its not often I come out with such inquiry.  Because I am truly loving to find my own ways. But this time its not about me. Its about everyone. I am collecting funds to buy land where I can plant and grow rich, healthy and potent Tabernanthe Iboga.

My name is Aliya Galim, I am originally from Kazakhstan. Have lived in different countries and experienced variety of amazing changes and growth. From corporate world, into Yoga practice and teaching, into Somatic Energy therapy, I have finally arrived to work with Nature. Today I am Intuitive Herbalist, Plant and Animals communicator.

Currently I live in Costa Rica with my partner, where every day I dig my hands into dirt-soil and grow powerful herbs and plants that I gather to create potions and medicine for people around me. I have never ever imagined that herbalism will be my thing. You see, I have never studied this, neither read any book or attended a course. It happened to me almost over a night. A night when I experienced the wonder gift of Iboga. This medicine plant literally reopened my ancient abilities and now I am in service to give back. To Iboga and to Humanity.

Let me introduce you to this Magic Medicine Shrub.
Iboga Tabernanthe is a plant growing in Africa (Cameroon and Gabon),  it has been used by native African tribes of Bwiti religion for medicinal purpose, but mainly for spiritual transformation. Iboga root bark contains 30 known and many other unknown alkaloids. From those there are 4 main psychoactive alkaloids (Ibogaine, Ibogaline, Ibogamine, and Tabernanthine). These  impact receptors in the human brain and the network of nervous system. 

What is Addiction?

Through my therapy individual work with clients I learned that what our understanding of  "addiction" is quite limited. We mainly associate it with obvious substance addiction. And for me this is only a tip of an ice berg. There is unseen, undercover quiet journey that this illness takes, before it surfaces as final drug or alcohol addiction.

So what is addiction? It is a strong or old dependency with which human associate own identity and without which human cannot face life. One can be dependent on:

  • relationship and social belonging
  • technology, social media, shopping and hoarding
  • emotional, self-sabotage turbulence
  • mental repetitive patterns
  • need to be valued and seen by others
  • physical dependency like food, over-exercising, self-beauty image, even coffee
  • sexual need, promiscuities
  • violent communication and physical abuse
  • and finally - drug, alcohol, smoking

In other words if a human believes that he or she cannot cope by own self and needs this or that, regularly or sometimes.... this is an addiction. And if substance addiction is obvious, loud and clear. The other above mentioned are very subtle and most of the time are not even recognized. I even realized that most of people who have severe illness unconsciously befriend their diagnosis and really depend on it, because it makes life busy and in a weird way meaningful. 

I personally believe that every human being will benefit from one-time Iboga treatment in order to prevent consequences that are hard to reverse in future. 

How does Iboga Tabernanthe help:

Today there is not enough of study of how Iboga works. Perhaps we don't have such technologies and fundings yet. But the alkaloids of Iboga relax and reset main biocomputer (brain) and the network of nervous system. As a chain reaction it follow to organs and systems. You can't predict what exactly will be healed in human. And those who I personally know have healed from very different symptoms. From physical, to mental and emotional. 

 

My Iboga Experience.


During my one session I had restored connection with Mother Nature and my role in serving Her. I have been given straight-forward message that I have old memory of connection with Iboga Tabernanthe trees. And in this lifetime I am to restore this plant. Because beyond the leaves, fruits, bark and seeds there is a Massive Forceful Channel that brings Light and Peace. I have been given back my skills to communicate, feel and listen to the plants. Grow them into powerful resource. Since then every day I walk in the greenhouse, study plants from plants, bring home what was chosen and create an extract, decoction or elixir. How does it work? My logic mind still can't explain. But neither I have the need to explain it to myself. I simply follow the lead of the plants and it works. Before I believed I need to study names and purposes of herbs, attend a course where they will show me exact steps of how to do it. Came out I was so naive. The internal voice that guides me teaches me so much, that even modern books don't have such information. And this is all thanks to Iboga. This Medicine has gifted me with the ability to "hear the plants and animals". Which means that Iboga is not only for healing illness and addiction. It can help someone in a similar way it helped me: to open up individual abilities that this world needs.  You never know what will surface after Iboga treatment. I might label as a Profound Personal Spiritual Awakening and breaking free from doubts, fear and playing small.

 

My Mission

Tabernanthe Iboga is leading me to have own farmland where I can devote my heart and hands to plant Iboga seeds and grow them into powerful shrubs in a completely new way. Not recommended by farmers or African tribes, not studied from books, but only through intuitive listening.

 

The Need

Today I am supported and provided with basic necessities for my life. I have food and shelter. My financial state is enough for this, but not enough for reaching the target of Iboga Mission. I "was told" that people can help, and that I am not alone in this. I am able to grow it in a unique way for people and those who will resonate with this mission will become the pillars of this project.

 

Target & costs

This project is a big long-term plan which has sub-targets to meet. This particular fundraising is for purchasing the Land. I will be creating separate fundraising for each next step after previous one is almost or fully achieved. 

1 ) LAND: I am choosing New Zealand as the homeland for this farm. It is remoted and peaceful place that has perfect environment and climate conditions to grow Iboga. The condition and size of land that is needed costs from 300,000 to 1,000 000 USD. So I am targeting 400,000$

2) IBOGA: I will be travelling to Africa or another country to purchase seeds and transport them to the land by myself ~ 4000$

3) TEAM: I will have to hire equipment and people to work and prepare the land. Amount to be defined on the a later stage.

4) BUILDING BARN: where Iboga can be treated and stored after harvesting. Amount to be defined on the a later stage.

POTENTIAL HOUSE FOR ME: in case the land that I purchase doesn't have any home to live in.

 

Your Support

Financial support is the main way, and it can be any amount from 5$ and up. I am really grateful for every penny.

I also acknowledge that not everyone  have the financial means to support me, so here are other ways:

  • Please spread the word
  • Share this campaign on your social media, in your circle
  • If you are an influencer or community leader, just one repost and this can move mountains for me
  • Follow me on Instagram @earthtempleweaver and be sure to tag me when you share!
  • Spread spread spread! The more people are involved the sooner this can manifest!

It is a great way that you can choose just to donate or buy a perk and receive something very useful for your investment.

 

I endlessly thank you for stepping in, reading through the whole page and resonating.

May we all meet our True Self

 

Aliya

Grow them into powerful resource. Since then every day I walk in the greenhouse, study plants from plants, bring home what was chosen and create an extract, decoction or elixir. How does it work? My logic mind still can't explain. But neither I have the need to explain it to myself. I simply follow the lead of the plants and it works. Before I believed I need to study names and purposes of herbs, attend a course where they will show me exact steps of how to do it. Came out I was so naive. The internal voice that guides me teaches me so much, that even modern books don't have such information. And this is all thanks to Iboga. This Medicine has gifted me with the ability to "hear the plants and animals". Which means that Iboga is not only for healing illness and addiction. It can help someone in a similar way it helped me: to open up individual abilities that this world needs.  You never know what will surface after Iboga treatment. I might label as a Profound Personal Spiritual Awakening and breaking free from doubts, fear and playing small.
 

My Mission
Tabernanthe Iboga is leading me to have own farmland where I can devote my heart and hands to plant Iboga seeds and grow them into powerful shrubs in a completely new way. Not recommended by farmers or African tribes, not studied from books, but only through intuitive listening.
 

The Need
Today I am supported and provided with basic necessities for my life. I have food and shelter. My financial state is enough for this, but not enough for reaching the target of Iboga Mission. I "was told" that people can help, and that I am not alone in this. I am able to grow it in a unique way for people and those who will resonate with this mission will become the pillars of this project.
 

Target & costs
This project is a big long-term plan which has sub-targets to meet. This particular fundraising is for purchasing the Land. I will be creating separate fundraising for each next step after previous one is almost or fully achieved. 
1 ) LAND: I am choosing New Zealand as the homeland for this farm. It is remoted and peaceful place that has perfect environment and climate conditions to grow Iboga. The condition and size of land that is needed costs from 300,000 to 1,000 000 USD. So I am targeting 400,000$
2) IBOGA: I will be travelling to Africa or another country to purchase seeds and transport them to the land by myself ~ 4000$
3) TEAM: I will have to hire equipment and people to work and prepare the land. Amount to be defined on the a later stage.
4) BUILDING BARN: where Iboga can be treated and stored after harvesting. Amount to be defined on the a later stage.
POTENTIAL HOUSE FOR ME: in case the land that I purchase doesn't have any home to live in.
 

Your Support
Financial support is the main way, and it can be any amount from 5$ and up. I am really grateful for every penny.
I also acknowledge that not everyone  have the financial means to support me, so here are other ways:

Please spread the word
Share this campaign on your social media, in your circle
If you are an influencer or community leader, just one repost and this can move mountains for me
Follow me on Instagram @earthtempleweaver and be sure to tag me when you share!
Spread spread spread! The more people are involved the sooner this can manifest!

It is a great way that you can choose just to donate or buy a perk and receive something very useful for your investment.
 
I endlessly thank you for stepping in, reading through the whole page and resonating.
May we all meet our True Self
 
Aliya

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The Cis Jungle’s first summit will be themed, The Black [trans] Woman, a theme barrowed from the famous quote by Malcolm X:

“The most disrespected person in America is the black woman. The most Unprotected person in America is the black woman. The most neglected person in America is the black woman.”

 

Though the summit will be physically held in Los Angeles, when we talk about accessibility for marginalized communities its important to develop a way to be inclusive. Those who cannot attend in person will have free access to the entire summit via Live Stream.

 

Budget Breakdown:

Summit- $13,800

Includes flights and lodging and stipends for team assisting with summit, and cost of live stream

 

The Cis Jungle 3RD Anniversary Party $2000

Free drinks food and cake to all

 

The Cis Jungle- $3,100

Stipends for workers and contributors of The Cis Jungle for a year

                                            

Website $900

Redevelopment of The Cis Jungle website and stipend for person in charge of redeveloping website.

If you support black trans women, you need to donate

If you love black trans women, you need to donate

If you recognize life is extremely difficult for black trans women, you need to donate

If The Cis Jungle has helped you, served you or enlightened you in anyway, you need to donate

 

Thank you and I hope to see you in LA next year for The Cis Jungle’s first annual summit! Details coming soon. If the goal is not met all funds will go directly to employing black trans women and QPOC.

story:
Yogapal

 

A practitioner for ten years, I have been working in the areas of Yoga, Meditation, Mindfulness and Pilates for six years now.  The enormous body and mind benefits of all of these disciplines have been literally life-changing for me.  I am passionate about sharing these learnings to a wider audience.

 

Campaign

Not everyone can get to a class, others abhor exercise in group settings.  Yogapal brings these wonderful body/mind practices to your door in a tailor-made class which literally meets you where you are, not just geographically but in body & mind.

The aim is to begin in Dublin and expand to large cities e.g. London, Paris, New York etc.

 

My Promise

Clients will be vetted and verified on joining Yogapal.  Instructors will be interviewed, tested and vetted to ensure they are fully qualified, accredited and insured.  Equipment will be supplied.

 

Namaste

 

Grainne

story:
We are a company dedicated to giving people just that little bit of comfort in their time of need.

We all know someone or have ourselves been in a hospital environment or are unwell when all you want is a cozy pair of socks, something to do and the comforts of home.

We think its very important to give people this comfort. Hospitals and sickness can be such a trying time and an exhausting experience. It can never hurt to boost the morale of those in that position.

 

 

The Origin Story

We started this company for one reason, but that one reason stemmed from two different experiences that were happening simultaneously.

We decided to write down our experiences and share them with you to better help you understand why we're doing what we're doing and why we're so passionate about it.

Ashley:

"Several months ago, I found out my cousin was diagnosed with cancer and would be going into surgery. As I am a single parent and my boyfriend Rick was back in England caring for his father, there was no way for me to go and visit her. 

At the same time, Rick's father was told he may have to go back into the hospital for a biopsy on his lung. Since I couldn't see either of them, I decided to go online and see if I could find a useful care package as I've had more than my fair share of surgeries and hospital stays where I just sat there miserable and sometimes alone. Losing track of time and self. Trying to wrap your gown around yourself so you aren't exposed or wishing you had better chap stick or a good toothbrush or just something to pass the time. 

What I saw online shocked me. Nothing in the way of real useful care packages. There was a lot of cookies, teddy bears and get well balloons. While those are all sweet, it just wasn't fitting for what people really need.  I called several friends and family in disbelief that something like this didn't really exist. I found a few cancer specific ones with inspirational quotes on everything but nothing just for general self care in a hospital or at home sick or recovery.

I couldn't sleep. After this idea being stuck in my brain for days, I called Rick and asked if this is what I should be doing. It was my "a ha" moment. This was what I was meant to do. After reaching out to friends and family in the medical industry as well as people who have had long stays in hospitals, we took the next several months to source, test, and curate what we believe to be the essentials for anyone who is in this kind of situation."

Rick: 

"My Father fell ill when I was in another country, contracting pneumonia, 6000 miles away and there was nothing I could do, I was worried to say the least, I was visiting my girlfriend Ashley at the time and we came up with the idea of trying to find him a box of stuff to do and comfortable clothing to wear to make his stay easier.

To our surprise there was nothing online that resembled that at all, the closest being a pair of socks, that was it, you cant send them food because they're on a diet provided by the nurses, so what are you to do?

It was a while before I could fly back and see him, luckily my sister was there to help him and visit him.

When I finally was able to see him in hospital I was appalled, he was just sat in a chair with nothing to do, disheveled, unkempt and looking as if he'd lost the will to live.

Seeing your father shut down and stare off into the distance because he has absolutely nothing to do but ruminate on whether he's going to die, struggling to breathe is not how it should be.

Even after he had gotten out of the hospital and came home he was so exhausted and still in fear for his life that he was basically chair bound, getting up to use the bathroom left him breathless and I could see the defeat in his eyes, slowly accepting that he was falling apart and was going to die.

Luckily that wasn't true, he recovered completely, but I would have loved nothing more than to be able to send him a box of gifts, letting him know he isn't alone, providing him with comfort and a little peace of mind."

 

The Plan

If we secure the funds to do so we will fully actualize our idea, to be able to purchase all the items we will include in our care crates, as well as packaging, labels, a building or warehouse and rolling out our line of crates as soon as possible. 

In the future we will expand our range of crates to include, kids care crates, cold and flu crates, gaming crates, movie crates and many more.

When we reach a point of financial stability we plan on giving back to charities, hospitals and assisted living homes as much as possible, donating crates to those who really need them.

 

Rewards

If you pledge a certain amount you will receive one of our boxes early, starting with The Activity Crate for $30

The higher the amount you pledge the larger the box you will receive which include some of our higher value items and even the chance to name and create your own crate to introduce to our product line.

When you receive these boxes we would love some of your feedback and how we can improve to help people in need comfort.

Our logo was created by Courtney Murphy. You can reach her at courtneyvicmurphy@gmail.com

 

Risks and Challenges

Starting any new business is fraught with risks and challenges, wondering and hoping whether you'll get it off the ground or not, whether it'll be received well and whether you can handle the volume of orders should it get popular, but this is it for us.

This is a hard topic for me to write about. I'm not usually the one to openly talk about life's challenges because who doesn't have hardships? But this company really did grow from the challenges of life.
I'm a Mom with an autistic 14 year old daughter and a 9 year old son with ADHD and a speech impediment. All their lives I've been able to be there for them whenever they needed me and above all else I cant let that change. 

Starting my own business is about as risky as it gets. My family is on the line. But we are all so passionate about this. Knowing we could help people as well as making sure I always have a place for my kids to work and grow if they so choose. Especially my daughter. Giving her the opportunity to thrive in a work place and have independence as she gets older while still being able to be there for her is my ultimate dream. Where it gets really tough is that we are starting with nothing. This is 100% a from the ground up business.

We are fully ready to meet these challenges, with your help.

story:
Eliminate the pain of bending down to feed your pet.

Ingenious! No Other Product Like It!


With a push of a button, the shelf holding the food and water bowls are brought to waist height.

 


Pets depend on their owners. They love us unconditionally. For many of us, they are the most loyal friend we will ever know. But, sometimes it is difficult to take care of our pets due to our own physical limitations. How many times a day do we bend down to fill food and water bowls for our pets? Three or four times a day? This product is essential for those who have difficulty bending, kneeling, or stooping, whether you are age 40 or 80.

As a life-long and successful businessman and entrepreneur, I like to solve problems. It dawned on me one day that it was getting more and more difficult to bend down to feed my cat, Bebe. I must confess that there are some days I’m too tired to bend down, and I don’t change the water. Or, I stand above the bowl and pour new water into the old water. My cat deserves better than that!

So, not one to let a challenge hold me back, I set out to solve this problem….and Bend Friend was born. 



Human Purpose

Bend Friend will assist anyone who has a problem bending down, with a bad back, or has balance issues, from baby boomers to the elderly. No more bending down to pick up food and water bowls from the floor to fill several times a day. For many, what may seem a simple task of feeding one’s pet each day, is not only difficult, but can be dangerous for those struggling with balance and mobility challenges, back and knee pain, arthritis and dizziness. Or, maybe it’s been a tough winter and your back is sore from shoveling snow. Spring is here, the garden beds need to be cleaned and flowers planted, but at the end of day, bending over just hurts too much. Or, you’ve recently had a knee or hip replacement, or need one. This product will create a sense of security against falls that can cause injuries such as broken bones and for those living alone a fall can be life-threatening.

Pet Purpose

Our pets deserve the highest quality of care. The importance of providing fresh food and water to our pets daily cannot be overstated. Bacteria will grow in water or wet food that sits for a few days leading to unintended neglect of our pet. In a survey we conducted of pet owners, many admitted that they did not change water or food daily, not because they didn’t care for their pet, but because it was difficult and painful to bend or stoop down to retrieve the bowls. And, they felt bad that their health was inadvertently affecting the health of their pet. The health of our pets depends on clean water and fresh food daily. 

Product Need

A number of studies have found that people are now reporting physical problems with balance, bending and kneeling at earlier ages than in the past.

In an 11-year study of 18,000 people aged 50-64 conducted by the National Health Interview Survey, it was reported that "baby boomers are increasingly reporting mobility-related problems, such as stooping, bending and kneeling."

The National Center for Biotechnology reports that an estimated 19 million people experience some mobility difficulty. “The mean age of those with minor, moderate, or major difficulty ranged from 59 to 67 years. Of those reporting major difficulties, 32% said their problems began at age 50 years and younger.”

A number of causes create these physical challenges.  “By far the most common causes were arthritis and back problems, with patterns varying by age: arthritis was cited most by persons who were at least 70 years old, while back problems were reported most among those aged 18 to 49 years. Other common causes fell broadly into chronic conditions associated with aging and accidental injuries.”

We did our own research in many supermarkets and pet stores on both coasts of the United States over the past year and spoke to hundreds of people. Wheelchair bound pet owners, those with walkers, and others that seemed to have difficulty moving or were seniors and boomers. 91.2% of respondents shopping in the pet food aisles indicated that not only did they think it was a good idea, they would buy Bend Friend or knew of someone with physical limitations who needed such a product.

Bend Friend is so vital that we are developing a proposal to introduce it to government agencies because for those pet owners with mobility issues it is just as important to their well being as wheelchairs, canes, and walkers.

Target Demographic

Physically challenged – Every year, more than 650,000 people need a total knee or hip replacement, and an estimated 52.5 million U.S. adults report “that their doctor told them they had arthritis” and of that “294,000 U.S. children under the age of 18 (or 1 in 250 children) have been diagnosed with arthritis or another rheumatologic condition.”  (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)

Senior citizens - The elderly population will more than double between 2010 and the year 2050, reaching 80 million people (2010 Census)

Baby Boomers - The country is aging, as those born between 1946 and 1964 enter their senior years it is predicted that 1 in 5 Americans will be elderly (2010 Census)

Pet Owners - According to the Humane Society (2012), more than 164 million households in the United States own pets, an increase of 67 million in the last 30 years. This translates to more than 83 millions dogs and more than 95 million cats living in 62% of all American households. Pet owners spend more than $50 billion on their pets annually according to the American Pet Products Association. 

                                                                 Bend-Friend:

                                                    The Only Product of its Kind

                           No More Bending, Stooping, or Kneeling to Feed Your Pet

                                              Is Lightweight and Easy to Clean

                                                        Is Compact and Sturdy

                                                         No Assembly Required

                 No Electrical Plugs - Battery-operated - Can be Placed Anywhere

                                                                 Is affordable

                 Will aid those who have difficulty bending to feed their small pets

                              Target Product Completion Date – January 2017


Use of Funds

Completing Prototype Development

The prototyping process will produce a functional full scale model of the product. The prototype will be evaluated for proper fitment of components, mechanism functionality, human factors/user friendly experience, and overall form. 


I am sure many of you, or have a family member or friend, who has bending and kneeling problems and something as simple as dealing with feeding your pet has become a not-so-easy task. We are committed to getting this product on the market as soon as possible, and are so close…we just need the funding to complete the last steps. This is such an important product for people with physical challenges…people of all ages…and as important as a wheelchair, cane or walker.

We owe our pet fresh water and food EVERYDAY. Let’s face it…some days we just can’t bend down several times a day without pain. This leaves our pet with no water, bacteria-laden water or dried up food.

water bowls from the floor to fill several times a day. For many, what may seem
a simple task of feeding one’s pet each day, is not only difficult, but can be
dangerous for those struggling with balance and mobility challenges, back and
knee pain, arthritis and dizziness. Or, maybe it’s been a tough winter and your
back is sore from shoveling snow. Spring is here, the garden beds need to be
cleaned and flowers planted, but at the end of day, bending over just hurts too
much. Or, you’ve recently had a knee or hip replacement, or need one. This
product will create a sense of security against falls that can cause injuries
such as broken bones and for those living alone a fall can be life-threatening.
Pet Purpose
Our pets deserve the
highest quality of care. The importance of providing fresh food and water to
our pets daily cannot be overstated. Bacteria will grow in water or wet food
that sits for a few days leading to unintended neglect of our pet. In a survey
we conducted of pet owners, many admitted that they did not change water or
food daily, not because they didn’t care for their pet, but because it was
difficult and painful to bend or stoop down to retrieve the bowls. And, they
felt bad that their health was inadvertently affecting the health of their pet.
The health of our pets depends on clean water and fresh food daily. 

Product Need
A
number of studies have found that people are now reporting physical problems
with balance, bending and kneeling at earlier ages than in the past. 
In
an 11-year study of 18,000 people aged 50-64 conducted by the National
Health Interview Survey, it was reported that "baby boomers are
increasingly reporting mobility-related problems, such as stooping, bending and
kneeling." 
The
National Center for Biotechnology reports that an
estimated 19 million people experience some mobility difficulty. “The mean age
of those with minor, moderate, or major difficulty ranged from 59 to 67 years.
Of those reporting major difficulties, 32% said their problems began at age 50
years and younger.” 
A
number of causes create these physical challenges.  “By far the most common causes were arthritis
and back problems, with patterns varying by age: arthritis was cited most by
persons who were at least 70 years old, while back problems were reported most
among those aged 18 to 49 years. Other common causes fell broadly into chronic
conditions associated with aging and accidental injuries.” 
We
did our own research in many supermarkets and pet stores on both coasts of the
United States over the past year and spoke to hundreds of people. Wheelchair
bound pet owners, those with walkers, and others that seemed to have difficulty
moving or were seniors and boomers. 91.2% of respondents shopping in the pet
food aisles indicated that not only did they think it was a good idea, they
would buy Bend Friend or knew of someone with physical limitations who needed
such a product.
Bend
Friend is so vital that we are developing a proposal to introduce it to
government agencies because for those pet owners with mobility issues it is just
as important to their well being as wheelchairs, canes, and walkers.
Target
Demographic
Physically
challenged – Every year, more than 650,000 people need a total knee or hip
replacement, and an estimated 52.5 million U.S. adults report “that their
doctor told them they had arthritis” and of that “294,000 U.S. children under
the age of 18 (or 1 in 250 children) have been diagnosed with arthritis or another
rheumatologic condition.”  (Centers
for Disease Control and Prevention)
Senior
citizens - The elderly population will more than double between 2010 and the
year 2050, reaching 80 million people (2010 Census)
Baby
Boomers - The country is aging, as those born between 1946 and 1964 enter their
senior years it is predicted that 1 in 5 Americans will be elderly (2010
Census)
Pet
Owners - According to the Humane Society (2012),
more than 164 million households in the United States own pets, an increase of
67 million in the last 30 years. This translates to more than 83 millions dogs
and more than 95 million cats living in 62% of all American households. Pet
owners spend more than $50 billion on their pets annually according to the
American Pet Products Association. 
                                                                 Bend-Friend:
                                                    The Only Product of its Kind
                           No More Bending, Stooping, or
Kneeling to Feed Your Pet
                                              Is Lightweight and Easy to Clean
                                                        Is Compact and Sturdy
                                                         No Assembly Required
                 No Electrical Plugs - Battery-operated
- Can be Placed Anywhere
                                                                 Is affordable
                 Will aid those who have difficulty
bending to feed their small pets
                              Target Product Completion Date –
January 2017


Use of Funds
Completing Prototype Development
The prototyping process
will produce a functional full scale model of the product. The prototype will
be evaluated for proper fitment of components, mechanism functionality, human
factors/user friendly experience, and overall form. 


I
am sure many of you, or have a family member or friend, who has bending and
kneeling problems and something as simple as dealing with feeding your pet has
become a not-so-easy task. We are committed to getting this product on the
market as soon as possible, and are so close…we just need the funding to
complete the last steps. This is such an important product for people with
physical challenges…people of all ages…and as important as a wheelchair, cane
or walker.
We
owe our pet fresh water and food EVERYDAY. Let’s face it…some days we just
can’t bend down several times a day without pain. This leaves our pet with no
water, bacteria-laden water or dried up food.

story:
Hello! My name is Kim

I was a nurse for 23 years and have now found my passion as a Beauty Technician.  I still am able to help people just in a different way!  Being mobile and able to go to the client, in their home, without them having to worry about getting dressed, finding a babysitter, or even paying for public transportation to get a treatment is fundamentally important.  

Today's society is BUSY!  Most people work 1 or 2 jobs and who has time for a facial or pedicure or massage?  Well being mobile will allow me to reach those busy people in their homes on their time, maybe when kids go to bed, or when they get home from a long work day and traditional spa's are not open!  My business hours are NOT traditional and are based around those who need my services the most!

The contributions from my CrowdFunding will help me achieve the best Mobile Spa Equipment and Supplies I can for my clients, their treatments and their safety!

My Campaign is for $8,000.  This will help me with the purchase of professional and safe equipment like a massage table, foot spa, equipment sterilizer, mobile spa station.  It will also help with purchasing professional supplies like PPE, bacticides and disposable tools.  It will also help me with professional products like facial masks, body scrubs, lotions, cleansers, nail polish, hand and feet soaks.

Imagine coming home from a long day or week at work and your feet and body ache, a massage and pedicure sound awesome right but every spa or salon is closed!  With my Service you could book your appointment for 8pm in your home, in your pyjamas!

All funding will be going towards the startup listed regardless if I do not reach my goal!  I will focus on the main larger needed items!

I truly feel that my Services will impact my community in a very big way.  Being able to provide services and treatments to those who cannot get out to receive them or life is just so busy that time is a factor is super important in today's world1
 

 

I am so grateful to all of you that have read my campaign!  Please share it regardless, as this is a huge way you can contribute ... sharing is a huge way of supporting!  Let's make some noise!

 

If you have ANY questions please contact me!
