story:
We are working closely with the Homeless Veterans Rehabilitation Program in Menlo Park and the General Medicine Clinic of the Palo Alto Veterans Hospital. Our goal is to raise funds to provide Organic Holistic Treatments for Healing at HVRP to Volunteers in that Program.

Ken Kesey went to the Veterans Mental Facility in Menlo Park Ca. Born in La Junta, Colorado, Ken Kesey earned his journalism degree from the University of Oregon in 1957 and then studied creative writing at Stanford in the late '50s. While at Stanford he tried hallucinogens for the first time after volunteering for a government research program at the Veterans Administration Hospital in Menlo Park. As part of the program, Kesey was given LSD, psilocybin, mescaline, and AMT. During this same period of his life, Kesey worked as a psychiatric attendant at the hospital, which provided inspiration for his first novel One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest. While at Stanford, Kesey lived at Perry Lane, a bohemian community in Palo Alto. He became known for throwing parties where psychoactive chemicals often found their way into the punch bowl.

After Cuckoo's Nest was published, Kesey purchased property in La Honda, California, where he and the Merry Pranksters threw their infamous Acid Test parties during the mid-'60s. These events, fueled by diverse and intriguing guests, day-glo decorations in the trees, music from hidden speakers, and plenty of LSD, were well documented. In 1964, Kesey and the Pranksters set out on a cross-country bus trip to the East coast in a psychedelically painted school bus named Furthur. Along the way they met, among others, Allen Ginsberg, Timothy Leary, Ram Dass, and Jack Kerouac. The trip has been immortalized by Tom Wolfe's book The Electric Kool-Aid Acid Test, as well as in the recent documentary Magic Trip.

Ken Kesey stood as a transition between the Beat Generation of the '50s and the Hippies of the '60s. He was an inspiration to many throughout his life, as attested by the more than 1,000 mourners who attended his funeral.

story:
I moved to Mankato in 2015 from Nebraska. After teaching 7-12 sciences and coaching, I went to grad school with dreams of becoming a kinesiology professor and researching PNF stretching (arguably the most effective stretch type for improving flexibility) and delayed-onset muscle soreness (DOMS). However, after my first year of grad school, I suffered a severe traumatic brain injury (TBI) in a 2007 car accident. I learned how to apply exercise science from my education to my own healing and eventual power lifting training. I received an MSE in exercise science in 2010. I was led to Mankato Family YMCA in 2016, where I taught Simple Stretch, water aerobics, and Exercise Is Medicine to active older adults (AOA) and other special populations for 2.5 years. Through my own return to active living with TBI and healing the resulting injuries which resulted from inflexibility, and through helping people at the Y move with less pain by stretching more and better, I became known as someone who could adapt nearly any exercise for nearly any ability and someone who could help people stretch muscles they didn't know they have. When one of my "snowbird" water aerobics friends reported about a stretch studio she'd tried in California that charges high prices to stretch people in ways she'd experienced me stretching people out of kindness, she suggested I open my own stretch studio in Mankato. 

I looked into that California business and opening a franchise here. Not only did it seem to be too cost-prohibitive, but their techniques don't align well with good stretch research. Theresa loves active living, learning, teaching, and helping others. So, while starting a nonprofit is too complicated for me, I do get to offer scientific research-based stretch services at reasonable prices, use a portable stretch table in order to reach people wherever in the Mankato area they are, and give 10% of my intake to the Upper Midwest chapter if the Multiple Sclerosis Society in order to help people with a degenerative disease that affects cognition and movement, among other life aspects.

I'm getting guidance from Mankato's Small Business Development Center. And, I've been blessed to have access to friends and resources who've helped me begin serving Mankato. I'm currently borrowing a friend's massage table, for which I just was able to order a replacement with December's income.

A significant deterrent to booking more stretches than I am now is my availability. I love that I have inexpensive access to an area church, but I've only gotten two hours each week. I cannot get people who are unavailable during those two hours. And, especially because a new client must complete a health history-waiver before I can begin a stretch, about 15 minutes are added to either a 15- or 30-minute stretch, limiting the number of people I can stretch in two hours to 2-4. So, I'd LOVE to lease a tiny office space. I don't have enough consistent clients yet to pay a lease or utilities, or purchase a few inexpensive seats and a desk.

Besides needing more availability in order to attract clients, one of my greatest needs is multimedia marketing. My target audience in the first several years is retirees. Many use social media, like Facebook. So, Flexibility4All has a Facebook page, along with a free website, a YouTube presence, and a Twitter account. The marketing on Facebook us reasonably-priced. But, many older adults use the local paper and read regional magazines. Ads in those-even small ads-can cost hundreds of dollars.

While I hold a Master's of Science Education in exercise science, am currently certified in American Council on Exercise Group Fitness Instruction (ACE GFI), am American College of Sports Medicine Exercise Is Medicine-certified (ACSM-EIM), and am experienced in both group and personal training, I believe the online training to essentially "trade in" my GFI for an ACSM Exercise Physiologist (ACSM-EP) certification will better-assist me as I work individually with persons in a therapeutic capacity and its relevant continuing education over time will keep me more current on the science of flexibility exercise in helping others. The exam for members (which I am already) is $279. The book required for ACSM-EP's is ACSM's Resources for the Exercise Physiologist, 2nd Edition (ISBN: 978-1-4963-3907-2). Purchase of the paperback book and the online exam study program I'll need (because I received my degree over eight years ago and have memory trouble related to my TBI) is $127.97.

Since I've encountered nearly no one who's familiar with the concept of assisted stretch, I'd like to advertise my services in multiple media types where people of all ages are likely to read them. I've already designed a Facebook business page, so I can purchase Facebook services to share my page and significant page postings to people within several miles of Mankato for $20 or more. There are multiple paper, radio, and television advertisement resources in and around Mankato which I can utilize, but their prices run over $100, often. Anything I can get to use toward advertising, continued education, and space lease would help. And, I ALWAYS appreciate help and use it to further help others.

 

I know what I'm doing. And, I've absorbed from my parents a tremendous value of customer service. So, I know once I begin getting customers, I'll KEEP customers and help lots of people.

If you cannot assist Flexibility4All financially, please pass the word to your friends and family that I can help stretch out many aches and pains. I have information and videos on Flexibility4All.wixsite.com/website . Please mention Flexibility4All, @Flexibility4All, on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, and in conversation. THANK YOU!!!

I was led to Mankato Family YMCA in 2016, where I taught Simple Stretch, water aerobics, and Exercise Is Medicine to active older adults (AOA) and other special populations for 2.5 years. Through my own return to active living with TBI and healing the resulting injuries which resulted from inflexibility, and through helping people at the Y move with less pain by stretching more and better, I became known as someone who could adapt nearly any exercise for nearly any ability and someone who could help people stretch muscles they didn't know they have. When one of my "snowbird" water aerobics friends reported about a stretch studio she'd tried in California that charges high prices to stretch people in ways she'd experienced me stretching people out of kindness, she suggested I open my own stretch studio in Mankato. 
I looked into that California business and opening a franchise here. Not only did it seem to be too cost-prohibitive, but their techniques don't align well with good stretch research. Theresa loves active living, learning, teaching, and helping others. So, while starting a nonprofit is too complicated for me, I do get to offer scientific research-based stretch services at reasonable prices, use a portable stretch table in order to reach people wherever in the Mankato area they are, and give 10% of my intake to the Upper Midwest chapter if the Multiple Sclerosis Society in order to help people with a degenerative disease that affects cognition and movement, among other life aspects.
I'm getting guidance from Mankato's Small Business Development Center. And, I've been blessed to have access to friends and resources who've helped me begin serving Mankato. I'm currently borrowing a friend's massage table, for which I just was able to order a replacement with December's income.
A significant deterrent to booking more stretches than I am now is my availability. I love that I have inexpensive access to an area church, but I've only gotten two hours each week. I cannot get people who are unavailable during those two hours. And, especially because a new client must complete a health history-waiver before I can begin a stretch, about 15 minutes are added to either a 15- or 30-minute stretch, limiting the number of people I can stretch in two hours to 2-4. So, I'd LOVE to lease a tiny office space. I don't have enough consistent clients yet to pay a lease or utilities, or purchase a few inexpensive seats and a desk.
Besides needing more availability in order to attract clients, one of my greatest needs is multimedia marketing. My target audience in the first several years is retirees. Many use social media, like Facebook. So, Flexibility4All has a Facebook page, along with a free website, a YouTube presence, and a Twitter account. The marketing on Facebook us reasonably-priced. But, many older adults use the local paper and read regional magazines. Ads in those-even small ads-can cost hundreds of dollars.
While I hold a Master's of Science Education in exercise science, am currently certified in American Council on Exercise Group Fitness Instruction (ACE GFI), am American College of Sports Medicine Exercise Is Medicine-certified (ACSM-EIM), and am experienced in both group and personal training, I believe the online training to essentially "trade in" my GFI for an ACSM Exercise Physiologist (ACSM-EP) certification will better-assist me as I work individually with persons in a therapeutic capacity and its relevant continuing education over time will keep me more current on the science of flexibility exercise in helping others. The exam for members (which I am already) is $279. The book required for ACSM-EP's is ACSM's Resources for the Exercise Physiologist, 2nd Edition (ISBN: 978-1-4963-3907-2). Purchase of the paperback book and the online exam study program I'll need (because I received my degree over eight years ago and have memory trouble related to my TBI) is $127.97.
Since I've encountered nearly no one who's familiar with the concept of assisted stretch, I'd like to advertise my services in multiple media types where people of all ages are likely to read them. I've already designed a Facebook business page, so I can purchase Facebook services to share my page and significant page postings to people within several miles of Mankato for $20 or more. There are multiple paper, radio, and television advertisement resources in and around Mankato which I can utilize, but their prices run over $100, often. Anything I can get to use toward advertising, continued education, and space lease would help. And, I ALWAYS appreciate help and use it to further help others.
 
I know what I'm doing. And, I've absorbed from my parents a tremendous value of customer service. So, I know once I begin getting customers, I'll KEEP customers and help lots of people.
If you cannot assist Flexibility4All financially, please pass the word to your friends and family that I can help stretch out many aches and pains. I have information and videos on Flexibility4All.wixsite.com/website . Please mention Flexibility4All, @Flexibility4All, on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, and in conversation. THANK YOU!!!

story:
Help Beirut

As you may have seen the tragedy of the explosion that spread across Lebanon. The raging explosion destroyed most of our homes in Beirut. The damages are disastrous and require full attention. Many people have already lost their homes as well which is why helping the families in need is our top priority.

We are group of people who are deeply touched by this catastrophe and we want to help.

We are working directly on the ground, getting in touch with the family and individuals impacted by the horrible effects of the explosion and identifying those who need our help. 

Our plan is to raise enough fund and donate supplies, food and meds directly to the individuals afflicted by the explosion. After making ends meet , we will shift our focus to compensate some of the losses. 

We believe in full transparency and we will be updating this page regularly to show how your donations are being used to help. 

About us:

Ridwan Flayfel, the launcher of this campaign is pursing a Master's degree at Coventry University, UK. He was born and raised in Beirut, Lebanon.

story:
I WANT TO HELP THOSE THAT NEED A HAND UP,AND NOT A HAND OUT. I EXPERIENCE A RUPTURED BRAIN ANEURYSM THAT CHANGED MY LIFE IN ONE MOMENT.WENT FROM INDEPENDENT TO DEPENDENT.I WAS BROKEN AT THE AGE OF 45 HAD NO WHERE TO TURN, NO MINOR CHILDREN IN THE HOME,SAVINGS GONE DUE TO TRYING TO KEEP ALL MY MATERIAL THINGS WE ALL WORK HARD FOR, LOST THAT BATTLE TOO. SO ASKED THAT QUESTION WHY? WHATS MY PURPOSE TO ALL THIS UNFAIRNESS? THEN REALIZED I'M BLESSED, I'M HERE TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT. THIS NON-PROFIT REALLY MEANS A LOT TO ME. BECAUSE MY FIGHT FOR LIFE NOW HAS PURPOSE. TO LET OTHERS KNOW THEY ARE NOT ALONE AND THERE IS HELP. I HAVE EXPERIANCED ALL THE DOORS SHUTTING ON ME IN THE TIME OF NEED. MAINLY DUE TO NO MINOR CHILDREN IN THE HOME AND HOW IMPORTANT IT IS TO READ THE SMALL PRINT. THIS NON-PROFIT WILL HAVE GROUP SUPPORT,FOOD PANTRY,FINANCIAL AID,TENANT ADVISORY,SPIRITUAL AND MOTIVATIONAL UPLIFTING AND BUDGETING.

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
This fund is to connect displaced workers with new and sustainable earning opportunities.

My Mission.

In the last year, I’ve had a disturbing number of friends and family members lose their jobs for taking time off during an illness, often for jobs that did not provide affordable health care plans.  They worked for companies where the wages were low, the expectations were high, and the working conditions were negative.  They couldn’t save because they didn’t earn enough to live on, many of them that had a second job spent half the earnings just getting to it and now they have nothing to work with when they are trying to start over.

Unless you have a trust fund, sugar sponsor or are coming off a recent lottery win, staying out of work is no fun.  Even when you have help it may not be the kind of help you really need, someone paying a bill, giving you a ride to a job interview or letting you hold a few dollars works for now, but what does it do in the long-term when the people that are helping you are living check to check, just like you were before?  If you are one of those helpers, thank you.  You are amazing.  You made a choice to have a positive impact in someone’s life.  Maybe you’d be interested in something that can make a long-term impact with a short-term contribution.

There is a company called Arise Virtual Solutions.  It operates a virtual call center platform that connects potential workers with Fortune 500 and other companies to work as independent contractors.  Any one can apply to work with Arise.  No experience necessary.  They will train you and get you ready to start over through this new opportunity.  If you already have a job and want to make some additional money you can follow the link http://www.ariseworkfromhome.com/ and get started today.  For the displaced workers we’ve been talking about, there is a bit more to it.

Independent Contractors are responsible for providing their own services and equipment, so to get started working with the platform you’ll need, among other things, a home phone line, high speed internet, a USB headset, a corded home phone with headset and to start your own organization or business unless you are willing to work under another company on the platform.  The estimated start-up cost is between $250 and $770 depending on what services you already have, whether not you organize, incorporate or decide to do neither.  It can sound like a lot until you think about how much you spend helping someone that has been out of work for more than a month.  The bills keep stacking up and there is no return investment on disconnected services like lights, gas and internet, but there is in connecting to earning opportunities where the contractor makes the schedule, the expenses are deductible, transportation costs are reduced, and tax rates are lower. 

If you have questions or concerns, please reach out to me and I will share all the information I have.  Let’s make a difference.

 

 

……………………………………………

Help spread the word.

story:
So why are we doing this?

How did it all start?

Stage 1: We tried a float

Stage 2: We thought it was awesome

Stage 3: We thought it could be even better

Stage 4: We figured out how to make it better

Stage 5: We made it better…you’re welcome :-P

Why is Float the Idea going to become THE spot for the entire Jacksonville community?

We decided that floating should be accessible to everyone. Everyone in our lives, everyone we’ve met can get something meaningful from a float and floating seems so simple. We decided there had to be a way to make it affordable to more people, so we did some research.

A float tank is incredibly simple, yet unbelievably complex. There are so many options and factors to consider, but in the end, they must all have a few key elements that work perfectly. Building a tank that’s comfortable for a variety of individuals of all shapes and sizes, and doesn’t feel stuffy and claustrophobic while being able to block sound and light is not as simple as it may seem from the start. After extensive research and comparison shopping, we found the perfect tanks:

Enter Escape Pod Tanks!

Click here to learn more about our tanks.

As we continued floating, we learned more about ways to complement the experience. Sometimes, after an especially good float, I would feel nervous about going back to my normal stressful life. I didn’t want to lose the bliss I had found. I sometimes wanted a little direction after my float to ease me back to reality without losing the sense of peace I just found.

We decided we wanted a way to truly awaken our senses after using the float to bring them to baseline, and we found the Sunlighten mPulse series full spectrum Infrared Sauna (FSIR). The mPulse not only provides healthy radiant IR heat like the sun without the harmful UV, it also comes with options to stimulate your eyes and ears. The SoSound Hearts provide the relaxing vibrations of Acoustic Resonance Therapy (A.R.T.) and the Chromotherapy light allows you to target specific goals for your wellness. You can even customize the sauna session itself with one of the seven built in wellness sessions developed through years of scientific study.

Click here to learn more about the mPulse Sauna

Click here to learn more about A.R.T.

Click here to learn more about Chromotherapy

After your session in our sauna, you’ve awakened touch, sight and sound.

You step out of your private room and come to our tea bar and atmospheric water generator. Here you can enjoy fresh clean delicious water and quality teas from around the world.

Awaken taste and smell.

At Float the Idea, we welcome you to our House for a complete experience.

You can lounge in our living room to quietly process your experience (decorated with work from local artists using your contributions).

You can create in our playroom after you get the creative juices going during your float.

What We Need

You... 

Really.. we are good to go and chomping at the bit. As soon as we get the ok from the state, we are ready to open.

What You Get

Full Spectrum InfraRed Sauna Wellness Program

Choose from one of seven built in wellness sessions developed through years of scientific study.

Cardio: 45 min (Near, Mid and Far)

Starts at a high intensity to increase heart rate and cardiac output then lowers to sustain heart rate level.  Circulation increases to promote healthy blood pressure.

Detoxification: 37 min (Mid and Far)

Starts at a high intensity to increases the body’s core temperature then reduces to a low, comfortable intensity level.  IR combination improves vascular access flow to reach toxins at the cellular level.

Pain relief: 30 min (Near, Mid and Far)

An IR blend provides natural pain relief by reducing inflammation and swelling while near IR LEDs penetrate the tissue to promote cellular repair at a medium, constant intensity level.

Relaxation: 40 min (Near, Mid and Far)

Far, mid and near infrared rays induce deep relaxation as they relieve muscle tension at a low, comfortable intensity promoting overall stress reduction with regular use.

Weight loss: 30 min (Mid and Far)

Starts at a high intensity to stimulate the cardiovascular system then reduces to a medium level.  As the body works to cool itself, there is an increase in heart rate, cardiac output and metabolic rate similar to exercise.

Anti-aging: 30 min (Near, Mid and Far)

A low, constant intensity level penetrates tissue to help with various skin concerns.  Near IR LEDs improve overall skin tone, elasticity and firmness promoting anti-aging benefits.

90 Minute Float Session

Enter your private room with shower. We provide shampoo, body wash, ear plugs, cotton swabs, petroleum jelly (to cover any small cuts), makeup remover and towels. Take a few minutes to take a cleansing shower before your float session. Then step into one of our Escape Pod Explorer tanks, and enjoy 90 minutes of blissful nothingness. Allow your mind to wander, let the aches and pains melt away. Finish your session with a quick rinse, then come join us for some tea.

90 Minute Float Session and Full Spectrum InfraRed Sauna Wellness Program

Allow us to create a complete program for you: float to rest, then use the sauna to recharge.

3- 90 Minute Floats

One of the things we found most frustrating was paying for things that expire. Stressing about having paid for something I may not have time to do ruins the point of the float experience, so our prepaid packages don’t expire, and you can always share them. We started this place to share the joy of floating with the world. We want you to share that joy with those you care for.

The Risks

WORLD WAR III...

But seriously...there could be a short delay before everything is done, we are dealing with government entities here. But as soon as we get the OK from the state, we are ready to start hosting guests! We will always work hard to make sure everything we do not only meets, but exceeds current standards so we don't expect any issues.

We want you to share that joy with those you care for.The RisksWORLD WAR III...But seriously...there could be a short delay before everything is done, we are dealing with government entities here. But as soon as we get the OK from the state, we are ready to start hosting guests! We will always work hard to make sure everything we do not only meets, but exceeds current standards so we don't expect any issues.

story:
SANAGRAVIDA CROWDFUNDING KAMPANJA

"BE THE CHANGE THAT YOU WANT TO SEE."

(scroll down for english version)

 

Moje ime je Valentina Sumpor, ja sam diplomirana ekonomistica i fitnes trenerica.

2018.godine sam otvorila centar Sanagravida za savjetovanje i vježbanje žena i trudnica u Zagrebu i to je prvi centar koji ima objedinjenu edukaciju, vježbanje za trudnice, tečajeve o trudnoći, dojenju, skrbi za majku i dijete te je mjesto, oaza za sve žene (neovisno jesu li trudne ili ne) koje imaju potrebu za rekreiranjem i radom na sebi.

 

Sa mnom radi moja majka Blaženka Sumpor koja je primalja 34 godine, uz još par suradnica. One pružaju savjete, drže edukacije ženama o trudnoći i svemu što ona donosi te o ženskom zdravlju, a ja vodim centar, držim treninge za trudnice i žene svih dobi, vježbe disanja i meditacije.

 

Susrela sam se s problemima žena u našem društvu i sama proživjela razne; od poremećaja u prehrani, pretilosti do depresije- najčešćih uzroka narušavanja ženskog zdravlja te nedostatka znanja o njihovom vlastitom tijelu.

Ono što me potaknulo na otvaranje centra Sanagravida za unaprjeđenje kvalitete života žena u našoj zajednici, na pokretanje crowdfunding kampanje je potreba žena koju sam prepoznala u društvu i da budem iskrena u sebi samoj.

Poput žena na fotografijama (koje možete vidjeti u našem videu)  i mi želimo podići kvalitetu života svih nas, posebno žena, jer željeli to priznati ili ne, mnogo toga polazi od njih ... njihove brige, nade, nježnosti, empatije, njihove snage i sposobnosti da od četiri hladna zida naprave topli dom. No ipak, u nekim situacijama žene diljem svijeta tretiraju se kao građani drugog reda.

 U našim školama nema seksualnog odgoja i nema edukacije o samopomoći. Nitko ne uči djecu, mlade odrasle osobe kako se trebaju brinuti o sebi, o svojim emocionalnim i fizičkim potrebama.

Većina je zaslijepljena marketinškim kampanjama, trendovima, časopisima i drugim medijima kojima je jedini cilj ostvarivanje profita privlačenjem pažnje, vremena i novca ljudi na koje pokušavaju utjecati.


Želimo napraviti promjenu u društvu tako da sami budemo ta promjena koju želimo vidjeti. 

Kroz trud i napore koje ulažemo u educiranje, poticanje ljudi da vode bolji život, da daju više sebi kako bi mogli više dati zajednici i biti primjer mladim generacijama.

Čvrsto vjerujem da je ključ za kvalitetniji život obrazovanje, cjeloživotno učenje i rad na sebi.

 

Želimo prikupiti novac, zaposliti stručne osobe, oformiti tim i podići Sanagravida centar za žene na veći nivo gdje ćemo u imati edukacije, savjetovanja, radionice o seksualnom odgoju, zdravlju, trudnoći, prehrani, gdje ćemo vježbati, trenirati, raditi na sebi, pomoći ljudima da si pomognu sami, da svi zajedno imamo bolje sutra.

Trenutačno imamo jednu vježbaonu i predavaonicu koje primaju do 6 osoba, nedovoljne su nam mogućnosti za pošteni marketing, za opremu, materijale jer sve što zaradimo ode na najam, režije, spomeničku rentu za prostor i ostale namete. U početcima smo, početci su teški, ali kad se male ruke slože-sve se može.

 

Nelson Mandela je rekao: "Ako želite promijeniti svijet - pomozite ženama."

 

Ostavljam vas s tom rečenicom u nadi da ćete se sjetiti žena svog života koje su vam ga dale (na bilo koji način), uljepšale, koje su vas voljele, koje vas vole te, ukoliko ste vi žena, da osvijestite ženu, curicu u sebi kojoj bi dobro došlo mjesto poput Sanagravide.

 

Postanite zajedno s nama promjena kakvu želite vidjeti u našem društvu.

Podržite nas. :)

HVALA VAM!

 

 

OPREMA/MATERIJALI/USLUGE U KOJE ĆEMO ULOŽITI SREDSTVA:

  • Stol/stalak za projektor
  • Daljinski upravljač- set za projektor
  • Police samostojeće za vježbaonu
  • Platno za projektor
  • Laptop
  • Printer/skener
  • Fotoaparat- za snimanje edukativnih videa
  • Linija za puštanje glazbe na treningu
  • Modeli ženske i muške anatomije- presjeci, reproduktivni organi (6-7 modela)
  • Materijali za izradu Priručnika Briga za majku nakon trudnoće i poroda
  • Materijali za izradu Priručnika Njega novorođenčeta /BABY HANDLING
  • Električna pumpica za dojenje Avent (2 kom)
  • Printanje letaka (cca 500kom)
  • Printanje vizitki (cca 500kom)
  • Prostirke za vježbanje (mekane) atleticore (5 kom)
  • Banana jastuci (4 kom)
  • Mali jastuci za pod leđa (6kom) + navlake
  • Veliki jastuci (4 kom) za meditaciju + navlake
  • Utezi od 0.5kg (8 kom)
  • Utezi od 1 kg (4 kom)
  • Utezi od 2 kg (4 kom)
  • Girja od 4 kg ( 4kom)
  • Štapovi za vježbanje gumirani (4 kom)
  • Latex tube gume za razvlačenje - ruke (2 kom slabi otpor , 2 kom srednji otpor)
  • Reebok step klupice  4 kom
  • Tatamij strunjače (2cm debele)
  • Oprema za Dječji boravak-igraonicu (igračke, strunjače, namještaj)
  • Zapošljavanje Tete Čuvalice za Dječji boravak
  • Zapošljavanje dodatne fitness instruktorice
  • Financiranje usluge stručnjaka za vođenje radionica o seksualnom odgoju, nutricionizmu...

 

 

SANAGRAVIDA CROWDFUNDING KAMPANJA

"BE THE CHANGE THAT YOU WANT TO SEE."

 

My name is Valentina Sumpor, I have a degree in  economy and business and I am a certified fitness trainer.

In 2018. I've opened a center SanaGravida for the improvement of quality of woman's life in our community.

This is the first center in Zagreb and Croatia that has united education about women's health, pregnancy courses and workouts for all women, whether they are pregnant or not.

My mother and my associate, Blaženka Sumpor, has been a midwife for 34 years and along with couple of her colleagues, she provides courses educating women about pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding and overall womens health. And my job is to run, manage the center, provide functional workouts, breathing exercises, relaxation and meditation seasons.

Throughout life I've encountered problems of women in our community and I've gone through some of them myself - from depression and eating disorders to growing obesity, which all together cause the disruption of psychophysical health of women.

The needs I recognized in our society and, to be honest in myself, is what encouraged me to open SanaGravida Center and to launch this campaign.

Like the women on the photos (you can see in our video) - that cover our hallway wall, have done, I also want to raise the quality of life of all of us, especially women, because, whether you want to admit it or not, most things start with them... their care, hope, tenderness, empathy, their strength and the ability to make a warm home out of nothing. And yet in some situations women all over the world are being treated as second-class citizens. There is no sex education in our schools here and no education about self-care. Nobody teaches our kids, young adults about mindfullness, taking care of their emotional and physical needs beacuse most of us are blinded by marketing campaigns, trends, magazines and other media whos only goal is to make a profit by getting attention, time and money of people they try to influence.

 I want to make a change in our society by being the change that I want to see in the world; throught the efforts we put in encouraging people to lead a better life, to give more to themselfs so they could give more back to the community and be an example to the young generations.  I strongly believe the key to healther, better quality life is education and selfcare, beacuse as Rupi Kaur said “HOW YOU LOVE YOURSELF IS HOW YOU TEACH OTHERS TO LOVE YOU”.


At present, we have one room for workouts and one lecture room for classes and education where we workout, educate, learn , hang out, meditate and relax. But unfortunately we have insufficient funds for equipment and materials needed, because everything we earn goes to rent, taxes and other imposed fees.

So this is the moment when we need your support, your help to be the change we wish to see in the society and the world we live in together.

We want to raise money, set up a bigger team, employ experts and place SanagGravida Women's Center to a higher level, where we will have more classes, more workshops, classes about sex education, about women's and men's health and where we will be able to help people to help themselves and have better lives.

Nelson Mandela said: "If you want to change the world – help the women.“

I am leaving you with this sentence, hoping that it will bring  the women of your lives to your minds, women who gave you life in any way, who made it beautiful, who loved you, who love you, and if you are a female and watching this, I hope you will awake that little girl, a woman inside you, who would use a place like SanaGravida.

Thank you. :)

SANAGRAVIDA CROWDFUNDING KAMPANJA"BE THE CHANGE THAT YOU WANT TO SEE."(scroll down for english version) Moje ime je Valentina Sumpor, ja sam diplomirana ekonomistica i fitnes trenerica.2018.godine sam otvorila centar Sanagravida za savjetovanje i vježbanje žena i trudnica u Zagrebu i to je prvi centar koji ima objedinjenu edukaciju, vježbanje za trudnice, tečajeve o trudnoći, dojenju, skrbi za majku i dijete te je mjesto, oaza za sve žene (neovisno jesu li trudne ili ne) koje imaju potrebu za rekreiranjem i radom na sebi. Sa mnom radi moja majka Blaženka Sumpor koja je primalja 34 godine, uz još par suradnica. One pružaju savjete, drže edukacije ženama o trudnoći i svemu što ona donosi te o ženskom zdravlju, a ja vodim centar, držim treninge za trudnice i žene svih dobi, vježbe disanja i meditacije. Susrela sam se s problemima žena u našem društvu i sama proživjela razne; od poremećaja u prehrani, pretilosti do depresije- najčešćih uzroka narušavanja ženskog zdravlja te nedostatka znanja o njihovom vlastitom tijelu.Ono što me potaknulo na otvaranje centra Sanagravida za unaprjeđenje kvalitete života žena u našoj zajednici, na pokretanje crowdfunding kampanje je potreba žena koju sam prepoznala u društvu i da budem iskrena u sebi samoj.Poput žena na fotografijama (koje možete vidjeti u našem videu)  i mi želimo podići kvalitetu života svih nas, posebno žena, jer željeli to priznati ili ne, mnogo toga polazi od njih ... njihove brige, nade, nježnosti, empatije, njihove snage i sposobnosti da od četiri hladna zida naprave topli dom. No ipak, u nekim situacijama žene diljem svijeta tretiraju se kao građani drugog reda. U našim školama nema seksualnog odgoja i nema edukacije o samopomoći. Nitko ne uči djecu, mlade odrasle osobe kako se trebaju brinuti o sebi, o svojim emocionalnim i fizičkim potrebama.Većina je zaslijepljena marketinškim kampanjama, trendovima, časopisima i drugim medijima kojima je jedini cilj ostvarivanje profita privlačenjem pažnje, vremena i novca ljudi na koje pokušavaju utjecati.Želimo napraviti promjenu u društvu tako da sami budemo ta promjena koju želimo vidjeti. Kroz trud i napore koje ulažemo u educiranje, poticanje ljudi da vode bolji život, da daju više sebi kako bi mogli više dati zajednici i biti primjer mladim generacijama.Čvrsto vjerujem da je ključ za kvalitetniji život obrazovanje, cjeloživotno učenje i rad na sebi. Želimo prikupiti novac, zaposliti stručne osobe, oformiti tim i podići Sanagravida centar za žene na veći nivo gdje ćemo u imati edukacije, savjetovanja, radionice o seksualnom odgoju, zdravlju, trudnoći, prehrani, gdje ćemo vježbati, trenirati, raditi na sebi, pomoći ljudima da si pomognu sami, da svi zajedno imamo bolje sutra.Trenutačno imamo jednu vježbaonu i predavaonicu koje primaju do 6 osoba, nedovoljne su nam mogućnosti za pošteni marketing, za opremu, materijale jer sve što zaradimo ode na najam, režije, spomeničku rentu za prostor i ostale namete. U početcima smo, početci su teški, ali kad se male ruke slože-sve se može. Nelson Mandela je rekao: "Ako želite promijeniti svijet - pomozite ženama." Ostavljam vas s tom rečenicom u nadi da ćete se sjetiti žena svog života koje su vam ga dale (na bilo koji način), uljepšale, koje su vas voljele, koje vas vole te, ukoliko ste vi žena, da osvijestite ženu, curicu u sebi kojoj bi dobro došlo mjesto poput Sanagravide. Postanite zajedno s nama promjena kakvu želite vidjeti u našem društvu.Podržite nas. :)HVALA VAM!  OPREMA/MATERIJALI/USLUGE U KOJE ĆEMO ULOŽITI SREDSTVA:

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
How we start

We start from small hand-made soap factory in Cebu Mactan. And we are going to expand to a line of herbal luxury soaps, bath and body products. It takes pride in being an ethical brand that empowers single mothers in the process of making luxury soap. 

We utilize a carefully concocted combination of the healthiest local herbs, fused with imported ingredients, crafted through the traditional cold process of soap making. This allows us to control what goes into our products, and ensure that all our ingredients are of top quality. 

 

Amazing natural resource in Philippines

The main ingredients in our soap products are pure virgin coconut oil; pure virgin moringa oil; and pure organic silk protein, from different parts of the country. Our products are created with assistance from other natural products imported from Thailand, Chili and Europe. Regardless of where they are from, rest assured that quality is consistently of the highest caliber.

 

We need your support for our new project.

HERVEST’s immediate goal is to expand our product line to include varieties of shampoo, conditioner, and multi-purpose body oils — completing a whole set of luxury, organic bath products. 

Our shampoos, conditioners, and body oils contain our signature natural oils and local herbs, and are fortified with silk sericin with natural scent of exotic Ylang Ylang, fresh Bergamot and healing Tea tree. These are available in travel sizes, ensuring that the run-off from your vacation showers in paradise are not harmful to nature.

The aim is to raise P1 million for full-scale production. 

 

INVEST IN HERVEST; INVEST IN COMMUNITY

Besides being environmentally-conscious, Hervest is a socially responsible company. We invest in women — our soap makers are all single mothers from local communities who are taught a livelihood skill by learning how to create homemade soap, and a variety of luxury personal care products. Our goals mainly are, to create employment opportunities for single mothers, and to empower them to achieve a healthy, independent and positive life. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Most of our key ingredients are produced in small factory with hand. And we need to get some of certification papers to export. 

So honestly our shipment may be delayed depend on situation.

In any case we will do my best to produce higher quality products as possible as we can.

Thank you for supporting our project ;)

story:
An astonished boy, ' ahhans  '. The only 12-year-old son of his parents 'Beta Thalassemia Major' affected. After few days blood is to be given. Iron is going down in the body, the bones are becoming depleted, weakening. There can not be a lot out of the house. A child is a child - so much trouble, how much pain is going on silently! Blood is taking 2-3 times a month to take saline, how much so much the needle holes in so little body! Imagine if you are thinking will go! Anything can happen at any time (Allah be merciful)! But bone marrow transplant is likely to be almost healthy, with the help of Almighty!

 

ahhans house in Khulna ... Father's only child. Parents have already given up their husbands to treat the disease that has been infected for 5 months of birth. Money, house houses, land deposits, even mother's jewelry! Family status is said to be poor. And so stay in the house of maternal Aunt (Khala).

 

this boy can not go to school But working at home can work on computers. Programming and maybe this boy 12 years old. From the wealthy of the society, everybody gave a little bit, and probably will be completely healthy. The bright programmers of tomorrow!

Currently there is no fund for its treatment. Because of which medical treatment is not needed for it. But he needs good treatment regularly.

~ Money to send financial aid Development:

Bkash Or Nagad: 

01749965103 (personal)

 

Bank Details: 

Syed Mizanur Rahman

108 151 0121 681

Shantibag Branch, Dhaka

Dutch Bangla Bank LTD

if we all help as per your capacity, maybe the baby will be healthy and in the mother's lap.

story:
The Problem 

Pressure Ulcers Afflict Most Wheelchair Users.  Sensoria® Mat aims to help wheelchair users reduce the risk of ulceration and improve their overall health at the same time.

In addition, 60,000 people in the US lose their lives due to complications related to pressure ulcers. 

The best way to prevent ulcers is to regularly change positions and perform pressure relief activities.

IN ORDER TO REDUCE RISK OF DEVELOPING PRESSURE ULCERS YOU NEED TO PERFORM THESE PRESSURE RELIEF ACTIVITIES MULTIPLE TIMES A DAY!

 

 

The Solution

Option 1:  Sensor-Infused Insert

One Sensoria Mat. Can be positioned under your favorite cushion + Android and iOS App
(does not include cushion)

Color: Black
Size: 16"x20"x1/8"

Option 2:  Sensor-Infused Insert + Cushion

Smart Mat + Custom Handmade Cushion + Android and iOS App

Color: Black
Size: 16"x18"x3.5"
(most common cushion size)

The Sensoria® Mat Cushion is ideal for wheelchair users who:

  • Have partial to full sensation
  • Can perform independent weight shifts
  • Need basic posture support and comfort
  • Have basic positioning needs to assist in the prevention of skin breakdown
  • Need a smart, easy to use, textile pressure sensor infused non-adjustable seating system

This helps wheelchair users reduce the risks of ulceration and improve their overall health at the same time.

  • Selecting the correct wheelchair cushion is important and goes beyond the simple attribute of comfort.
  • Our cushion is designed to mitigate risks of pressure sores or skin irritations by providing wheelchair users with a comfortable and desirable seat.
  • The high-quality memory foam structure redistributes body pressure and provides a stable seating platform.
  • The cushion is durable and can endure extended use, as well as spills thanks to its washable dual cover.
  • It leverages our anti-odor fabric which is usually caused by bacteria thanks to its antimicrobial textile technology.

The Research 

The fully functional Sensoria®️ Mat and Sensoria®️ Mat Mobile App prototype are currently being tested at Rancho Los Amigos National Rehabilitation Center in Los Angeles. Their hospital and research center have earned the highest status as a spinal cord injury care facility and is the only nationally designated spinal cord injury model system located on the west coast.

“After working with other similar products under development in the past, we have been thrilled with both the consistency, quality, and accuracy of the data provided by the Sensoria®️ Mat. The design of the mobile application provides all the necessary information required for the system to be an effective rehabilitation and training tool. 

In addition, this information is presented through an elegant and intuitive interface that has been well-received by our clinicians and patients. We are excited to continue to collaborate with Sensoria Health on refining and testing this exciting new product.”

--Dr. Jeffery Rankin, Ph.D., Co-Director of Rehabilitation Engineering

Funds will help us proceed with the production of the Sensoria®️ Mat so that we can bring it out into the market.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

We’re excited to bring the Sensoria®️ Mat to thousands of people in the US and beyond. And to do this, we’ve worked out a viable plan throughout our crowdfunding campaign. Please know that we are committed to bringing this product to life. That being said, unexpected challenges can always come up in producing a physical product such as this. Should there be any delays, you can count on us to be completely transparent with you and provide you with regular updates. Thank you for your support.

Other Ways You Can Help

It is ok if you are not able to contribute.  Most important is creating awareness for our solutions.  Please share on your social media pages and let your network know of the project.
story_txt:
The Problem 
Pressure Ulcers Afflict Most Wheelchair Users.  Sensoria® Mat aims to help wheelchair users reduce the risk of ulceration and improve their overall health at the same time.

In addition, 60,000 people in the US lose their lives due to complications related to pressure ulcers. 
The best way to prevent ulcers is to regularly change positions and perform pressure relief activities.
IN ORDER TO REDUCE RISK OF DEVELOPING PRESSURE ULCERS YOU NEED TO PERFORM THESE PRESSURE RELIEF ACTIVITIES MULTIPLE TIMES A DAY! 
 

The Solution

Option 1:  Sensor-Infused Insert
One Sensoria Mat. Can be positioned under your favorite cushion + Android and iOS App(does not include cushion)
Color: BlackSize: 16"x20"x1/8"
Option 2:  Sensor-Infused Insert + Cushion
Smart Mat + Custom Handmade Cushion + Android and iOS App
Color: BlackSize: 16"x18"x3.5"(most common cushion size)
The Sensoria® Mat Cushion is ideal for wheelchair users who:

Have partial to full sensation
Can perform independent weight shifts
Need basic posture support and comfort
Have basic positioning needs to assist in the prevention of skin breakdown
Need a smart, easy to use, textile pressure sensor infused non-adjustable seating system







This helps wheelchair users reduce the risks of ulceration and improve their overall health at the same time.

Selecting the correct wheelchair cushion is important and goes beyond the simple attribute of comfort.
Our cushion is designed to mitigate risks of pressure sores or skin irritations by providing wheelchair users with a comfortable and desirable seat.
The high-quality memory foam structure redistributes body pressure and provides a stable seating platform.
The cushion is durable and can endure extended use, as well as spills thanks to its washable dual cover.
It leverages our anti-odor fabric which is usually caused by bacteria thanks to its antimicrobial textile technology.


The Research 

The fully functional Sensoria®️ Mat and Sensoria®️ Mat Mobile App prototype are currently being tested at Rancho Los Amigos National Rehabilitation Center in Los Angeles. In addition, this information is presented through an elegant and intuitive interface that has been well-received by our clinicians and patients. We are excited to continue to collaborate with Sensoria Health on refining and testing this exciting new product.”

story:
The Mental Health Party
Compassion, A Future we can all Believe in.
in dedication of Hamish.


Let me tell you a story,
I am a postgraduate psychologist, with specialisations in health & organisational psychology, with postgraduate qualifications. I entered university mature age, beforehand and during university I worked in nearly every industry imaginable. I also established and directed my own small business employing on average 8 people. Despite my experience and qualifications I have struggled to find decent employment within the mental health field for the last year, unable and unwilling to pay an extra $30,000.00 for placement, bound by bureaucracy and red tape from helping others who are in need.

A working with children’s card gives employers the ability to check criminal records and is necessary for nearly every application in the mental health field; work, education and volunteering. Mine recently expired, so the other day I traveled to Fremantle post office to renew it.

As I got out of the car I noticed a man sat nearby. I could see he needed someone to talk to. Over the next hour we spoke along side the road. He explained that his son died last week. He descried how he was suffering psychologically. Although he didn’t say the words, I assumed from what he said, his son had taken his own life. He told me countless stories of his son trying again and again, to acquire help. Increasing in desperation, continuously being turned away at mental health facilities he eventually resorted to lashing out as a last ditch attempt, a scream for help, to no avail.


The man explained how it wasn’t over, how all the bureaucracy surrounding the event was only causing more hardship, both mental and financial. He too was now becoming desperate for help, and felt like he was beating his head against the wall trying to find any. This at a time where support means so much, is unfathomably beneficial and protective.
He discussed his disappointment with the government. How over his lifetime he’s seen quality of life decline within Australia, and no clear positive direction for the future. I think all of us who have spent enough time in Australia would agree.

Like many of us this man struggled to understand why there is no option of government focused on the well being of the population. He said if only there was a Mental Health party that had people’s best interest at heart, he would vote for them.

We parted ways, and I hope that things have become easier for him since our conversation, but realistically I doubt they have. All he needed at that point was someone to listen to him. I continued to the post office.

With forms and id in hand including my recently expired working with children card I acquired when I was at university, I explained I would like to renew it. “where are you currently working” said the clerk. I am not working in a position that requires a working with children card right now. “It is required for my applications so I can attain a job within the field”. “oh I’m sorry we can’t help you then”. “so, your saying that even though I need this to be employable I cant renew it unless I already am already employed”.  Two of employees simultaneously looked at me, like blank automatons and in sync reply “yes”. It astounds me when people don’t question these things. Chicken and egg bureaucracy at its finest.

What a state we have got ourselves into. Through no fault of our own. The saddest and most frustrating thing is many like me, have the desire, skills and time to have helped that mans son and those like him, but are restrained from doing so. We have a government that values profit over compassion and control over empowerment and social mobility. For these reasons I’ve decided to try and make this man’s idea a reality. To create a political party and hopefully movement dedicated to the well being of the population, and in turn planet. By doing so we will eliminate so many of the problems negatively affecting society and encourage a positive outlook on the future. One that is currently missing and greatly needed.
 

The Plan

The truth is we already know how to design a society that encourages the best in people and allows everyone to prosper. Debt and profit systems are incapable of doing this. These have continued to fail through recorded history. We can see this starting to happen in the world already. The people in charge are continuing the exact same financial tactics that caused the financial crash of 2008 and Australia is leading the charge in credit default swaps. Science and nature are our best teachers. The rat park experiment is a great example.

Ironically enough I began writing this before the most recent political fall out and the loss of another Australian figurehead. But the people we have in charge are neither teachers nor leaders. They are career politicians. Politicians who spend so much time bickering they do not have enough time to understand the world and who have given themselves that many pay rises at the expense of others they no longer live in nor understand the world of the people they are supposed to serve. In essence they have forgotten that leadership is a service, not a privilege.

 

This is not something I necessarily want to do. I value my privacy. I will happily hand over the torch of leadership to anyone more suited and continue to offer my knowledge and guidance. But it is something I know I can do and together we can do it better. At present we do not have a true democracy. We have one that resembles a south park episode. One that is built on the illusion of choice. The two party system.


“We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them”

-Einstein

It’s time for a radically new approach to politics in Australia

A time for new thinking.

 

The Mental Health Party will aim at creating a true democracy, with compassion, sustainability and equal distribution of prosperity generated by new technology. The public is ill prepared for a fast approaching future that current politicians fail to acknowledge. We will work toward improving peoples work life balance without detriment to quality of life. We already understand and have the technology to do this. By strengthening the weakest among us we all prosper.

To determine whether this is something people want and to acquire the funds to bring it to fruition, I have decided to start a crowd-funding opportunity. This is a way of offering my service, ideas and expertise without forcing them on anyone.
 

Vote by Crowd Funding
 

Think of this crowd funding as a vote. I guess I’ve been inspired by the likes of Burnie Sanders and Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. I’ve set the funding to AU$126, 338.45.
 

Rational: Nature is a true democracy, the old peddled belief was that herd animals look to their leader, usually the dominant male, when he moves the heard follows. How convenient.
But this is false. Now we know that they have an equal vote. As soon as over half the heard look in a certain direction the herd will move that way.

At the time of writing this the Australian population is 24,772,247, 51% = 12,633,845. It is also important that all people have the ability to vote so I dropped a couple of decimals. A target of AU$126,338.45 means that if %51 of Australians donate 1 cent each this project will go ahead. This also means that you can vote for 100 Australians with $1. I see no reason, why this amount of money, with your help, spent wisely would not be enough to start a political party and possibly fund an election campaign.

It is worth noting how much liberal and labour spend trying to convince you to vote them into power. What a waste of money.

Final election funding payments summary
July 2016 federal election

Political Party

Interim
Payment ($)

Final
Payment ($)

Total
Payment ($)

Liberal Party of Australia

23,464,128.62

739,025.38

24,203,154.00

Australian Labor Party

22,355,109.55

836,577.02

23,191,686.57

(https://www.aec.gov.au/media/media-releases/201...)

This money, the money used by mainstream parties to persuade the public comes from lobbyists. Lobbyists who often have intentions and motivations, contrary to those that benefit society. Once a political party has been elected they are indebted to these lobbyists and encouraged to push through legislation that benefit the people that paid for them to win the election, not the people that voted for them in. How often do you hear politicians say one thing preceding the election and do the opposite once in power. The Obama campaign won prestigious advertising awards upon his election.

(https://abcnews.go.com/Business/Politics/story?id=7947528&page=1)

This is not a true democracy and we wont have one until this practice is ended. Crowd funding is one way to eliminate this. A party paid for by the people, is owned by the people.

Before opening your wallet, I know there are generous people out there that will want to give more than they can afford. Desperation for change can prompt people to invest heavily. But change rarely comes easy. Please don’t donate more than can afford to lose. Only give an amount you will not miss and that wont impact negatively on your life. If this fundraiser results in the establishment of The Mental Health Party as intended and gains funding from elsewhere, I will endeavor to refund any initial crowd-funding donation upon request.

Initial Spending
Rational

The truth is, that to make this party a reality we don’t need money, we need reach, space, human capital, skills & passion, and public will.

If this crowd funding is successful, I will treat the creation and direction of The Mental Health party as my only full time job and will draw a weekly wage of $330.00 because I don’t need more than that to survive. If the Mental Health Party is successfully established I will increase my wage to minimum wage, It will remain at that level unless I can justify raising it and it is agreed upon by the majority of members, that means you.

Human capital is the most valuable thing we possess as a society. It is unfortunate the current system does not value it as it should. That is why we have an increasing amount of homelessness in Australia and people with University degrees on work for the dole. A new term has emerged over the last decade “the working poor”. Describing those with jobs, sometimes full time jobs who still live below the poverty line. This is due to wage stagnation, lack of work and 50 years of siphoning increasing profits off to the top. The middle class is disappearing. A healthy middle class is one indication of effective government and a positive society.

Many people are generous. It’s usually the poorest among us, that give the most to others in need. I will welcome any input that people are willing to offer. However, your time is valuable. You are valuable. For this reason I will offer as many minimum wage positions/contracts as possible dependent on funding to achieve our initial objectives. I will explain why it is important that these positions are minimum wage in the next section. I will consider everyone for paid roles, and would prefer to be able to pay all volunteers, but priority will go to those who need it most. I will accept aligned help people are willing to offer, and will aim at making the most of the time you invest.

Reach is easy today with the Internet; you just need to hit the share button. Do that. However earlier generations that hold a large portion of the vote, use the Internet less and are often more rigid in their thinking. Word of mouth, taking time to understand and explain the The Mental Health party to the ones you love who do not have access to, or use the internet would be one of the most helpful and effective ways to counter this. Another way is to take the message to them. For this reason one of the main initial goals of The Mental Health party is to create a prime time advertisement to reach the above mentioned demographic and counter the mainstream political propaganda.

My idea for our commercial is also simple. You’ve seen them time and time again. Political adverts using actors pretending to be an assortment of real people, reading consecutive lines off a script, telling you how great a certain politician is. Ours will be the same, but it will be honest and all it will take is you, your webcam, a script and some editing. I’m just a little sick of seeing actors pretending to be tradies with brand new Hi Vis shirts and a left handed hammer.

Its no wonder political campaigns cost so much, they constantly interrupt your day. The prices for advertising are extortionate, and can well surpass $150,000.00 per 30 seconds. Yes you read correctly. For this reason the bulk of the crowd funding will probably go on airing the advert once, at the best time, on the most channels possible.
https://www.news.com.au/entertainment/tv/k-for-30-secs-you8217ve-got-to-be-kidding-the-most-expensive-tv-shows-for-advertisers-in-australia-revealed/news-story/dd39a4a74c83dfbcd1c020f1b9a1f2e8

 

Initial Break Down/ Road Map

In no particular order.

Office Space
Although not required due to the Internet, I believe face-to-face contact is important. It is also important to be accessible to the public. I will not allocate funds to renting office space unless voted upon. Rent for prime locations is overly expensive. However I often see empty office blocks in the centre of town. If you are willing to donate office space that is not in use I would love to hear from you.

Requirements:

  • Administration (in anticipation of a torrent of emails)
     

Website

Server costs will be covered by crowd funding unless voluntarily supplied. Initially the website will act as a point of contact for all interested parties. Registration of members who will have a vote on how the party develops. Voting portal. An honest, transparent, ledger defining fund allocation and expenditure. Information relevant to party decisions. Printable “honest” propaganda (We need a name for this) for anyone who wants to hit the streets.

Requirements:

  • Web developers
  • Designers
  • Artists
  • Copy Writers
  • Server Space
  • Social media fanatics (reach)
  • Block Chain developers (transparency, immutability, accessibility)
  • Crowd Sourcing Enthusiast

Commercial

With any luck this campaign will go viral enough to make the 6:30 news. Then we don’t need to waste money on advertising.

Requirements:

  • Script writer
  • Actresses/Actors (Anyone with a webcam)
  • Video Editors

The first Goal is getting the message out there, and determining whether this is something Australians want. The next step comes when
The Mental Health party wins the election.

One of the automatic responses spouted by politicians to justify inaction is “where will the money come from?”. If elected my first course of action will be to reduce leading political wages to minimum wage, I will also accept this wage. This obviously cannot happen instantly otherwise they will all end up on the streets too. The idea behind this is simple. Incentive. Real leaders lead from the trenches, they are first to charge into the battle field, they lead and inspire from the bottom. They do not judge from the top. In doing so they understand those they serve.

For this idea alone The Mental Health Party will gain no traction unless the public want it to. It may be ridiculed by media and hated by those currently in power. However, It will also ensure the people in positions of power are there for the right reasons, the Australian people, our future generations and environment. It will encourage policy to lift people out of poverty and re-establish a healthy middle class. This is wear the first of the money will come from.

My second course of action will be to establish an efficient, transparent online voting system that will allow members to directly vote on ideas and policy they are interested in. To start Members must be residential Australians. Membership will always be free.

Thirdly I will instate an unbiased scientific body, accessible to both the public and politicians. One accessible for politicians used to be a reality. Intended to adequately counsel parliament on any decision, taking into account current scientific knowledge. It was deemed unnecessary and discontinued. Now lobbyists have equal influence over the scientific community. For a true democracy to exist, voters decisions need to be educated ones.
 

I am by no means finished writing this proposal. I was going to include all the ways we can improve our situation and society. However considering we don’t currently have a leader I thought I’d strike while the iron is hot. Stand by for the next instalment.

Together we can do this, and can work towards a future we can all be proud of.

Vote In

The Mental Health Party
& vote
DM for PM
for the coming election.
There may not be a box on the ballet but you have a Pen.
 

Remember a vote for The Mental Health Party is not a vote for one person to lead.

You are voting for the idea that by strengthening the weakest among us, without asking for anything in return, we all prosper.
 

To be continued…

TheMentalHealthParty@protonmail.com

BTC donations: 17CYwNaH3kRa1HGmQypu9ZzDSCCpPPTHPj
!! Please double check BTC address on official Crowd Funding page to avoid scams.!!
See official Indigogo Campaign Pitch

Political adverts using actors pretending to be an assortment of real people, reading consecutive lines off a script, telling you how great a certain politician is. Ours will be the same, but it will be honest and all it will take is you, your webcam, a script and some editing. I’m just a little sick of seeing actors pretending to be tradies with brand new Hi Vis shirts and a left handed hammer.Its no wonder political campaigns cost so much, they constantly interrupt your day. The prices for advertising are extortionate, and can well surpass $150,000.00 per 30 seconds. Yes you read correctly. For this reason the bulk of the crowd funding will probably go on airing the advert once, at the best time, on the most channels possible.https://www.news.com.au/entertainment/tv/k-for-30-secs-you8217ve-got-to-be-kidding-the-most-expensive-tv-shows-for-advertisers-in-australia-revealed/news-story/dd39a4a74c83dfbcd1c020f1b9a1f2e8
 
Initial Break Down/ Road Map 
In no particular order.
Office SpaceAlthough not required due to the Internet, I believe face-to-face contact is important. It is also important to be accessible to the public. I will not allocate funds to renting office space unless voted upon. Rent for prime locations is overly expensive. However I often see empty office blocks in the centre of town. If you are willing to donate office space that is not in use I would love to hear from you.
Requirements:
Administration (in anticipation of a torrent of emails) 
Website
Server costs will be covered by crowd funding unless voluntarily supplied. Initially the website will act as a point of contact for all interested parties. Registration of members who will have a vote on how the party develops. Voting portal. An honest, transparent, ledger defining fund allocation and expenditure. Information relevant to party decisions. Printable “honest” propaganda (We need a name for this) for anyone who wants to hit the streets.
Requirements:

Web developers
Designers
Artists
Copy Writers
Server Space
Social media fanatics (reach)
Block Chain developers (transparency, immutability, accessibility)
Crowd Sourcing Enthusiast

Commercial
With any luck this campaign will go viral enough to make the 6:30 news. Then we don’t need to waste money on advertising.
Requirements:

Script writer
Actresses/Actors (Anyone with a webcam)
Video Editors

The first Goal is getting the message out there, and determining whether this is something Australians want. The next step comes whenThe Mental Health party wins the election.
One of the automatic responses spouted by politicians to justify inaction is “where will the money come from?”. If elected my first course of action will be to reduce leading political wages to minimum wage, I will also accept this wage. This obviously cannot happen instantly otherwise they will all end up on the streets too. The idea behind this is simple. Incentive. Real leaders lead from the trenches, they are first to charge into the battle field, they lead and inspire from the bottom. They do not judge from the top. In doing so they understand those they serve.For this idea alone The Mental Health Party will gain no traction unless the public want it to. It may be ridiculed by media and hated by those currently in power. However, It will also ensure the people in positions of power are there for the right reasons, the Australian people, our future generations and environment. It will encourage policy to lift people out of poverty and re-establish a healthy middle class. This is wear the first of the money will come from.
My second course of action will be to establish an efficient, transparent online voting system that will allow members to directly vote on ideas and policy they are interested in. To start Members must be residential Australians. Membership will always be free.Thirdly I will instate an unbiased scientific body, accessible to both the public and politicians. One accessible for politicians used to be a reality. Intended to adequately counsel parliament on any decision, taking into account current scientific knowledge. It was deemed unnecessary and discontinued. Now lobbyists have equal influence over the scientific community. For a true democracy to exist, voters decisions need to be educated ones. 
I am by no means finished writing this proposal. I was going to include all the ways we can improve our situation and society. However considering we don’t currently have a leader I thought I’d strike while the iron is hot. Stand by for the next instalment.
Together we can do this, and can work towards a future we can all be proud of.
Vote In
The Mental Health Party& voteDM for PMfor the coming election.There may not be a box on the ballet but you have a Pen. 
Remember a vote for The Mental Health Party is not a vote for one person to lead.
You are voting for the idea that by strengthening the weakest among us, without asking for anything in return, we all prosper. 
To be continued…TheMentalHealthParty@protonmail.comBTC donations: 17CYwNaH3kRa1HGmQypu9ZzDSCCpPPTHPj!! Please double check BTC address on official Crowd Funding page to avoid scams.!!See official Indigogo Campaign Pitch

story:
Legality & Similar Concerns

Especially if you just watched the video in which I forgot to address some of the key risks, please follow the FAQ link where I answer some of the common questions that are coming in about legality, customs, and supporting this effort longterm.

FAQ: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/deliver-crit...

Background

In 2018, Lebanon was struck with a catastrophic economic collapse due to decades of corruption and mismanagement in their government. The value of their currency plunged and eventually it became nearly impossible to import goods from other places. It has reached the level of a major humanitarian crisis in 2021 in which Lebanese people cannot even find aspirin and children are sick and dying from easily treatable maladies.

This is a great article if you're interested in how the situation came about:  https://www.thenation.com/article/world/lebanon...

I have always wanted to visit Lebanon. From childhood, when our closest family friend threw dinner parties with spreads of kibbeh, manaquish, and sublime Lebanese rice, with memories of his family and the intersection of cultures they came from, even to my adulthood when I tasted Lebanese wine and wondered, "how is this so beautiful?," visiting Lebanon has been a lifelong dream. And with my eyesight deteriorating rapidly, it is now or never.

Sadly, the economic situation has only worsened and the delta variant is tearing through the country. Cancellation seemed like the sensible course of action. I didn't mind seeing a country when it's not at its best, but I also didn't want to be a burden on it.

Inspiration

When I found out that one of my contacts in Beirut had been hospitalized with Covid, I began googling to find out what kind of care he would receive and what he might need. I came across articles and tweets of Lebanese showing how they stuffed their luggage full of critically needed items (e.g. https://observers.france24.com/en/middle-east/2... returning to the country. I realized I could do the same and repurpose my trip for something less self-serving.

I am flying out of JFK on Wednesday with my bags full of medicines and personal care items. I have already spent about $3000 on OTC products and prescription medications shipped from a doctor (who is actually an angel) in California. I am working with the Osman family who've coordinated lists of needs from Ashraf Pharmacy in Beirut and from a pharmacist working with Doctors Without Borders in the Beqaa Valley to plan how best to use the remaining space. But some of these medications are very expensive: one is $15/pill and honestly I had no idea asthma inhalers were $400! So I'm asking your help in filling up my bags to save some lives.

We know it's not a longterm solution. But in the near term, I am a man with three suitcases, and there's no reason not to leverage this opportunity to ease some pain.

What We Need

It's pretty simple

I am raising $10,000 to subsidize the actual medications and personal care items

I need New York metro area doctors who can assist with prescriptions and procurement

Share with anyone in your network who can contribute

Risks:

This isn't a low-risk endeavor, so I want to be candid about what some of the risks are and how we're managing them.

Theft: always a risk with luggage. The strategy here is to put the valuable medicines in my hand-carried bags and use the luggage for things of lower value. I think this will be effective, and the fact is that antacids, anti-diarrheals, ibuprofen, antifungal creams, etc. are low value to thieves.

Customs: I feel somewhat confident in this area since I'm going to be among a hundred plus people who've done a very similar thing. I'm also receiving practical advice now from experienced medicine mules and I even have a few tricks up my sleeves from when my family lived in Egypt (like placing menstruation products on the top) that used to work great at getting us through.

Transport: Ahmad Osman has volunteered to pick me up and get these items to the right people (as well as supporting me non-stop in planning for the last four days in spite of having just had surgery and being very busy--thank you!). He's already looking out for and preventing the dumb things that tourists like me can do coming out of an airport. 

Insufficient Prescriptions to Buy What's Needed: This is our biggest risk currently, but the management of it is not difficult in the sense that we can still buy more OTC items or work with our Medicins sans Frontieres pharmacist to find another channel.

Ultimately, if some portion is stolen or confiscated, the sheer quantity we're bringing will more than offset it.

Here's What You're Buying

This is a rapidly-evolving list but will give you a sense of what I'm taking. For the more expensive prescription drug items, our budget gets us around 10 courses of treatment for most. The OTC items have been purchased much larger bulk quantities to maximize luggage space.

●Ibuprofen syrup (pediatric) x10

●Azithromycin (pediatric) x5

●antiemitic (adult) Domperidone or US equiv x5

●antiemitic (pediatric) Domperidone or US equiv x5

●antibacterial Cefixime (pediatric) x10

●antibacterial Cefixime (adults) x5

●Augmentin/amoxicillin (pediatric) x10

●Augmentin/amoxicillin (adults) x5

●Voltaren or US equiv x10

●Ciprofloxacin (adult) x10

●Topical corticosteroid cream x10

●Topical antibacterial cream x10

●antifungal (adult) Daktarin or US equiv (monistat) x10

●antifungal (pediatric) Daktarin or other oral gel/oral cream can be used in infants x10

●Probitiotic for pediatric with diarrahea x10

●Relvar inhalers x10 (2 so far)

●Ramipril 10mg x10

●Moxonidine or US equiv

●Clopidogrel 75mg x10 (have 360ct so far)

●Metronidazole syrup or US equiv x10

●Acetaminophen/Ibuprofen combo pain reliever (4x bulk bottles)

●Multivitamin male x10 (or equiv in bulk bottles)

●Multivitamin female x10 (or equiv in bulk bottles)

●Multivitamin generic (or equiv in bulk bottles)

●Multivitamin pediatric x10 (or equiv in bulk)

●Omeprazole 20mg (x10)

●Acetaminophen otc x3 bulk bottles

●cough drops (adult or ped) x4 bulk pouches

●First aid kits

●Band aids

●Sleep aids

●Vitamid C

●adult probiotic

●anti-diarrheal otc

●melatonin 5mg

●vitamin d3 50mg

●fish oil supplements

●menstruation products

●anti-allergy adult

●anti-allergy pediatric

●batteries

●nutrition bars

●high-protein snack

●small individually wrapped sweet for kids.
