story:
Nery es una increíble persona. La conocí hace 11 años, cuando nació su interés por el coaching de vida.  

Nery ha apoyado a la transformación de miles de personas, más de 6000 hasta el momento y dentro de su corazón ella quiere impactar a muchas personas más.

 

--------------------------------------------------------

 

Apoyémosla a seguir con su misión

Ella desde hace 4 meses se enteró que padece cáncer, uno poco conocido incluso por doctores, llamado angiosarcoma (es el 2% de todos los casos de cáncer), que ha comprometido su rodilla y su hígado. Gracias a Dios, Nery ya se realizó 2 operaciones, y está a la espera de iniciar su tratamiento para evitar que el cáncer  se siga expandiendo en otras partes de su cuerpo.

 

¿Cómo podemos apoyar?

- Puedes donar en esta página y así contribuirás a solventar su tratamiento y medicinas, que hasta el momento le ha costado $15 000. Elige un monto según tu voluntad, todo apoyo será de gran valor, ya que ella en este momento no está trabajando y tiene un hermoso hijo que la necesita - Salvador-, así como gastos que cubrir cada mes.

- Puedes acompañar tu apoyo con oraciones para ayudarla a sanar y darle fuerzas.

- Puedes conectarla con médicos expertos en angiosarcoma, ya que al momento no hay mucha investigación al respecto y son pocos los médicos especialistas en este tipo de cáncer.

 

Tu apoyo y tu amor serán fundamentales para este momento en la vida de Nery.

Tengamos fe absoluta en que Nery saldrá de esta etapa con nuestro apoyo y seguirá brillando y ayudando a otros a brillar como siempre. Parte de su misión de vida a raíz de esta experiencia en su salud es desarrollar un programa de apoyo, acompañamiento y recuperación de personas que padecen enfermedades como el cáncer, apoyando a que el cuerpo sane también desde dentro, desde la mente, las emociones y el espíritu...permitamos que ese sueño sea posible! Estamos seguros que será de ayuda para todas las personas que atraviesan experiencias difíciles como la que le toca vivir hoy a ella, pero que estamos seguros pronto ya va a superar!

 

¡Te amamos Nery!

 

Gracias por apoyar.

story:
Scent Breeze spray is formulated using 100% natural  ingredients also hypoallergenic so there are no harmful effects even if used frequently.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Like any human enterprise, a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo is not without risks and challenges. The main risk is that the campaign would go unfunded and we would be stuck with the losses incurred for organizing the campaign. But this is mostly our problem.

As a backer, you are more interested of how our risks might impact you. The main risk for you as a backer is that your pledge would not be rewarded with the prize promised. We will make sure this would not happen under any circumstances.

We’ll explain how. But first, the risks:

1. Manufacturing risks. Production has its own risks that we might not control. Our suppliers might fail to produce on time, or at the quality expected, or they might go out of business.

-> Measures to mitigate: We have taken measures to prevent that. We work with established suppliers that have a goods background of success. We will invest some of our own resources before the campaign ends but after the campaign is fully funded, so that we make sure production is completed on time.

 

2. Product quality risks. With every production, no matter the product or the company manufacturing it, there will be a small amount of damaged goods. This is something that can’t be avoided but just reduced in scale our product will be tested and retested for ph, shelf life and integrity.

-> Measures to mitigate: Once production is completed we arrange for quality check inspection. We are one of the fewest companies that arrange for full quality check of all products and not just a batch sample. We think that it’s more important to make sure every product is in the right shape before is delivered, even though that means a higher cost for us. We'll also replace any damaged product whatever the reason In the end, whatever happens, we will deliver the products, even if it means incurring a loss for us.

The only risk you are taking is that your reward might not reach you on time, but we'll do our best to avoid that. We will publish frequent updates on fulfillment status and you’ll always be up to date with the status.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! My name is Kyle Ogle and I am a Nurse Practitioner and product developer. My experience in healthcare expands over 10+ years and I have recently cared for patients with sleep apnea and snoring. The purpose of my product is treatment of position-dependent snoring and sleep apnea that provides a new level of comfort and convenience not currently available on the market.  The idea stemmed from over a year of treating and coaching patients regarding how to better manage their snoring and sleep apnea; I would often tell applicable patients to combine two body pillows as a solution because other methods currently available  were often not ideal for them (such as using tennis ball t-shirts). Snoring and sleep apnea are often worse when lying on the back. 

This product is to ensure that the user maintains a side-lying position while sleeping throughout the night to minimize/eliminate snoring and to help treat sleep apnea. The concept is developed and a prototype has been created. The product is patented. 

If not treated, sleep apnea can contribute to a number of health issues such as high blood pressure, stroke, heart failure, heart attack, and/or diabetes. This project is very important to me and my family as we have lost a loved one to stroke. It is my hope that introducing new methods of mitigating position-dependent snoring and/or sleep apnea risk will improve the lives of many. 

What We Need 

The funding for this product will be used to cover materials and manufacturing cost for the initial batch of units. If the goal is not met, excess funds will be reallocated to the American Stroke Foundation. 

The Impact

By contributing to this project, you will help make an impact in the lives of many that may struggle with position-dependent sleep apnea and/or snoring. If left untreated, this has the potential to lead to or negatively affect many comorbid medical conditions such as high blood pressure, diabetes, stroke, and more. 

Risks & Challenges

There may be risks and obstacles faced with this project regarding the cost of initial manufacturing as well as final adjustments that may have to made to the product to optimally benefit users. With my experience in helping sleep apnea and/or patients that snore combined with assistance from this campaign, I am confident this product will reach its goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, that is okay! Help get the word out and make some noise about this campaign that can benefit the health of many people with snoring and/or sleep apnea! Make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools. 

No, some patients may have sleep apnea that is to severe to manage effectively with lateral positional therapy alone. Most patients have worse snoring while in the supine (back) position, so it could still help with this aspect in this specific population.

If you cannot contribute, that is okay! Help get the word out and make some noise about this campaign that can benefit the health of many people with snoring and/or sleep apnea! Make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools. 
No, some patients may have sleep apnea that is to severe to manage effectively with lateral positional therapy alone. Most patients have worse snoring while in the supine (back) position, so it could still help with this aspect in this specific population.

story:
The inspiration for this project comes from a quote in a Kurt Vonnegut quote: “Theres only one rule I know of, babies… God damn it, you’ve got to be kind.”

A few years ago we printed vinyl stickers with the words “Be Kind.”, handed these out and asked people to stick them up in places around the city where you might not expect to see a positive message.

So..  we are hoping to expand upon that basic idea and see if we can bring this simple message to more people by funding a large billboard on a major highway leading into Johannesburg. In the same way where internet users often opt to pay money to have advertising removed from an app or service, we are asking you to contribute to this project so that we can reclaim one of the spaces traditionally used for advertising.  and transform it into a space that serves as a daily reminder to try to approach any person, act or situation with more kindness. 

The funds will go directly into funding the printing, installation and one month rental of a large billboard. As perks we are also offering high quality T-shirts, Tote Bags and Posters and the funds will also be allocated to the manufacturing of these items.

Our hope is that if enough people see this daily reminder it may have a snowball effect and inspire more people to engage in acts of kindness however big or small. It is as simple as that.

story:
Hello + Welcome to the Buddha Bus Journey!

 

A Journey of Massage, Wellness, Community and Nurturing the Human Spirit. My name is Theresa Howell. I am a Licensed Massage Therapist and have been practicing Massage/Bodywork in Washington State for the past 10 years. I have a great passion and skill for connecting people to the healing power of the Mind+Body connection through Massage.  

I am here with the dream to bring Massage, Wellness, Connection, Education & Awareness to your community (Tacoma, Olympia, Seattle, Puyallup, Gig Harbor, Portland, Boise + More!) by way of a soon-to-be Renovated 36' Retired School Bus! I have purchased the bus and have it fully gutted with blueprint plans to create a beautiful, bohemian, eco-friendly, functional massage space where one can find healing through bodywork, workshops around wellness and self-care, monthly charity events benefiting YOUTH + VETERANS and more! 

It is my goal and intention to raise $20,000 in just 32 days! We are turning to the YOU the community to help raise these funds because we are creating this for YOU, OUR COMMUNITY. The funds will be used specifically for the (1) the full renovation, (2) the merchandise rewards for each donation + shipping (check out the SWEET SWAG to the right) and (3) two kick-ass VIP PARTY'S once the renovations are done to celebrate its completion and show off all your donations+ our hard work that will be hosted in TACOMA, WA + BOISE, ID sometime in Spring 2019.  

This dream will become a reality with YOUR generous and kind support through Donations + Sharing about our goals with your TRIBE of people! I am so excited to share with you the process of the renovation as well as the positive benefit The Buddha Bus will have on our community. Imagine... a space where all people can have access to the healing benefits of massage, a space where other wellness providers collaborate to offer charitable events benefiting those in need, workshops and retreats that connect us to ourselves, each other and nature in the great PNW! 

SO HERE'S WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET:

$20,000 will fully renovate this SCHOOL BUS and get it on the road to a neighborhood near you! Here's what your donations will achieve!!!

From insulation, frame work, plumbing (CAN'T WAIT TO USE THE COMPOST TOILET!), solar power panels, wood flooring, warm lighting, AC/Heat Unit, Paint, Awning, to a new set of back tires (they are a bit tired after 20 years of transporting a bunch of kiddos)... and so much more. Some of the work we will do ourselves for cost effectiveness (because there is a Youtube video on everything, am I right?).Things where we really need expertise skills on like electrical and servicing the vehicle, we will utilize people in our community and help $upport them in their trade to get the job done.

Here's the catch: If we DO NOT meet our goal of $20,000 within 32 days, all backers will be refunded by Indiegogo within 5-7 business days. In order to keep that from happening it is imperative that you talk about this campaign and share it with as many people as you can. Your family, friends, coworkers (ya, even that guy you never talk to that stares at you from the water cooler...) and encourage them to be apart of the journey too!  PLUS there is a fun PERK TO REFERRING! For those who refer someone and that person donates at the $100 level or higher (your person must let us know you referred them) You will receive a 70 HR Natural SOY SCENTED CANDLE Handcrafted by Me! 

NOW FOR THE FUN PART: HELPING HAS IT'S REWARDS! HERE'S WHAT YOU GET:

  • $10 (unlimited availability) - Your name Immortalized & hanging in a beautiful frame that will travel with the Buddha Bus always.
  • $25 (unlimited availability) - STICKER  w/ Beautiful Buddha Bus Logo + Name Immortalized
  • $50 (unlimited availability) - MARKET TOTE w/Beautiful Buddha Bus Logo + Sticker + Name Immortalized
  • $100 (unlimited availability) - CAMPFIRE MUG w/ Beautiful Buddha Bus Logo + Market Tote + Sticker + Name Immortalized
  • $350 (only 50 available) - Invite Only VIP PARTY with the BUS (estimated SPRING 2019 in Tacoma, WA + Boise, ID) TBA once Bus is renovated & ready to Launch + Mug + Market Tote + Sticker + Name Immortalized
  • $1, 000 (only 10 available) - THE 1st people to receive a (2 Hour) MASSAGE on The Buddha Bus when it is completed + VIP PARTY Invite (Tacoma or Boise) + Mug + Market Tote + Sticker + Name Immortalized.

Please note (this is the official fine print): Merchandise + PERK Candle will be delivered/shipped sometime within approx. 30-60 days that the BUS is funded unless you attend the VIP PARTY (you'll receive your SWAG like a Hollywood Star attending the Oscars at this event!) Funds do not become available until a few weeks after funding. Shipping to US is free. Shipping outside of US will have additional cost. 

HERE'S THE COOL PART! The Impact on PNW & BEYOND:

Alright, so how exciting for the PNW to have it's very own BUDDHA BUS roll'n into its neighborhoods... but what about the REST OF THE WORLD?! Aside from the SWEET SWAG you receive with your kind Donation, you can be proud to know that your donation will not just be benefiting those who receive massage and attend workshops or retreats within its happy, bohemian walls... I have spent a great deal over the last 10 years using donated massage to gift back to my community. As a proud wife to a Marine Veteran, I have a great passion and appetite to help VETERANS who have served our country. What better way to give back to this great community of men and women who have sacrificed so much as well as those who struggle with PTSD from thier time serving, then through Massage and the Mind+Body connection.  The BUS will be accessible to this great community 1x a month at no charge for treatment sessions. Another great passion of mine and an area I see such a need is YOUTH. I am a blessed Mom to a tenacious 8 year old. They are often on the go as much as we are and with such an increased emphasis on technology and screen time, children and teens are often struggling themselves with anxiety, disconnection to their body and breathing, nature and just being still. Collaboration with several other professionals in the healing arts and health providers to create a monthly program where the BUS pulls into a school and utilizes the space to teach Mind+Body awareness to learn healthy ways to center and ground themselves and grow up with these tools is one of the most important things this BUS will do. With your donations, we can give back to our children and the community through this vessel!

Risks & Challenges

"Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all" -Helen Keller

This is one of the MOST daring things I have done in my 45 years. It really started out a LOVE STORY. A love for helping others. I had this dream for over 5 years now and it has become so much bigger than myself. Then massage. It's really about connecting communities in a healing way. Its something that will be infectious and create inspiration in others to take risks, dare to dream, put themselves out there to make their dreams a reality. I am so humbled and grateful to be used in this way. The Buddha Bus has a magical energy that will reach into your soul and connect you to something adventurous, something so giving. KNOW that this will happen but with your donated support it will happen within a favorable time and a quality touch with YOU in mind at the forefront no matter the challenges that will arise. I am not afraid of challenges, hard work and problem solving. I have always appreciated the Journey as much as the destination. I have the vision. I just need your help to complete the picture!

Other Ways You Can Help

IT'S OKAY, not everyone can donate. WE STILL LOVE YOU. There are other impactful ways you can make this dream a reality if you don't donate. It's soooo easy and gets our BIG LOVE too!

YOU CAN SIMPLY GET THE WORD OUT and make some noise about THE BUDDHA BUS by sharing, sharing, sharing about it!

  • There are some great share tools on this page (above to the right side) that Indiegogo provides that you can use with social media (facebook, instagram, twitter, email link) and then of course you can just talk about it to someone ... you know, like face to face.... THE OLE' FASHION WAY OF CONNECTING! The more you share, the more chance you have at earning a referral perk!

FOR MORE INFORMATION about ME, MASSAGE + BUDDHA BUS (as if this was not ENOUGH!) go to http://www.buddhabusmassage.com/

Kindest thanks for coming along on this JOURNEY. 

-theresa

story:
WHO WE ARE..

The inspiration for the company was the realization that there is a need for a company that can provide medical-grade marijuana to people suffering from pain to create a more natural way to address their medical conditions rather than pharmaceutical medications, which often results in patients becoming addicted to pain pills. Coanake Corp. is a military veteran owned and operated company. Coanake Corp will begin its operation in 2017. The company will be headquartered in the city of Boston in the state of Massachusetts. Its operations will expand regionally.

The machine behind the green

The Coanake Corp. will have an amazing line up of enthusiastic, friendly and professional staff.  In the words of Maya Angelou, "a person may forget a face and a name, but they will never forget how you made them feel," and we couldn't agree more!  All of our staff will be trained on proper customer service etiquette with quarterly follow ups and reviews.  Our services will be fast, but never lacking quality. The Coanoke Corp. understands the goals of our staff and will allow growth to leadership positions based on merit.  We will have a highly motivated leadership team with years of industry and customer service experience, that will maintain the company morale, and help Coanoke Corp. grow as a company.  There is no I in team, but there is me, and each staff member will be asked what they will bring to the company and their teams and be held to it.  Everyone has a voice and unity promotes developmental growth!

Whats on the menu

Coanake Corp. is proud of its main service line and the features and benefits that make up its attractiveness to this ever-growing market. The main features and benefits of its main service to its customers include that we offer a new kind of pain relief that is an all natural product and less harmful than pharmaceutical medication. Coanake Corp will specialize in providing a variety of different products that are not normally found in the local region. Some of the strengths and capabilities of its main service as it pertains to potential market, ease of administration and availability include that we will consistently treat patients with the utmost dignity and respect while providing them with the finest quality products available in a stress-free environment designed to ensure complete client satisfaction. 

What are we offering?

its main service line features and benefits that make up its attractiveness to this ever-growing market. Coanoke Corp. will aim to be the everything Cannabis store.

  • Cannabis( marijuana flower)
  • Edibles
  • Pre-rolls
  • Concentrate
  • Vapor pens
  • Beverages  cannabis-enfused (ex: Coffee/water)
  • Tinctures and sublingual
  • Topicals
  • Cannabis capsules
  • giftbox(multi-item pre package sets)

About Coanake Corp.

Coanake Corp is proud of the accomplishments of the people that have made up this company. Coanake Corp is particularly proud of the fact that this is a military veteran owned and operated company that will give back to people in the community by performing an essential service that contributes directly to the stability of the nation’s economy through the creation of jobs and economic stimulus. The company is also particularly proud of the fact that we possess a dedicated management team that demonstrates honesty, integrity and professionalism in all aspects of operations. All our associates are carefully prescreened to ensure the highest standard of quality and we consistently strive to provide a superior level of service designed to exceed the expectations of our clients. Coanake Corp will maintain its headquarters where its management staff will be in the city of Boston in the state of Massachusetts. 

Justin Ruiz, Co-Owner

Justin Ruiz having served in the military and attended the University of Maryland for his Bachelor’s degree in business management. He has excellent leadership skills and can simplify problems. He has successfully retrograde 6 million dollars worth of equipment with AC first. He has market and costumer knowledge and can builds leaders, accomplish goals and bring artistic views to life. He also has extensive familiarity with evolving tech and the industry.

Napoleon Velasquez, Co-Owner

As a native Bostonian Napoleon Velasquez, co-founder of Coanake Corp., has seen firsthand the effects of prescription drug abuse and the devastation it has caused families. Having knowledge of the business and experience in the cannabis industry he will help to bring Coanake Corp. to its full potential.

 

Here's Why We Need Your Help

One of the main reasons we need your help is because banks typically don't provide loans to marijuana ventures that are directly involved with the plant or its derivatives. The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC). generally speaking will not insure a bank that takes on "existential" risks, which would include loans to companies in violation of federal law. Meaning it is not federaly recognized and with any business the startup cost is initially the most significant in getting the doors to open.  Of the total amount, 10% of the costs will be covered, however we are still short in reaching our goal of $600,000.

We are looking towards our friends, family, and local community members to help close the financial gap and reach our goal.  Your support will help cover the following:

  • Cover cost of inventory
  • Rent for the first three months
  • equipment (our biggest expense)
  • Staff

**Donations will be evenly distributed to meet our goals in all areas of our funding.

What We Need from You!

Please join us in our community funding journey and help us reach our goal!  Your support will make you eligible for the following incentives, located on the right side. -->

Keep in mind all of our packages will be discreet.

Whats the difference in cannagift bags/cannagift boxset and whats the difference in tiers?

The difference is the Items that will be contained in each of the different gift bags/gift boxset. The higher the tier the better the items for example:

  • Edibles(froggies)
  • Pre-rolls
  • Concentrate
  • Vapor pens
  • Beverages  cannabis-enfused

If you have any further inquiries, please do not hesitate to email your questions or concerns to: CoanakeCorp@gmail.com

Please Note:  The donation incentives will be made available after opening of the dispesnsary.  Official dates will be posted during the end of August, as we approach the ending of our campaign.

**Donation incentives will also be available for those outside of the Boston Massachussets  area. These incentives will be different than those listed and posted at a later times.

We also want to let you know for every $1 raised for our campaign $1 donation will go to a collection and be used to donate directly disabled veterans programs.

Our Impact

We are confident in what we have to offer and know it will benefit the community!  We want to create diversity and provide a variety to the community.  Coanakecorp. will have the community making amazing choices, which will serve as our overall benefits of our success!  As we think big, we will eventually look to expand our operations, which will also create jobs.  As a way to give back, we will donate a small percentage to Local community's and directly to disable veterans.  The more we get the community involved, the more we can look forward to getting the doors open and share our own success story.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot make a monetary donation, there are other ways you can help!  We ask that you help spread the word about our company. Your support can increase our chances of having others donate to reach our goal:

Let us be the talk of the town!  Make posts on social media networks such as Twitter/Facebook/Instagram, etc., to help spread the word.

Send out personal emails with our campaign link to family and friends that may be interested in our campaign and would like to donate!

Don’t forget!  Use the Indiegogo share tools to help share our campaign link with everyone.

So, When Can We Get This Thing Started?

Unfortunately, we do not have an exact date for the company opening as of yet.  Due to construction, certificates, permits, and other approvals, we anticipate on opening by late november.

Location! Location! Location!

Coanake Corp will be located near boston area, the heart and center of massachussets . We chose to utilize this area as a result of the increased population  of . You do not have to travel to the west for cannabis anymore as we are here to stay in boston!

Newsflash!

Updates on our progress will be posted regularly. So stay tuned as we have exciting things in store for you!

Our Deepest Gratitude

Thank you for taking the time to view and help our campaign. We look forward to opening our doors to the community and promise we will improve the quality of your  health and life through our services.

Coming soon!

You will soon be able to track our campaign through:

Twitter

Website

Now is your time to help make it happen for Coanake Corp. Give us YOUR SUPPORT!

FACEBOOK: @Coanake Corp.

INSTAGRAM:@coanakecorp

Having knowledge of the business and experience in the cannabis industry he will help to bring Coanake Corp. to its full potential. Here's Why We Need Your HelpOne of the main reasons we need your help is because banks typically don't provide loans to marijuana ventures that are directly involved with the plant or its derivatives. The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC). generally speaking will not insure a bank that takes on "existential" risks, which would include loans to companies in violation of federal law. Meaning it is not federaly recognized and with any business the startup cost is initially the most significant in getting the doors to open.  Of the total amount, 10% of the costs will be covered, however we are still short in reaching our goal of $600,000.We are looking towards our friends, family, and local community members to help close the financial gap and reach our goal.  Your support will help cover the following:
Cover cost of inventory
Rent for the first three months
equipment (our biggest expense)
Staff
**Donations will be evenly distributed to meet our goals in all areas of our funding.What We Need from You!Please join us in our community funding journey and help us reach our goal!  Your support will make you eligible for the following incentives, located on the right side. -->Keep in mind all of our packages will be discreet.Whats the difference in cannagift bags/cannagift boxset and whats the difference in tiers?The difference is the Items that will be contained in each of the different gift bags/gift boxset. The higher the tier the better the items for example:
Edibles(froggies)
Pre-rolls
Concentrate
Vapor pens
Beverages  cannabis-enfused
If you have any further inquiries, please do not hesitate to email your questions or concerns to: CoanakeCorp@gmail.comPlease Note:  The donation incentives will be made available after opening of the dispesnsary.  Official dates will be posted during the end of August, as we approach the ending of our campaign.**Donation incentives will also be available for those outside of the Boston Massachussets  area. These incentives will be different than those listed and posted at a later times.We also want to let you know for every $1 raised for our campaign $1 donation will go to a collection and be used to donate directly disabled veterans programs.Our ImpactWe are confident in what we have to offer and know it will benefit the community!  We want to create diversity and provide a variety to the community.  Coanakecorp. will have the community making amazing choices, which will serve as our overall benefits of our success!  As we think big, we will eventually look to expand our operations, which will also create jobs.  As a way to give back, we will donate a small percentage to Local community's and directly to disable veterans.  The more we get the community involved, the more we can look forward to getting the doors open and share our own success story.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cannot make a monetary donation, there are other ways you can help!  We ask that you help spread the word about our company. Your support can increase our chances of having others donate to reach our goal:Let us be the talk of the town!  Make posts on social media networks such as Twitter/Facebook/Instagram, etc., to help spread the word.Send out personal emails with our campaign link to family and friends that may be interested in our campaign and would like to donate!Don’t forget!  Use the Indiegogo share tools to help share our campaign link with everyone.So, When Can We Get This Thing Started?Unfortunately, we do not have an exact date for the company opening as of yet.  Due to construction, certificates, permits, and other approvals, we anticipate on opening by late november.Location! Location! Location!Coanake Corp will be located near boston area, the heart and center of massachussets . We chose to utilize this area as a result of the increased population  of . You do not have to travel to the west for cannabis anymore as we are here to stay in boston!Newsflash!Updates on our progress will be posted regularly. So stay tuned as we have exciting things in store for you!Our Deepest GratitudeThank you for taking the time to view and help our campaign. We look forward to opening our doors to the community and promise we will improve the quality of your  health and life through our services.Coming soon!You will soon be able to track our campaign through:TwitterWebsiteNow is your time to help make it happen for Coanake Corp. Give us YOUR SUPPORT!FACEBOOK: @Coanake Corp.INSTAGRAM:@coanakecorp

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • My name is Michael Owner of Urban Stone Music Group, My Brother lost everything in Texas.
  • We like to help families that are in need it is our duty as American's to help families in need.
  • Like to achive the express of helping and when we reach our goal we can donate water, and clothing to several different oranizations that help families.

Families need our help we are also going to donate to the red cross if we raise more than 2k?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We're looking for 2k and any extra were donating to Red Cross, and other Organizations .
  • Most funds will go to the Cruz family, then what ever we go over will go into the Red Cross & FEMA.
  • Also our company will send prepaid Amazon gift cards to students that are in need of supplies. 

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • My brother's family needs all the support you can give them,   trully dig deep in your heart..
  • We're here to help families like my brothers this is the USA we need to unite and help each other, instead of fighting and being races towards each other, this isnt what our for-father's have taught us as American's, Quit fighting and joing the help of the homeless lets bring our great Nation together in Unity.
  •  

     

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Help from different families tyo come together.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If there is any way here is the easy way to donante here is our paypal, michaelconklinaz@gmail.com Thanks for your time.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks for your Time. God Be With Us

story:
Even the most organised, conscientious person can have their day, week, or month unexpectedly derailed by mental illness.

The consequences can be minor; a missed appointment, an upset friend, unimpressed employer. But sometimes they are far worse. Think of a loving mother, who despite her best efforts, cannot leave the house to buy groceries to cook dinner. Maybe you just need to get a few small things done, but your anxiety has you stuck in a fog. It's frustrating, you know your illness won't have a hold on you forever, but right now, you are helpless.

That's where we come in.

My vision is to create an online network of volunteers, to help with any task, big or small, so that life doesn't fall apart. Think of it as a on call task service, provided by locals in your area.

The difference is the task can be something very simple, like feeding your dog who has been patiently waiting for you to feel better, help with finishing those references on your assignment that was due yesterday, picking up an item from the shops. Members can post a task on the angels job board, and a registered angel in their area, can accept. Angels are volunteers who share my passion for helping the community, and helping people with mental illness get on with their day.

No judgement, just support and understanding. 

Where the task involves transportation or other costs, the member and the angel can agree upon a reasonable service  fee.

As a not for profit, Anxiety Angels aims to help all members of the community who need a helping hand, without wanting to announce that they are having a particularly bad day. 

The goal is to take away the stress, guilt, and burden of the unintended consequences of the symptoms of mental illness. Even the simplest of tasks can be tremendously difficult. Imagine if you had someone around the corner from you, to get you over that hurdle so you can focus on what care about? We are not alone, and there are many people who care.

If you support my vision, please help me to raise the necessary funding to set up my website, source a network of volunteers, and develop an effective platform for members to access anonymously, help me to change what living with mental illness looks like. 

There is no longer a need to struggle with unproductive days, angels who care, like you and me are ready to help.

Thank you 

Jennifer

Please view my Facebook page to learn more about my passion: https://www.facebook.com/introspectivecounselli...

NB: this page does not generate any revenue, and benefits the community by sharing mental health stories and information.

story:
Short Summary

As a Massage Therapist I'm always looking for the most effective ways to help increase the quality of my craft. I began this journey more than a decade ago while trying to find ways to help my wife with her Depression and Anxiety. Then a few years ago I heard about Flotation Therapy. The claims seemed too good to be true. So I investigated... I read, listened to and watched everything I could to educate myself before going for my first float. I was not disappointed. The internal calm and sense of wellbeing I got from my first float was shocking. It also lasted through the next day and on into the second. I was lucky enough to Float again within a few weeks and was again surprised by the change and the the effects lasted even longer! So, I started working on getting my Wife in a tank. Same lasting and compounding effects! That's when it finally clicked. We need this and other people do too! 

So, we started working on bringing this dream to life. A float center funded by members and patrons, dedicated to altering the landscape of our world by making a positive impact on as many people as possible! We will be focusing on Veterans, First Responders, Healthcare Professionals and Educators. Through these endeavors we are also going to be developing community outreach programs for students and the homeless.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Float Tanks are big complicated pieces of equipment and require a LOT of specialized building preparations and materials. Each room will cost about $15,000 to build and the Tanks will cost between $30,000 and $35,000 to have made, delivered and put into use. So, our primary goal is $50,000.
  • In order to hit this target and grow past it we are offering perks so everyone near and far can participate! Wristbands, Shirts, Robes, calendars, postcards, massage and extra floats for yourself or for outreach programs!
  • Funds will go towards fulfilling our physical perks while we are in the construction phase of this project. For Patrons who have gifted Floats, we will be piloting a program where the participants will send you personalized thank you cards with handwritten messages about their experiences. 
  • We are also wanting to take you all along for the ride by filming and sharing exclusive updates all throughout the construction process!

The Impact

Through our outreach programs we plan to positively impact our area. Our overall goal is to give away up to 1000 floats provided by the generosity of our backers. The formula for this is simply 2:1. Every 2 floats sold generates one float for the program. Backers will receive a thank you postcard when their float is used by a participant! 

Risks & Challenges

Challenges will include finding an ideal location and completing construction in a timely fashion.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign through social media!
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you all for your support and interest!

story:
Mesocarp Services Australia was developed by Samantha Poole in January of 2019. Samantha is a qualified social worker with a minor in child protection and also holds a Masters in Human Resource Management. Samantha’s background is heavily working with families and children; with experience in mental health, substance abuse, case management, youth work and domestic and family violence.On a personal level, Samantha has four children aged from 2 to 13 and has a husband who has been a FIFO worker for most of their time together. Every area of knowledge Samantha has obtained is not only from obtaining degrees but most importantly through lived experience.

Through the personal and professional experience Samantha has lived, Mesocarp was developed on the foundations of the importance of promoting the SAFETY culture of not only businesses but in individuals lives as well. The connection between safety practice (IE; mental health, substance abuse, relationship breakdowns) within individuals lives that then impact the safety culture (how employees fulfill their job roles) and practice of workers in the field are interconnected and have a strong ability to influence each an every area of ones life, and ultimately a entire workforce/community.

Samantha’s passion for supporting individuals in reaching their desired goals, addressing buried issues and reconnecting relationships with loved ones is what drove the creation of Mesocarp Services. These areas of passion lead to the analysis of corporate bodies and how to create a workforce that is so entrenched in all areas of safety that the culture of the corporation promotes safer working practices, highlighting the need to address the personal aspects of a employees life eg; mental health, substance dependence, relationship break downs, grief, loss and trauma. Its about creating safer working cultures that then flow into personal lives, which in turn creates a community of individuals that are addressing their issues, not medicating or suppressing them.

We live in a society where everything is viewed through rose-colored glasses and life is about keeping up with the Jones’s. We have learnt to shut our doors to strangers, avoid conversations that go deeper than surface level, numb our pain with substances, build relationships based on fakeness, say no to help and support (yet drown on the inside), raise children that don’t respect authority and wonder why our younger generations are out of control.. Our society functions from fear.. Fear to be real, fear to be different, fear to be authentic and fear to feel pain....

Mesocarp Services is here to have the conversations that your afraid to have with anyone else. We welcome authenticity, respect individuality, support true connections, harness change and embrace difference. We want you to know that you are not alone. We want you to know if you cant have that awkward, real, authentic conversation with anyone you know, that you can have it with us. We don’t judge, we don’t hide... We are no expert in you life as you are the only one who can be. We come from a place of experience.. Through that we gained knowledge.. We are here to transfer that knowledge to you.

story:
Hello, I'm Victoria. I wholeheartedly believe that as we get older we transition into a phase of our lives that can be truly amazing.

Unfortunately, this is also a time when life starts throwing us some lemons - our children get more demanding, our parents start to have health concerns and rely on us for support, and just when we think we can't cope with any more, our bodies throw us the biggest curve-ball yet - a transition into menopause. Yes, wacky hormones create changes in our bodies that we never even knew would happen.

I have spent years doing personal research on productivity, coping with overwhelm, and how to be happy. I wanted to find a way to add all of this knowledge with my understanding of managing menopause naturally into a programme that would really help women feel great about getting older.

 

Why I am doing this campaign?

I am a business of one with a big ambition to help as many people as I can. So far I have invested my savings into making this dream a reality. I now need some help with the finishing touches so I can help as many people as possible.

My goal is raise £1250 to purchase an ISBN and 100 copies of the journal. This also includes 5% Indigogo fees and 2.9% transfer fees.

Stretch goal 1: An additional £1100

I've developed my website myself  - whilst this is a cheap way of doing things, I really want to provide a professional experience. An additional £1000 would allow me to hire a professional web developer to ensure the website has the correct functionality and is fast so users don't have to wait ages for the website to open.

Stretch goal 2: An additional £1100

I really want to reach as many people as possible and advertising costs money! An additional £1000 would allow me to hire a professional photographer, create high quality marketing materials and pay for advertising.

I have included the 5% Indigogo fee in all of my targets as this is really what it costs. If I am lucky enough to raise more money through this campaign, I will spend it on hiring a professional video maker to help with editing the online videos and additional marketing materials - after all I am a geeky scientist not a marketing guru.

About me

I have always known that my purpose in life is to help others but what I didn't know was how. The 10 years I spent working as a research scientist gave me a good ground from which to launch my change in career as a medical herbalist and health coach.

Over the last 20 years, I have done a lot of personal research on how to live a life that is productive, inspiring and filled with joy. My hormones have always been a bit crazy due to a long history of endometriosis but in recent years, I have noticed subtle changes in my body, my mind and my wellbeing, thanks to my ageing hormones. I am not taking it lying down! 

This programme combines my many years of personal research with my knowledge and experience as a medical herbalist and health coach. Launching it successfully would be a huge dream come true.

story:
Who is Jenn Garrett and why should she have a podcast?
Well, you see I am a regular human just like you. I am mother, daughter, sister, friend.
Mentor, student, trainer, coach.
Also... alcoholic, drug addict, binge eater, compulsive shopper and sex addict.
See? Just a normal human.

I have a degree in Psychology, have lost over 100lbs and worked in the fitness industry for 6 years as a personal trainer, lifecoach & gym manager.. but over the years I realized that it's not so much what my body looks like that's important. By focusing purely on this aesthetic, my issues came out in the form of raging addictions instead. I only began to resolve these problems by looking within and discovering that I alone possess the power to change my life. The deep love for myself that developed helped me do just that.

 Part of my resistance to discovering self-love was how idealistic and unrelatable I found most self-help materials. As a science-driven skeptic I found the hippy-dippy stuff super off-putting. However, as weird as they sound these methods do work. With much trial and error, I discovered the key to balance was inside of me all along. It wasn't easy. I definitely f*cked it up along the way, and I want to share it all with you.

In the last year I've grown my Instagram account from 400 to over 3000 followers (check me out! @jenngarrett_).  I post alot about my journey and have gathered info on what resonates with people. I'm now ready to start getting my message out on a bigger scale and so the idea for Straight up Self Love was born.

Although I've managed to change many aspects of my life, I am still a single mom and as such the financial demands involved with starting this project are a stretch for me. I need your help with raising funds for:

* A new laptop, as mine recently ceased to be EDIT: I no longer need a new computer!! So the goal is really only $500 now :)
* A podcast microphone and necessary software
* Some graphic design to make things aesthetically pleasing
* A jingle :)

Once these supplies are attained I will be able to start putting content out that will CHANGE LIVES. The implications for a world with more LOVE are absolutely incredible. I am not in this for fame or riches but am guided by a mission of spreading love and helping people help themselves <3

Each donation will receive a shout out on my Instagram story. Those donating $25+ will get a hand written thank you! If you're amazing enough to contribute $100+ I will send you a surprise along with your card, and over $200 gets all of that plus a 30 minute video call with me to ask me ANYTHING :)
If anyone is able to donate $500 or more I will probably cry and will definitely owe my deepest gratitude to you forever. You will get all of the above, PLUS I will shower you with thanks and give you access to all of my online content for LIFE <3

If I am not able to raise these funds, the expenses will come out of my own pocket and it will take me MUCH longer to get this content out.  However, it will still be done as this is my calling.

I understand that not everyone who wants to help is able to financially, but getting the word out is just as valuable! Please share and help me get this dream started, THANK YOU :)
story_txt:
Who is Jenn Garrett and why should she have a podcast?Well, you see I am a regular human just like you. I am mother, daughter, sister, friend.Mentor, student, trainer, coach.Also... alcoholic, drug addict, binge eater, compulsive shopper and sex addict.See? Just a normal human.
I have a degree in Psychology, have lost over 100lbs and worked in the fitness industry for 6 years as a personal trainer, lifecoach & gym manager.. but over the years I realized that it's not so much what my body looks like that's important. By focusing purely on this aesthetic, my issues came out in the form of raging addictions instead. I only began to resolve these problems by looking within and discovering that I alone possess the power to change my life. The deep love for myself that developed helped me do just that. Part of my resistance to discovering self-love was how idealistic and unrelatable I found most self-help materials. As a science-driven skeptic I found the hippy-dippy stuff super off-putting. However, as weird as they sound these methods do work. With much trial and error, I discovered the key to balance was inside of me all along. It wasn't easy. I definitely f*cked it up along the way, and I want to share it all with you.In the last year I've grown my Instagram account from 400 to over 3000 followers (check me out! @jenngarrett_).  I post alot about my journey and have gathered info on what resonates with people. I'm now ready to start getting my message out on a bigger scale and so the idea for Straight up Self Love was born.Although I've managed to change many aspects of my life, I am still a single mom and as such the financial demands involved with starting this project are a stretch for me. I need your help with raising funds for:* A new laptop, as mine recently ceased to be EDIT: I no longer need a new computer!! So the goal is really only $500 now :)* A podcast microphone and necessary software* Some graphic design to make things aesthetically pleasing* A jingle :)Once these supplies are attained I will be able to start putting content out that will CHANGE LIVES. The implications for a world with more LOVE are absolutely incredible. I am not in this for fame or riches but am guided by a mission of spreading love and helping people help themselves <3Each donation will receive a shout out on my Instagram story. Those donating $25+ will get a hand written thank you! If you're amazing enough to contribute $100+ I will send you a surprise along with your card, and over $200 gets all of that plus a 30 minute video call with me to ask me ANYTHING :)If anyone is able to donate $500 or more I will probably cry and will definitely owe my deepest gratitude to you forever. You will get all of the above, PLUS I will shower you with thanks and give you access to all of my online content for LIFE <3If I am not able to raise these funds, the expenses will come out of my own pocket and it will take me MUCH longer to get this content out.  However, it will still be done as this is my calling.I understand that not everyone who wants to help is able to financially, but getting the word out is just as valuable! Please share and help me get this dream started, THANK YOU :)

story:
El proyecto consiste en el desarrollo y mejora de un Centro Holístico de medicina integrativa. Se desarrollarán en forma progresiva, 3 Áreas de Trabajo principales: (The project consists in the creation and development of a Holistic Center with integrative medicine, to reach this we will develop in a progressive way 3 main work areas)  

1.- AREA DE SERVICIOS: (Services)

Se utilizarán todos los recursos de la medicina tradicional y de la medicina alternativa, con el fin de proporcionar a las personas los mejores resultados en la prevención y curación de enfermedades y la oportunidad de desarrollarse plenamente en los planos psicológicos, energéticos y espirituales. Para ello se contempla:(We will use every resource available in the traditional medicine combined with the resources that the alternative medicine has to offer, to reach the goal to provide people with better results in the preventing and healing of diseases and also the opportunity to develop themselves in the psychological, energetic and spiritual area of their beings. To reach that we contemplate the following sub-areas).

a) MEDICINA TRADICIONAL: (Traditional medicine)

1) Consultas de médico general y especialidades (Consult with general doctors and with specialists)

2) Tratamientos farmacológicos manejados en conjunto con tratamientos de medicina alternativa. (Pharmacological treatments handled with alternative medicine treatments)  

3) Nutrición (nutrition)

b) MEDICINA ALTERNATIVA (Alternative Medicine) 

1) MASAJES EN TODAS SUS FORMAS: Relajante, Reductivo, Terapéutico, Energético, etc. (Massages: Relaxing, Reductive, Therapeutic, Energetic, etc).

2) QUIROPRAXIA (Chiropractic)

3) YOGA (Yoga)

4) PSICOTERAPIAS: Gestalt, Sistémica, Grupos etc. (Psychotherapy: Gestalt, Systemic, Group therapy.) 

5) CONSTELACIONES FAMILIARES (Family Constellations)

6) AURICULOTERAPIA (Auriculotheraphy)

7) REIKI (Reiki)

8) IMANES (Magnets therapy)

9) HOMEOPATIA (Homeopathy)

10) FLORES DE BACH (Bach Flowers)

11) HERBOLARIA (Herbalist)

C.- ESPIRITUALIDAD Y DESARROLLO PERSONAL (Spirituality and personal development)

1) LECTURA DE TAROT  (Tarot)

2) CURSOS DE DESARROLLO PERSONAL EN TODAS SUS FORMAS: Cábala, Tarot, Protección del medio ambiente, Nutrición, Prevención de Enfermedades Crónicas, etc. (Courses for the personal development with a great variety of disciplines: Kabbalah, Tarot, Environment protection, Nutrition, Prevent from chronic diseases, etc). 

3) Talleres de Desarrollo Personal, Terapias de Grupo etc. (Workshops for personal development and group therapy, etc).

 

 

 

 

2.- ÁREA DE CREACIÓN Y DESARROLLO DE PRODUCTOS (Area for development and creation of products).  

Consiste en un laboratorio, cuyo equipo profesional se encarga de investigar los principios activos naturales beneficiosos al organismo humano y coadyuvantes en el tratamiento de las distintas patologías. Incluye la creación y desarrollo de cremas, geles, gotas, jarabes, polvos, aceites, esencias etc. (Area for development and creation of products. Consists in the support of a laboratory, which professional team is in charge of the research of the natural ingredients and its active components, with this research we are able to determine which ingredients are benefic for human beings and also which ingredients can help in the treatment of different pathologies. This includes the creation and development of nourishing creams, gels, solutions, syrups, natural oils, natural extracts, and essences).  

3.- ÁREA DE PROTECCIÓN DEL PLANETA (Area for the protection of our planet)  

 Es un área de servicio a la comunidad que consiste en crear y apoyar campañas de protección de la naturaleza y del medioambiente. Actualmente estamos en etapa inicial de nuestro proyecto. Contamos con un área de servicios en desarrollo y un área de creación de productos en su primera etapa. Estamos entregando parte de nuestras ventas a la organización pro naturaleza WWF (World Wide Foundation). Necesitamos apoyo para crecer y tener significación en el desarrollo de estos nuevos conceptos. Nos sirve tu apoyo material, ya que es un proyecto que involucra un crecimiento permanente, pero también nos ayuda que difundas estas ideas formando redes de amigos que se sumen a estas campañas eco amigables. Debemos crear y mantener la consciencia de nuestra integración a la naturaleza y los beneficios que esta nos aporta. Integremos en nuestro crecimiento las disciplinas energéticas y una medicina que integre el máximo del conocimiento acumulado en miles de años de civilización. (Is an area to give back something to our society, with this area we pretend to help our community to create awareness and protect our environment and nature. As a strong part of this commitment we donate 10% of our global online sales to the WWF (World wildlife foundation). We need your support to grow and have a significant impact in the development of this new concepts. Your material support is useful for us, this project involves a permanent grow, but if you share this project to spread the word about this eco-friendly initiatives that will also be very helpful. We should unite in the creation of conscience about nature and the benefits that we can get from it, let’s integrate in our knowledge the energetic disciplines and a medicine that involves the maximum amount of knowledge that humans have collected through thousands of years).

¿CÓMO SE VAN A UTILIZAR LOS RECURSOS?

Si logramos nuestra meta, los recursos serán distribuidos de la siguiente manera: (When we reach our goal, the resources collected through this crowdfunding will be used in the following manner)

1.- 50% de los ingresos se destinarán a implementación del Centro Holístico, completando al máximo los inmuebles que requiere un proyecto como este. Se comprarán: Escritorios. Pantalla Plana, Sillas, Colchonetas, cojines para terapias, Camillas de masajes, Sillón para faciales, etc. (50% of the income will be used in the implementation of the Holistic Center, we need furniture for our facilities among other things to keep functioning our establishment. We will use the money to buy: Desks, Flat Screen for our courses, Chairs, Mats, Cushions for the therapies, Couch to do facials, etc).

2.- 30% de los ingresos se destinará a la creación de nuevos productos: Compra de insumos, envases, pago de maquila etc. (30% of the resources will be used in the development and creation of new products, as we need to obtain supplies, bottles, labeling and manufacture).  

3.- 20% se destinará a la creación y entrega de las recompensas así como a gastos administrativos. (20% of the resources will be used for the cost of the rewards and the administrative costs).

Si quieres conocer más detalles sobre los productos y servicios ofrecidos en las recompensas te invitamos a entrar a nuestra página web www.labccontemexico.com donde encontr... información sobre los mismos. If you want to learn more about the products and services offered as rewards we invite you to visit our site www.labcconteinternational.com where you could find all the information about our products and business. 

RECOMPENSAS/REWARDS

Con este proyecto esperamos lograr un gran iimpacto en el desarrollo de la medicina alternativa en conjunto con la medicina tradicional y la ciencia, es necesaria la ayuda para impulsar estas tendencias pues de lo contrario el proyecto tardará más tiempo en llevarse a cabo, quedando limitado en la creación de nuevos productos y en la implementación de las áreas de servicios, así como en el cumplimiento de nuestra misión y el desarrollo de los productos que consideramos necesarios para ayudar a los demás. 
Nosotros somos un Centro Holístico establecido, puedes corroborarlo visitándonos en nuestras instalaciones en Avenida Hidalgo 1819 en la ciudad de Guadalajara, Jalisco, México, o visitando nuestra página web www.labccontemexico.com como ya hemos dicho, necesitamos los recursos para implementar mejoras en cada una de las áreas de nuestro trabajo y para mantener nuestra labor en la búsqueda de ayudar a los demás y traer el bienestar a toda la gente que nos sea posible.

When we reach our goal, we expect to creat a great impact in the devolpment and acceptance of the traditional medicine working with alternative medicine, always with scientific rigour for the benefit of people, we need the support of the people, otherwise the Project will suffer a slow down in its implementation and development, we won’t be able to create and develop new products as soon as we wish and consider that is needed. 
We are an established Holistic Center, you can corroborate this by visiting us in Avenida Hidalgo 1819 in the city of Guadalajara, Mexico or visiting our website www.labcconteinternational.com as we said we need this resources to implement improvements in every area of our work and to keep with the labor of helping people and bringing welfare to everybody around us.

No solo puedes aportar monetariamente, que compartas este proyecto también es de gran ayuda.

You can help not only by donating, if you share this project that will help us greatly too.

story:
“DHENU SADANAM RAYEENAM”

The above slogan reflects the deep understanding of the creation as possessed by the Vedic sheer. The Vedic sheer called it the mother, the source of nourishment of creation.

The Cow has been called the mother for a reason. Everything it produces is for the benefit of mankind.

 

When we see cows in current scenario is an animal that is ignored, abused, exploited, abandoned and murdered to feed our selfish motives.

so we start caring this beautiful creation of god names as Cow.

Currently we have approx 870 cows in our Gaushala and it’s increasingly day by day.

We provide healthy food to cows so they produce more and stay fit. 

We provide shelter so they can take rest and live happily.

We arrange medicine for them if she needed.

Still we cover approx 1% cows in our area we need to take of all cows and it takes a lots of efforts.

So kindly donate so we can take care of this beautiful animal which always produces for us. We still working in our area and get some guy tie ups with some social workers they provide us food and their time to take care of cows.

Really when we take care of someone that’s gives us a boost in our daily life when I work for them I feel happy so pls donate and have a chance to feel the happiness. Your small help can save a life of cow.

story:
Yogacharia Jnandev / Surender Sani was born in India where he lived for the first thirty three years of his life. Jnandev studied Yoga deeply academically and experientially becoming a Saddhu himself for some time and studying under several different Swamijis around India. Jnandev has studied Yogic scriptures in their original sanskrit language. He is from a Hindu family values the Yamas and Niyamas (moral and ethical codes) of Yogaas vitally important for spiritual growth and evolution, the foundations of true Yoga practice.

We aim to develop an eco-friendly self-sustainable organic yoga training, research and retreat centre in the beautiful countryside of Portugal. The aim is to make the ashram truly international where people from all over the world will travel to to learn & teach Yogic practices. The ashram is based on 21 acres of pine, cork oak, and olive trees at the moment along with plenty of wild lavender, and other natural plants. It is based on  a big hill with quite a bit flat on the top and sloping to north, east, and south. It touches a seasonal stream at the north end following olive field, and pine forest on the slop. At the east end it touches the river with a steep slope full of pine and cork oak trees and wildness.

We aim to preserve most of the forest and create plenty of foot-path to enjoy walking in the woods and enjoy nature, explore birds and wildness of beautiful Portuguese unspoiled nature. OUR GOAL IS ALSO TO PLANT MORE TREES WITH ALL OF YOUR HELP TO BRING OUR CARBON PRINT DOWN.

With your help we can create a haven for people to help with spiritual growth, improve physical and mental health, and to help nurture teachers so they may take what they have learned to help themselves and others.

What We Need & What You Get

Our aim is to raise £15,000. All monies raised will go into the building and development of the ashram.The property already have an old stone build with no roof. Structure is solid and good to be used in our development project. We aim to raise the walls and put a flat roof with natural clay tiles or bricks on roof top floor for yoga decking.

From Yoga decking or shala you will be looking out nature beautiful nature full of forests, range of mountains in 360degree all around.

Beneath we will have an open kitchen, dinning-cum-satsanga/yoga room if we have to be indoors due to weather looking out at east-south to mountains and forest.

To accommodate yoga students and seekers we are aiming to develop five log-cabins with two single beds to accommodate up to ten yogis/yoginis at once.   

Compost toilets and Shower- On the site we would like to develop two compost toilets and showers. All the human waste will be used in our organic fruit garden as well as the water used in showers, will be used to water the plants too. We aim to not use any chemicals, shampoos, hair conditioners, soaps, etc on site to preserve the beauty and keep it clean and organic to best possible.

Camping- We will create few decked areas to put some tents up if you fancy camping on site and help us develop the ashram in exchange of accommodation and yoga classes.

We have many perks for contributors ranging from residential weekends to books and DVDs.

If we do not reach our target amount all monies raised will still go to the creation of the ashram so every penny will still go to where it was intended.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially you can still help by helping spread the word of the project via social media. Please follow Yoga Satsang Ashram on Facebook   and Twitter  for the relevant links.
 

Thanks for taking the time to read this. Aum Shanti x
story_txt:
Yogacharia Jnandev / Surender Sani was born in India where he lived for the first thirty three years of his life. Jnandev studied Yoga deeply academically and experientially becoming a Saddhu himself for some time and studying under several different Swamijis around India. Jnandev has studied Yogic scriptures in their original sanskrit language. He is from a Hindu family values the Yamas and Niyamas (moral and ethical codes) of Yogaas vitally important for spiritual growth and evolution, the foundations of true Yoga practice.
We aim to develop an eco-friendly self-sustainable organic yoga training, research and retreat centre in the beautiful countryside of Portugal. The aim is to make the ashram truly international where people from all over the world will travel to to learn & teach Yogic practices. The ashram is based on 21 acres of pine, cork oak, and olive trees at the moment along with plenty of wild lavender, and other natural plants. It is based on  a big hill with quite a bit flat on the top and sloping to north, east, and south. It touches a seasonal stream at the north end following olive field, and pine forest on the slop. At the east end it touches the river with a steep slope full of pine and cork oak trees and wildness.
We aim to preserve most of the forest and create plenty of foot-path to enjoy walking in the woods and enjoy nature, explore birds and wildness of beautiful Portuguese unspoiled nature. OUR GOAL IS ALSO TO PLANT MORE TREES WITH ALL OF YOUR HELP TO BRING OUR CARBON PRINT DOWN.
With your help we can create a haven for people to help with spiritual growth, improve physical and mental health, and to help nurture teachers so they may take what they have learned to help themselves and others.

What We Need & What You Get
Our aim is to raise £15,000. All monies raised will go into the building and development of the ashram.The property already have an old stone build with no roof. Structure is solid and good to be used in our development project. We aim to raise the walls and put a flat roof with natural clay tiles or bricks on roof top floor for yoga decking.
From Yoga decking or shala you will be looking out nature beautiful nature full of forests, range of mountains in 360degree all around.
Beneath we will have an open kitchen, dinning-cum-satsanga/yoga room if we have to be indoors due to weather looking out at east-south to mountains and forest.
To accommodate yoga students and seekers we are aiming to develop five log-cabins with two single beds to accommodate up to ten yogis/yoginis at once.   
Compost toilets and Shower- On the site we would like to develop two compost toilets and showers. All the human waste will be used in our organic fruit garden as well as the water used in showers, will be used to water the plants too. We aim to not use any chemicals, shampoos, hair conditioners, soaps, etc on site to preserve the beauty and keep it clean and organic to best possible.
Camping- We will create few decked areas to put some tents up if you fancy camping on site and help us develop the ashram in exchange of accommodation and yoga classes.
We have many perks for contributors ranging from residential weekends to books and DVDs.
If we do not reach our target amount all monies raised will still go to the creation of the ashram so every penny will still go to where it was intended.
 Other Ways You Can HelpIf you are unable to contribute financially you can still help by helping spread the word of the project via social media. Please follow Yoga Satsang Ashram on Facebook   and Twitter  for the relevant links. Thanks for taking the time to read this. Aum Shanti x

story:
Short Summary

Micah's Mom and Dad reside on the beautiful Caribbean island of Antigua where they gave birth to a beautiful baby boy to join his two year old toddler big brother

Shortly after birth and after quite a number of signs, symptoms and diagnostics, baby Micah has been diagnosed with a neuroblastoma tumor in his abdomen.

Mom and Dad are desirous of seeking treatment abroad for baby Micah as this has been the medical advice provided to them due to lack of facilities on the island to treat such an advanced stage neuroblastoma tumor.

To this end, they seek financial assistance and hence are raisingÂ funds for off island treatment which they are being told could last up to two years.

Donations can be made via this campaign as well as via our makeawishcaribbean.com website. Â Donations via our website that are specifically for Micah should be referenced with the serial tag of MK1 when being made. This enables us to direct your donation to the specified campaign.

story:
Thank you and Welcome...

My name is Dr. Victor J Wedel, PhD, Rt.R, RDMS. My background is in radiology, ultrasound and epigenetic medicine. With a concern for the many epidemics of cancer in the USA and also world-wide at this time.

From a personal standpoint, I watched both my wife and son pass away 3 months apart in 2001. I empathetically understand the devastation many people go through, especially when all hope is lost. As a result, I decided to devote my life to understand the causes of diseases, especially Cancer...

After 10 years of global medicine research and reverse engineering the human being past it's Protocell state (theoretical beginning) to one electron, which completely changed my perspective on the human and what I thought I knew about it's operations, and as a result I believe we should first address the things "Not Seen" or fully understood by current western or eastern medicine as important. These "Un-Seen" things appear to be the First cause of cancer

  • Free Radical Behavior, (Too many Un-paired electrons robbing paired electrons)
  • Cell Membrane/Mitochondria (membrane integrity/mitochondria catalytic cycle  malfunction )  
  • Xenobiotic infiltration (foreign/toxic substances inside body)

CoMedica therapeutic products for the causes above:

  • ElectroN (Balances Free Radicals)
  • EpigeneTec (Empowers the Immune System)
  • Wedel Holisticeuticals ( Detoxify, Anti-BAD microbial cells, Empowers GOOD microbials & arrests BAD Cell Behavior)

CoMedica consists of 9 companies and organizations dedicated to helping individuals who have medical needs, especially those individuals who have been told there is not much hope... 

For a "Limited Time" we are offering shares of our stock as a gift for your help. Our products are for therapeutic research consistent with the National Institutes of Health's  Community Engaged Research and is intended for individuals who currently have cancer or genetically concerned. CoMedica is a Corporate Holding Company incorporated in the state of Wyoming, United States of America with Co-Research Members and Associates being established world-wide...

    Please see Your Website at: www.comedica9.com

story:
[功效]补虚壮身，保持健康，预防疾病。适用于血虚，精血，肤色差，头昏眼花，头昏眼花，睡眠不安，心pit，健忘等。经常饮酒可改善老年人的免疫功能，增强抗病能力，延缓衰老。[用法]每天1-2次，每次喝1-2小杯。

 

人参酒是人类感染史上最大的植物发酵酒精饮料。它由人参营养。人参酒不仅吸收人参的药用营养，而且具有缓解急性酒精中毒的作用。使用人参浸泡酒具有滋养五个内脏器官，镇定精神，镇定灵魂，缓解心，消除邪恶，改善视力，幸福和营养的作用，以及所有血液和体液不足的证据。补气养血，温胃散寒。

 

[Suggestion] Ginseng wine is a high-grain wine soaked in ginseng. It is not recommended to drink more homemade ginseng wine, because many people who make homemade soak wine do not know the healthy and effective ginseng wine ratio. Although ginseng wine is good, it is mixed and consumed randomly. Later, it is not only useless to the body, but even more harmful. As the saying goes, deliciousness is rare, and everything must be in moderation. Liaoli ginseng wine is a mass-customized ginseng wine with various national patent certificates, so long-term drinking of Liaoli ginseng wine is good It is profitable and harmless.

story:
El objetivo de Roble Academy es promover una vida saludable y activa después de los 55 años a través de:

La Semilla; Rutina de 30 minutos al día , donde semanalmente se trabajan todas las áreas cognitivas de la mente y  se mejora  la movilidad, flexibilidad, equilibrio, resistencia y fuerza. 

Cursos Explora; Programas especializados en salud y bienestar o aprendizaje de temáticas diversas: técnicas de respiraciones, yoga, orientación, inteligencia emocional y muchos mas.

 

Todo el contenido esta creado por expertos de cada sector: psicólogos cognitivos, entrenadores funcionales, maestros de yoga y meditación...

Puedes visitar nuestra web en versión Beta y descargar la app móvil para Android (la app de Apple estará disponible muy pronto).

Durante los últimos 3 meses, hemos realizado una prueba piloto con mas de 500 personas involucradas. Las personas que han seguido "La Semilla"  han visto mejoras significativas en sus capacidades cognitivas, se han sentido con más buen humor y han aumentado sus niveles de fuerza física. 

Ahora estamos creando mas contenido y mejorando la plataforma tecnológica  para poder llegar a mas personas.

Roble Academy es un regalo perfecto para tus padres.
